name: Intro
_source: speak;XeconisYoung;Max, there's still no sign of anything.|Is there any point still hanging around in the dark and cold if we yield no results?
speak;MaxYoung;But... There has to be something...|The book definitely said there were magic weeds that bloom in this area at night!
speak;XeconisYoung;Please tell me you were not in the fiction section.
speak;MaxYoung;Of course not! I think...|But the excerpt said it would grant anyone immense magical power!|You'd finally be able to cast magic!|Is that not a dream come true?
speak;XeconisYoung;Perhaps... |Though, we should be heading to bed soon.
speak;MaxYoung;Hmph, I guess you're right.|We'd be toast if we couldn't make it to camp in time...|Where's Eff?
speak;XeconisYoung;No idea.|But he's probably likewise tired of this fruitless search.
speak;MaxYoung;I don't know, I assumed he got lost in his books, as usual.|Wait, here he comes!
speak;XeconisYoung;So, Eff, are you ready to head home?
speak;EffYoung;Not just yet, there's a lady being harassed by bandits headed this way!
speak;MaxYoung;Oh! Well, we should help, right?
speak;XeconisYoung;...|Not really our problem, is it?
speak;XeconisYoung;No skin off our backs.|Besides, we're no militia, we're students.|I don't wish to be beaten to a pulp...
speak;EffYoung;Tch! A noble's duty is to help the commonfolk!
speak;MaxYoung;If she dies, is that our fault?
speak;EffYoung;It is our duty to protect!|If not for duty, what about a reward?
speak;XeconisYoung;Does she even appear to have one?
speak;MaxYoung;No matter, Eff, I'll lend a hand.
speak;XeconisYoung;I really think this is a bad idea.
speak;EffYoung;Consider it a test of your own abilities.
speak;XeconisYoung;I suppose a real fight does push me to grow...|Fine, strength in numbers.
speak;Pierre;You 'zere! Cease your running!|You know zat you cannot escape!
speak;Sunii;Huff... Huff...|Please... I don't know what you want from me!
speak;Pierre;Likely excuse.|Hand yourself over now and 'zen ve'll give you a merciful death!
speak;Pierre;Hoho! 'Zen we'll have to beat you down, for the boss!
speak;MaxYoung;Sounds serious...|But I'm certain they're no match for us!
speak;XeconisYoung;Best be careful...|I'm inclined to believe that they're no bandits.

name: DeathSalEarly
_source: speak;Sal;Is it time for me... To rest...?
speak;Sal;Grr... I'll fall back for now....

name: DeathProf
_source: speak;Prof;I'll have to back off, for now...

name: DeathEffY
_source: speak;EffYoung;This isn't how I planned to die... Gotta fly away...

name: Outro
_source: speak;MaxYoung;Whew, don't we all make quite a team!
speak;XeconisYoung;How fortunate.|But... We really could have died back there, Eff.
speak;EffYoung;Yeah, he doesn't quite like risks.|However, a noble must be a shining example.|We must take risks for our commoners!
speak;MaxYoung;Shouldn't we be celebrating? We didn't die after all!
speak;SalYoung;Uh, hold that thought... Cherry...|Now may we speak?
speak;SalYoung;Well... You see, I'm moving away soon...
speak;CherryYoung;B-but, why? I thought we were besties!
speak;SalYoung;Father... He was found practicing dark magic...|We can't even show our faces back in Aurelia...
speak;CherryYoung;What...? So you don't care about me at all?|Leaving everything behind? Ugh! Fine!
speak;SalYoung;Now you're being unreasonable, I barely have a choice!
speak;CherryYoung;I'm being unreasonable?!|Great! You care more about honour and that crap than me!
speak;SalYoung;I should probably be going...|You really don't understand, we would be pariahs...|Goodbye, Cherry.
speak;SkillYoung;Right, I just HOPE that I can be better than a stupid babysitter someday...
speak;CherryYoung;Hmph! Be grateful my parents allowed you the courtesy of my company!|The pay is j-just a bonus!
speak;MaxYoung;Were we supposed to see that?
speak;XeconisYoung;Wait, where did the lady with the afro go?
speak;MaxYoung;You're wanting a reward? Tsk, tsk.
speak;XeconisYoung;No, just... I want to know who those people were.|None of this makes any sense...
speak;MaxYoung;That is true...|Also, what gang has a knight with a pompous moustache?
speak;XeconisYoung;I think she went that way...
speak;MaxYoung;Hm, now I am itching to know...|Yeah let's stay on her trail!
speak;EffYoung;Uh, I think I'd best get going...|I hope you two can make it back safe.
speak;EffYoung;Sorry, my brother would be furious if he knew I was breaking curfew...|Adieu, friends.
speak;MaxYoung;He's right... but it's worth the scolding we'll get from the professor!
speak;Cornelius;Oh, hello Sunii. You seem... panicked.
speak;Cornelius;I have done nothing.|I am a pious man, you know...
speak;Sunii;We both know what happened, Cornelius.
speak;Cornelius;Well, Lumii would appreciate it if you didn't tattle, wouldn't she...?
speak;Cornelius;Let us just leave the story as is truthful, yes?|A downtrodded peasant who stole church property... disappeared.
speak;Cornelius;Well? Do you admit the truth?
speak;Sunii;Truth? Here's the truth!|You defile the teachings of the Goddess.|You're no better than those you condemn!
speak;Cornelius;You may claim to know how what the Goddess desires...|But, you are just another impure fool.|I will show you to her embrace!
speak;Cornelius;Your moral degeneracy abhors my pious heart.|Farewell, sinner.
speak;Sunii;It's okay... the Theowa orphanage in Aurelia...|She is...
speak;XeconisYoung;Now, hang on! Who was that guy?!
speak;Sunii;Don't snoop anymore... Or you'll surely be dead...|But... Lumii...
speak;XeconisYoung;That man... He's going to pay...

name: PlayerTurn3
_source: speak;CherryYoung;Ugh... See! Lost! Where are w-we going?
speak;SkillYoung;Well I'd be able to know where I'm going if you gave me the map!
speak;CherryYoung;Father is paying you good money...|You should have asked sooner!
speak;SalYoung;Uhm, can we stop arguing?{br}Cherry, I have something to tell you...
speak;SkillYoung;Sorry ladies, but that can wait. Look over there! We should save them!
speak;SalYoung;Well, I suppose we should help... Honestly, who is causing trouble at this time?

name: PlayerTurn4
_source: speak;Pierre;'Zey're just kids! What 'ze 'ell are you guys doing?|Vell, you're asking for it, twerps! Hoho!

name: FightPierre
_source: speak;Pierre;Do not resist, you vill only make things vorse.

name: FightGrinst
_source: speak;Grinst;I'll eat ya for dinner! Huehue!|Whew... hoo... Cramps...;;;boss_convo_left

name: House1
_source: speak;Man1;Experience is everything, you know...|You look a little green, maybe this ought do some good...

name: House2
_source: speak;Man2;Lucky that maniac targetted our neighboring village.|The herbs help me... And now, you too!|Here, let's spread the love around!

name: ChapterStart
_source: narrate;Narrator;Our tale continues five years after that fateful day.
narrate;Narrator;Sal, now a knight, serves the Sagesmaster of Arcei.
narrate;Narrator;However, bandits ravage the countryside region of Jandel.
narrate;Narrator;Sal and her platoon now advance to deal with the bandit problem.
speak;Grinst;'EY! You callin' me ugly, HUH?
speak;Man3;You destroyed our entire village...|Have you no heart?

speak;Grinst;Ya shouldn'ta had so much food!|Times are hard for everyone, better me than you, eh?|Oh, I know! Let's play a game! You stand still, and I beat ya to a PULP!|Can't leave any witnesses ya know?
speak;Grinst;Huehuehue! Your meats are mine... MINE!
speak;Grinst;Hmph.|Maybe... A break...|All this exercise is making me... tired...
speak;Bandit1;Are you mad? What if the knights are sent after us?
speak;Grinst;Ha! I'll just... Crush em...|Like a cashew!
speak;Bandit1;Aight then... What about the others?
speak;Grinst;Just have them... Huff... go for the south village...|That'll buy me some time...
speak;Smoke;I see 'em. Not much to look at, are they?
speak;Landros;Not so different than any other cohort of goons.
speak;Aerial;We can't undermine them yet... See.|That village is a goner...
speak;Roag;Girl...|I swear there's more and more these days.
speak;Landros;Whatever's going on, we have to kill these bandits.
speak;Smoke;"Bandits?"|Who is Ditz and why is he being banned?|Banned from where?
speak;Aerial;All right, Sal. We're ready and willing...|Though, wasn't there supposed to be six of us?
speak;Sal;Form up! Surround them all! Don't let a single one escape!|For the Sagemaster!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;Well... that's that... Whew! Time to report back to the Sagemaster!
speak;Sal;I bring bad news.|It appears as you feared, more bandit strikes...
speak;Sagemaster;So the reports are true...|Irksome, I'm too weak to help my people...
speak;Sal;I beg to differ. One man cannot stop crime.
speak;Sagemaster;The moral dilemma of bandits...|How do we treat them? They are people, yet treat others as unworthy...
speak;Sal;While true, we can't let them terrorise our upstanding citizens.|I'll dispense of anyone you need, your Majesty.
speak;Sagemaster;Thank you, Sal. I am ever thankful for your duty.|Actually, I do need something of you...

speak;Sagemaster;With the passing of King Gildao of Aurelia...|We must send an envoy to the coronation of his son.|I'd attend myself, but, in this state...|Even if my fragility impedes me, I would see it prudent to keep up relations...
speak;Sal;Oh erm... Aurelia...|I will do what I must, but what about the Prince?|Should he not attend in your place?

speak;Sagemaster;You know him, always galavanting off...|If only he could take his position as prince seriously...|I ensure Nako and Pikno will aid you.|Travelling the continent in these times is a gruelling task indeed...
speak;Nako;Ah, are we late? Please forgive us, your Majesty.
speak;Nako;Oh! Sal! Hello!|It'll be a pleasure to work with you!
speak;Sal;Thanks?{br}{c:wait;400}I'm looking forward to traveling with you two. Let's er... Get this show on the road?
speak;Sagemaster;Do not worry about me...|Snow can take care of me in your absence...|Take this gold too, for weapons and whatnot...
speak;Pikno;Thank you, now, time to proceed.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Oh, mighty Goddess...|Father... Please... Care for him...|Show me your light. I am so lost...
speak;EmelinePrincess;Ah... Sir Skill.|It is all I can do... Father cannot return...|I must ask for her guidance...
speak;Skill;...|You're sure that the Goddess can hear everything?
speak;EmelinePrincess;Sir Skill! Surely you jest!|These sacred lands are her gift...|She sees everything on her soil...
speak;Skill;Ah, well, perhaps praying for your brother's prosperity might help?
speak;EmelinePrincess;A great idea, though...|Will you be by Elias's side when he is king?
speak;Skill;Of course, it was my oath to your father.|I cannot break that vow.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Oh, Sir Skill, I will miss your company...
speak;Skill;I worked myself to the bone to rise the ranks...|All a part of my devotion to your family.|My apologies, but I will be unable to devote as much of my time to you.
speak;EmelinePrincess;You are a fine man, Sir Skill...|Tell me, why do I feel so... useless?|I am unable to perform my duties in these turbulent times...
speak;Skill;Milady! Your strength will be enough to support your brother and country.|Don't let anyone tell you otherwise...|Now, I beg your leave. I must aid the preparations for the ceremony.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Oh Goddess, whatever should I do...?

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Sal complies in acting as the ill Sagemaster's envoy, attending the Aurelian coronation.
narrate;Narrator;Joined by his servants Nako and Pikno, they press onwards to Aurelia.
narrate;Narrator;However, their journey is not without problems.
narrate;Narrator;The envoy is heading through territory of local terror, the Rizan bandits...
speak;Sal;This path that the Sagemaster has mapped out leads around the edge of Monsdor...|It seems rather unsafe...
speak;Pikno;Hmm...{br}Indeed.|He never was one for directions...|However, we are still likely to arrive in time for the ceremony.
speak;Nako;It will be lovely to see Prince Elias take the throne.|Though it makes me feel rather old, that someone so young would be crowned...
speak;Pikno;Aurelia's royal family is said to be blessed by the Goddess herself...
speak;Nako;Indeed, we have to show up to maintain good standing, with both the country and religion.
speak;Sal;Well, we better keep moving, this forest is gonna be the end of me...
speak;Lentz;Pay us a toll, or we won't let ya past.|4000 Gold! Them's the rates.
speak;Nako;We don't have enough money...|Should we sell some of our things?
speak;Sal;Nako, I won't bend the knee to a false lord.
speak;Nako;Commander, do we really want to risk a fight...?
speak;Sal;500 gold, take it or leave it!
speak;Lentz;You insult me!|Prepare for a beatdown! Nobody disgraces Lentz!

name: Village1
_source: speak;OldMan1;Oh why thank you.{w}{clear}As you can see, the fangled bandihoobs are causing strife.|I would like to help, but I have passed my prime...|I was a bold, gallant knight once...|Ah! Where was I?|Take this, from my youth. You need it more than I.

name: FightLentz
_source: speak;Lentz;You really come onto my turf?|Then you protest my tolls...|You need to learn the rules with a beatdown!;;;boss_convo_left

name: DeathLentz
_source: speak;Lentz;Urgh... I shoulda let you pass...

name: DeathSanjay
_source: speak;Sanjay;No! This cannot be...!|The Goddess would never abandon the righteous...

name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;If only his Majesty gave us more funds...|Though, they should have known better than to trifle with knights!
speak;Pikno;Ah, well...|It's nothing I haven't done before.|Though we may be running out of time...
speak;Sal;Well, thankfully that's over.|Full speed ahead!
speak;Argento;Now that your father is with the Goddess...|The winds of change descend upon Aurelia.
speak;Elias;Sir Argento, I swear that I will ensure that change is good.|I wish for people of all nations to bask in the golden rays of the Goddess.|Aurelia is not in a vacuum, we must help everyone.
speak;Argento;Indeed. I've seen enough in my years to recognise true passion.|You are a perfect fit for the throne, your Highness.
speak;Elias;I wish for you to help me every step of the way, Emmie.|I know I cannot do this alone.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Me? I'm not sure what I can do...
speak;Elias;Come now, we're only as good as the people we surround ourselves with.|Your belief in me pushes me to strive for greater things.
speak;EmelinePrincess;Oh Elias... I'll try... I'll do anything for your dream!
speak;Argento;Now, we must prepare for the coronation, your Highness.|Time is of the essence, we only have a few hours left!
speak;Elias;We'll speak soon, Emmie, with me as king!|I can hardly believe the time has come...
speak;EmelinePrincess;Yes brother... I'll walk this path with you...

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Slim Sword,Iron Lance,Slim Lance,Iron Axe;armory

name: Intro
_source: speak;Sal;Gah! We need to make a break for it...|There!
speak;Sal;That way should help us get back...|It may be guarded, but it's the way home alright.|But, just what is going on here?
speak;Aerial;Seems weird, right?|But, who would frame his Majesty?
speak;Nako;I can hardly believe him to do such wrongs either...|But, poor Prince Elias...|If only his wounds were not so servere, we could have saved him...
speak;Smoke;I guess we need Sage advice right now to get out of this mess...|Eh? Eh?
speak;Smoke;Sorry. Let's make our move...|Though I smell enemies in hiding...|Best be careful, huh?
speak;Sal;I will leave last, I won't leave anyone behind!;;;;;;convo-red

name: Turn11
_source: speak;Skill;Where are they... WHERE ARE THEY?!
speak;Esteban;They are are trying to flee...
speak;Skill;Thanks, Sir Obvious! Didn't know that!|What's next? Elucidating me as to the fact it's raining?!
speak;Esteban;The Goddess is crying for his Highness...

name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;Huff... Whew!|They're really making me sweat...|We need to get to Grahment quickly... But we need to go through Monsdor to do it.|I don't think it'll be easy, but we have to push onward.
speak;Blazing;Did I happen to hear you say Grahment?

speak;Blazing;Oh! Sorry! Sorry!|I am Blazing, son of Earl Ignatius of Grahment...|I was supposed to be on my way to Aurelia but...|Well, my sense of direction is awful!|The Goddess did not heed my prayers no matter how much I tried...|Now I am late to see the post-coronation festivities...|I really just want to go home now...
speak;Sal;I see, coronation...|Sure, we'll help you back to Grahment.
speak;Blazing;Oh thank you so much!|My father would be besides himself if anything were to happen to me.|Oh! I never asked your name?
speak;Blazing;Oh, I see. On your way home?|What good fortune!
speak;Sal;Hm, saving the son of an Earl?|This could definitely help us call in a few favors!
speak;Sal;Quite, but best to not let the kid catch on.
speak;Maro;Right you are, commander.|Now, let me clean that sword...
speak;Maro;W-well, it IS covered in Aurelian blood...|Might look less than admirable to the young sir...
speak;Sal;Right, good thinking greenie.|Now let's go on!
speak;Lucian;Your Highness, no... Your Majesty now.
speak;Cornelius;Sir Argento has dealt with the... burial.
speak;Emeline;I may be Queen now, yet all I can do is hide in my room...|I'm not as strong as brother...
speak;Lucian;King Oberon of Monsdor informed me that they will give us their full support.|They will tear Arcei to the ground...|What an unholy wasteland.
speak;Skill;I will do whatever it takes to expunge those Arcein scum...|They alluded me... I failed you and your brother...
speak;Skill;You are too merciful, your Majesty!|You're the image of the Goddess's grace!
speak;Emeline;Mercy... Is that not what brother would want?
speak;Cornelius;Killing an Aurelian royal is tantamount to an attack on the Goddess!|They do not deserve her mercy, nor yours.
speak;Lucian;Indeed, Father Cornelius, quite so.|An open declaration of war is the only answer!
speak;Lucian;The swines will attempt to pass through Monsdor to Grahment.|His Majesty says they will be sorely surprised with what awaits them.

speak;Lucian;We did not reach an agreement.|The Marquess asserts that the Sagemaster is a peaceful dove...|Now, I have operatives on standby to observe their movements.|Now, I best take my leave... Though, Emeline...
speak;Lucian;I am always here for you.
speak;Skill;It appears we need to steel ourselves for a war...|No... exacting holy justice, right your Majesty?
speak;Cornelius;Why the troubled face, Sir Skill?
speak;Skill;If I couldn't protect him...|What use am I...?
speak;Skill;Of course... My troubles are nothing.|Your Majesty... I will stay by your side.
speak;Cornelius;Remember, maintain an iron heart.|Arcei is but a sacrilegious rodent, tarnishing the Goddess's world.
speak;Skill;Couldn't the Goddess have stopped this madness herself?|Allowing for Elias to-
speak;Cornelius;Hold your tongue.|You know she has no corporeal form and cannot obstruct humanity's free will.|Her grace lives through the light, which we must follow.
speak;Skill;I... have to hone my skills...|Farewell, your Majesty.
speak;Cornelius;He appears to have strayed from the Goddess's path.
speak;Emeline;I trust in Sir Skill.|Though, I too find it harder to believe in her every day, Father Cornelius.
speak;Cornelius;Doubt can only cloud your judgement.|I am afraid one who wields the authority you do should not be so blind.
speak;Emeline;You may be right...{c:wait;400} I must ask for your guidance, Father.
speak;Cornelius;My ferver for the Goddess knows no bounds.|I am grateful to share any advice a clergyman could offer.
speak;Cornelius;The Goddess's guiding light requires trials and tribulations.|You must enact holy retribution against those sacrilegious barbarians.|For not only her, but your subjects as well.
speak;Emeline;I have to prove to them I'm not a pushover...{c:wait;300} right?
speak;Cornelius;Yes, lest there be revolts and other havoc!
speak;Emeline;I can do it! Bless you, Father.

name: FightSanjay
_source: speak;Sanjay;I'm the head of this guard, Sanjay!|Desist now, then offer your lives to the Goddess!;;;boss_convo_left

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;After the assassination of Prince Elias, his sister, Emeline, becomes Queen.
narrate;Narrator;She is distraught that Sal evaded her retainer, Skill.
narrate;Narrator;Having encountered a Grahmentian noble, Blazing, Sal escorts him home.
narrate;Narrator;As Grahment and Arcei are on good terms, Sal assumes they will be safe.
narrate;Narrator;But, Sal and her group must make one last push across the Monsdor-Grahment border.
speak;Sal;We're approaching the border, with nary a sound...|Until now...
speak;Blazing;Uhm, I know borders are well protected, but...|It was not like this when I departed...
speak;Sal;I suppose I should tell you, we're kind of in er... Trouble at the moment...
speak;Sal;Prince Elias was murdered by a rogue assassin...
speak;Blazing;You're not going to k-kill me, are you?!
speak;Sal;Hey! We were framed!|I will help you get home, alright?
speak;Blazing;Framed...|W-well, if you wanted to kill me, you'd have already done it...
speak;Blazing;*Gulp*|If this is true, the Goddess must see the truth revealed.|Consider my magic to be yours.|I might be inexperienced, but my power lies in my faith.
speak;Barnabus;Looks like they've fallen into our lap!|At 'em! Show them the might of Monsdor!
speak;Sal;News sure does travel fast, huh?|Well, there's not much we can do but fight!|You can stand back if you wish.
speak;Blazing;As I said, I believe I will be fine.|My light magic will purge through our foes' armor.|Though, I suppose keeping me out of blades' range would be useful...

name: Turn2
_source: speak;Pykroe;Nyaha! We have found a scuffle!
speak;Guy;Oh. Wonderful.|Couldn't we be doing anything else?
speak;Hyper;Let me show my skills! Hyah!
speak;Pykroe;I see a cool looking warrior with an eyepatch!|Is she tackling these vicious foes?|Well, 'tis I who has come to save her!|At a fee... of course.
speak;Guy;Well, at least this time you remembered the coin.|Last time we got zilch, because you forgot to negotiate terms.
speak;Hyper;No! We can't just waltz up and bargain!|We should demonstrate our prowess!|Then let them approach US!
speak;Pykroe;Hyper... that's amazing! Of course!|You two demonstrate our superiority!|Then I can negotiate higher!
speak;Guy;What if they don't? That's just a target on our backs...|What a bother.
speak;Pykroe;Hush, Guy!|I am the boss and I say you fight!|I will barter with their leader, huzzah!
speak;Guy;So much for a quiet afternoon...

name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;We should be home soon, but my gut is telling me this isn't going to be good...
speak;Pykroe;Oh, yes. There villains are much worse then those revenants and the entombed...|But my luck says there will be no fiends beyond!
speak;Pykroe;Foul creatures from a fairytale I once read.|Heroes must always know the classics!
speak;Sal;Right. Either way I don't think luck will help us here...
speak;Sal;Smoke!|You're lucky I didn't impale you right there!
speak;Smoke;Well, I sworda thought you wouldn't slice me!
speak;Smoke;What was that? Sorry, something in my ear...
if;game.check_dead('Pykroe') and game.check_alive('Hyper') and game.get_unit('Hyper').team == 'other' and game.check_alive('Guy') and game.get_unit('Guy').team == 'other'
speak;Hyper;I saw what you did to Monsdor.|Thank you...
speak;Hyper;I was too weak to save my leader from these dogs.|I will fight alongside you, for Pykroe's honour!
speak;Sal;Your help is appreciated.|What are your names?
speak;Sal;I am General Sal of Arcei.|I won't let you two suffer any more to Monsdor.
elif;game.check_dead('Pykroe') and game.check_alive('Hyper') and game.get_unit('Hyper').team == 'player' and game.check_alive('Guy') and game.get_unit('Guy').team == 'other'
speak;Hyper;Sal, I brought along this Guy, Guy.
speak;Guy;Yup, Guy...|Don't expect too much from me.
speak;Sal;I am General Sal of Arcei, nice to meet you.|I'll be lenient on you, given the circumstances.
elif;game.check_dead('Pykroe') and game.check_alive('Hyper') and game.get_unit('Hyper').team == 'other' and game.check_dead('Guy')
speak;Hyper;I saw what you did to Monsdor.|Thank you...
speak;Hyper;I was too weak to save my friends from these dogs.|I will fight alongside you, for Pykroe and Guy!
speak;Sal;Your help is appreciated.|What's your name?
speak;Sal;I am General Sal of Arcei.|I won't let you suffer any more to Monsdor.
speak;Hyper;Thank you, I swear on my sword...{c:wait;400} They will pay!
elif;game.check_dead('Pykroe') and game.check_dead('Hyper') and game.check_alive('Guy') and game.get_unit('Guy').team == 'player'
speak;Guy;Hey, new boss.|Look, I just... can't do this...
speak;Sal;I understand, the loss of your friends...|It's heartbreaking...
speak;Guy;I'm just going to resign myself to the countryside...|Maybe farm, or something...|Not much worth living for these days...
speak;Guy;I won't need my gear anymore, so you can have it.|I've put my stuff in your convoy.
speak;Guy;Just like they said...|Look how that worked out...{c:wait;300} So long.
speak;Zio;It appears you bear the colours of Arcei...
speak;Sal;Huh? Yeah that's so, but I'm afraid I'm in a rush.
speak;Zio;Eek! I'm so sorry!|It's just, you're in Grahment land now and...
speak;Sal;Look, I have urgent business with the Sagemaster. Very urgent.
speak;Zio;Oh my! Well... Go! Go!|I was just... awaiting Marquess Cres's return...
speak;Sal;Marquess Cres? We met in Aurelia, they... helped me escape.
speak;Zio;ACK! Escape?|ESCAPE WHAT?! If they're hurt! NOOOO!
speak;Sal;Strange, I'm well aware of the rulers of Grahment...|But I've never heard of you...
speak;Zio;Well, I despise making public appearances...|I-I wish you luck in whatever business you have with his Majesty! Send my r-regards!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Sal;I'm sorry, your highness.|But your father's orders...
speak;Keith;If he told you to burn yourself alive, would you?
speak;Sal;Look, I'd rather minimise any danger to you...
speak;Keith;If it's an escape route, then it should be empty, right?
speak;Pykroe;Indeed, a foul miscreation!|But how on earth could it be here...|Revenants are born of foul dark magic!
speak;Sal;But... that would be forbidden necromancy!
speak;Sal;But... those are made by forbidden dark magic!
speak;Septimus;Hmph, childs play.|Your secrets are poorly kept.|Prince Keith! Down here, nobody will hear you scream.|Scurry onward, my beautiful creations!
speak;Keith;Man, we need to take that guy out...|But how are we going to reach him?
speak;Sal;These pillars are the key, if we break them, it'll open up a path.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;You! Talk!|What is going on here?
s;Septimus;I am a dying man... What use are words?|Heheheh...
s;Septimus;Oh, why not... for fun.|Monsdor are monsters... real tongue-twister...
speak;Septimus;Maybe... I too will become a... revenant...
speak;Keith;Seems we ignored the sewer stench and critters...
speak;Sal;We should be able to exit around here, this is grossing me out.
speak;Keith;Don't you wanna take this tome first?
speak;Sal;Use dark magic?|It's been so long...
speak;Keith;I'm sure the whole 'evil' magic thing is nonsense.|It's the user who is really good or evil.
speak;Sal;I suppose you're right...|I'll give it a go.
speak;Sal;I didn't want to see... those things again.
speak;Sal;My father fled Aurelia for... dabbling in necromancy.
speak;Keith;And you were accepted here, right?
speak;Sal;Well, not exactly.|He was still hunted down and killed.|Really, I'm not surprised.
speak;Keith;Hm, do they think, or feel, like we do?
speak;Sal;I don't know...|But I don't care to know, just thinking about it...
speak;Sal;Oh! Your father...|I don't think they'd debase his Majesty like that... for now.
speak;Keith;Jav! What did they do to you...?
speak;Snow;Prince Keith! Thankfully you're safe!|His Majesty warped us away... He wishes to take the blame for this!
speak;Keith;No... but he didn't do anything!
speak;Snow;He wishes to keep you safe...
speak;Sal;Uhm, can we move? We need to get Javi somewhere safer, quickly!
speak;Keith;Good idea, we might need to head back to Grahment...|Assuming Monsdor haven't done any damage...

name: overworld example
_source: # This command is necessary to load the overworld tilemap
# The next two commands are self-explanatory. You'll use these to manipulate overworld data.
# Here are examples of overworld animations and sounds.
# Notice that they are the same as the normal tilemap commands.
# Because narration is more involved than dialogue, we need some different commands
# to animate the narration window in.
narrate;Narrator;Eirika and her companions have liberated the border castle.
narrate;Narrator;Alongside Princess Tana of Frelia, they ride to the Frelian Capital.

name: MaxYoungCherryYoungTalk
_source: speak;CherryYoung;H-hey, we're here to help.|Cherry is the name, you'd best remember it...!|Please.
speak;MaxYoung;All right, thanks. Max, by the way.|You can heal right?
speak;CherryYoung;Yes... Fighting is too barbaric...|That's why I leave it to the grunt types, like you.
speak;MaxYoung;Hmph, no need to insult my bearing...|Though, I appreciate having a healer to save our hide...
speak;CherryYoung;Yes, yes, w-well as long as we're rewarded.|Staves don't simply grow on trees!
speak;MaxYoung;W-Wait! I didn't agree to that!|You're probably richer than I am!

name: XeconisYoungSuniiTalk
_source: speak;Sunii;You're trying to help me? Thank you so much, but...|You'd be safer not associating with me...
speak;XeconisYoung;Not like we have much choice now.
speak;Sunii;I have a young girl... I can't die here...|Though, dragging other kids into this...
speak;XeconisYoung;I'll have you know I'm not just a "kid".|Besides, who are these men? Clearly not normal bandits...
speak;Sunii;Please don't ask questions... You're better off not knowing.
speak;XeconisYoung;Is this just because I'm young?|I can handle uncomfortable truths just fine.
speak;Sunii;Just... Go on with what you were doing.
speak;XeconisYoung;I'll finish this for now.|But, I expect to be compensated with information when we're finished.

name: Turn2
_source: speak;Sal;Why are you so late? Did you... Not get enough sleep...?
speak;Maro;Ah! No! Wait... Yes!|I was up late polishing my lance!
speak;Maro;I will not allow my belongings to be subpar!
speak;Maro;A soldier's only as good as his equipment!|That's what my father always said!
speak;Sal;Well then, move out and make him proud!|Though, you'll be disciplined later!
speak;Maro;Sir, yes si- I mean,{c:wait;400} yes ma'am!

name: CSupportMaxMaxime
_source: speak;Max;Well, well. I've finally found you, faker!
speak;Max;The real Max around here!|I keep getting blamed for things I haven't done...|You wouldn't know anything about that, would you?
speak;Maxime;"Real" Max, eh? What accusations are you facing then?
speak;Max;Apparently, I stole an entire barrel of ale, threw up, and left a note apologizing.
speak;Maxime;So, at least you apologized, right?
speak;Max;I like a drink as much as the next guy, but I did NOT do that.
speak;Maxime;...|How's about a pint, hm? That'll smooth this over, right?
speak;Max;So long as you're paying AND you admit that you made that mess.
speak;Maxime;Fine, man you're not gonna let go of that.

name: CSupportAngelBoey
_source: speak;Angel;Ugh, why do I keep running into you?
s;Boey;What? More like why am I running into your gross ass!?|Greasy... do you even bathe?
s;Angel;More than you do, I could smell you from a mile away.
s;Boey;Ahuh, well... Uhm...|Your glasses are stupid!
s;Boey;Gah! Why does it have to be like this?
s;Boey;What do you think? This!|Arguing.{c:wait;400} Just like old times...
s;Angel;Well... I guess we could try being more civilized to each other.
s;Boey;Alright then, catch you later, stanky!

name: BSupportAngelBoey
_source: speak;Angel;Why... hello, Boey!|Pleasant, day, isn't it?
s;Angel;Why, whatever is the matter, Sir?
s;Boey;It's just... Bah!|None of this feels right.
s;Angel;Well, I suppose we don't gotta talk fancy to be kind.
s;Boey;Yeah, like we're the fancy type...
s;Angel;Ahuh. Raised in the Arcein slums...
s;Boey;Ain't that just it.|If the Prince is anything like his pa...
s;Angel;Wouldn't be much good for people like us?
s;Boey;Exactly.|Gutter trash like us wasn't worth his while.
s;Angel;Suppose this army's the best chance we got out.
s;Boey;Ugh, I know.|Working for the royal family...|Makes my beautiful skin crawl...
s;Boey;Seriously, no need to naysay...|Especially when yours is like sandpaper!
s;Boey;Sorry...|Anyways, we gotta make sure we never get stuck there again.|Makes the worst outta ya, I think.|Between death and a bit of dishonour...|You know we have to choose livin'....

name: ASupportAngelBoey
_source: s;Boey;We're lucky to be here, ain't we?
s;Angel;Well, it ain't luck, is it?|We worked our asses off to get here.|In spite of all the shit we faced...
s;Angel;I had to teach myself magic.|If I couldn't cast fire, I'd have frozen in those cold nights.|Or been killed for the clothes on my back.
s;Boey;How'd you even get those books?
s;Angel;Anyway, how'd you get through it all?|You don't seem the resourceful type...
s;Boey;Wow...|You really doubt me, after all we've been through...
s;Angel;I doubt you precisely because of what we've been through.
s;Boey;Hah... Fine... I'll tell you...|I ain't really from the slums.
s;Boey;Yup... I was just bored, to be honest!|Farming is so... ugh.
s;Boey;Look, we've been through a lot together...|I did need you, at the time.
s;Angel;Heh. Guess I needed you too.|Even if you drove me crazy...|It beat livin' a day at a time alone.
s;Boey;After this is over, we're gonna be rich, right?|No more dirty livin' for us!
s;Angel;It'd be nice, but unlikely.|You know how the world works.{c:wait;300} Or at least, you should...
s;Boey;I could always charm the Prince!|He'd be showering me with gifts in no time!

name: CSupportLeapProf
_source: speak;Leap;You've hardly had any time for me recently!|It's upsetting...

name: CSupportEmelinePit
_source: s;Emeline;You seem agitated... Is everything alright?
s;Pit;I'm fine... but why are you checking up on me?
s;Emeline;I have to ensure that you are all in good spirits.
s;Pit;N-No! Of course not!|But, I should probably get to maintaining my equipment...
s;Pit;Uhm, isn't that below your station?|Really... let me clean your sword too!
s;Emeline;Oh! Well... we could chat some other time?
s;Pit;Er, yes! Definitely!|Now I have to... get to those chores!
s;Emeline;Did I say something wrong?|Oh dear...

name: BSupportEmelinePit
_source: s;Pit;Hello, your Majesty! Fine day... right?
s;Emeline;I am not scary... honest!|You have no reason to act so spooked...
s;Pit;W-Well you're the Queen...|You're so much more important than me...|Really, outside of the ginger hair... we don't have much in common...
s;Emeline;I don't know...|You are a younger sibling too, that is something.
s;Pit;I suppose so...|Vee is a greater knight than I could hope to be.
s;Emeline;I could never compare to brother, either...
s;Pit;I'm so sorry... That should never have happened to him...
s;Pit;No! Just it's weird hearing you say such things.|After all, you're the Queen!
s;Emeline;Now, now, there is no need to be so cruel!|I do have feelings too, you boar!
s;Pit;Ah! N-Not that that's a bad thing!|It's how I feel too, sometimes...
s;Emeline;Oh, my apologies...|Though, how do you deal with such feelings towards your sister?

s;Pit;We're twins, so we we always close together... closely compared.|I just trained with the bow.|I can help from the back, since I'm not so gallant.|Not the most helpful advice for a ruler...|You can't afford to just blend in with a force...
s;Emeline;Still, you differentiated yourself from her.
s;Pit;Yeah, I guess you could think about what makes you different.|Something you can do that he couldn't.
s;Emeline;Elias was a paragon at everything...|I don't think there lies any untread waters...
s;Pit;Uhm, there must be something...|Like, I know Vee is great, but even she isn't perfect.
s;Pit;Yeah, she's no good at cleaning, or cooking...|No surprise she didn't aspire to be a housewife...
s;Emeline;I never saw Elias falter at anything...|Anything consequential, at least.|He was a terrible dancer... with two left feet.
s;Emeline;However, the ability of a leader to dance?|I fail to see the significance.
s;Pit;Well... our flaws make us human, right?|I thought you were unapproachable at first...|That made it hard to talk to you...
s;Pit;But, now, I see you clearer.|I prefer you as you... rather than a Queenly mask.
s;Emeline;I will have to think about this more...|Perhaps some time, I ought to dance. Though, maybe alone...|Perish the thought if someone were to see me practicing!
s;Pit;I hope to see you dance someday... in better times.
s;Emeline;Thank you Pit...|Perhaps I'll have to save you a dance when this is over. Take care.
s;Pit;W-Wait, for me? That doesn't make any sense...

name: CSupportEmelineXeconis
_source: s;Xeconis;I have a questions to ask of you, if you don't mind.
s;Xeconis;Well, I wanted to know what meals you like.
s;Xeconis;It's part of my skillset, yes.
s;Emeline;Hard to say...|I suppose my palace life makes things difficult.|I fear my palate may not be suited for... common food.
s;Emeline;Our pantry had every ingredient you could want!|I fear our group may not carry the same variety...
s;Emeline;Are they of high quality?|My stomach is rather finnicky...
s;Xeconis;Naturally, perhaps you should sample these sweets I made.
s;Xeconis;Indeed, getting the honey was a particular challenge.
s;Emeline;I'm impressed! You're a terrific soldier and outdoorsman!|What is your secret?
s;Xeconis;I travelled the continent alone.|You need such skills if you wish to survive.
s;Emeline;Oh, Sir Xeconis...|Well, at least you are not alone any more...
s;Xeconis;I'm aware. Though, I enjoy my moments of solitude as I forage.
s;Xeconis;On occasion, it's nice to clear my head.|Now, tell me what you crave for tomorrows menu.
s;Emeline;I am certain you know best, surprise me, Chef!

name: BSupportEmelineXeconis
_source: s;Emeline;Sir Xeconis, today's breakfast was great!
s;Xeconis;I figured you would enjoy the smoked salmon.|I spear fished for them in the early hours.
s;Xeconis;No need to praise me, it's just what I do.
s;Emeline;Actually, today I have a question for you...|Whyever were you alone in the wilderness?
s;Xeconis;I wanted to go to Aurelia's academy, to study magic.|I journeyed with merchant caravans when I could...|But, most of the time, it was just me.
s;Emeline;Magic? I would not expect that of you...
s;Xeconis;My parents are powerful mages.|I was expected to follow their example.
s;Emeline;Given your current arrangement as a soldier...

s;Xeconis;Yes, evidently things did not transpire as such.|I knew magical theory better than anyone else in my classes.|I studied theory night and day, aced my written exams...|Yet, the ability to cast just...
s;Emeline;Were they disappointed in you? Your parents...

s;Xeconis;I'm unsure, I haven't seen them in years.|Though, I don't particularly care if it bothers them, anymore.|My experiences, good and bad, shaped who I am.|I don't wish to trade that to simply follow a course someone set me.
s;Emeline;It certainly sounds much, much easier...
s;Xeconis;You have troubles with doubt, your Majesty?
s;Emeline;I... Well...|Simply put, I was not supposed to be queen...|Elias should be king... It just isn't right...
s;Xeconis;Things don't always work out as they should.|Adaptability is key in life, change is inevitable.
s;Emeline;I miss my brother... I don't know if that will change...
s;Xeconis;Er... I think it will come to pass.

s;Emeline;I suppose I can trust your opinion on the matter.|Your friend fell at that battle, didn't she...?|Commander Talia the Icicle Blade... cold and resolute.|Much like you, in many ways.|It must not have been easy for you...
s;Xeconis;Feelings are an obstacle to overcome.|I cannot allow myself to be overwhelmed by emotion...|That was a pitiful blunder at the port...|I should have done better.
s;Emeline;I feel much the same... about the day Elias fell...|Though, I still don't know what I can do to win this war...
s;Xeconis;To be frank, I expected greater certainty from you.|You declared war on Arcei, but seem hesitant.
s;Emeline;I should want this war...|Elias deserves to be avenged...
s;Xeconis;Normally I try to trust logic and reason...|But for you... you need to your intuition.
s;Xeconis;Precisely. Sometimes you'll just know when to veer away from expectations.|Only, don't be a contrarian. Sometimes you should trust others' advice...|Like now, perhaps?
s;Emeline;Hehe... You really are confident, Sir Xeconis.|I'll listen to my gut more often.
s;Xeconis;Good, you'll come to trust yourself better.
s;Emeline;O-Oh, my gut is telling me it wants more salmon...

name: CSupportEmelineMax
_source: s;Max;Your Majesty...?|What are you doing out so late?|I'm not one to be a stickler... but this isn't prudent.
s;Emeline;Oh! Sir Max...|I could ask you the same thing!
s;Max;Doing this the hard way? Hah...|Though, I suppose I am being careless too.
s;Emeline;I wasn't joking, state your purpose...
s;Max;I wanted to do some late night magic experimentation.|Though, seeing you here... I was concerned, is all.
s;Emeline;I see...|Well, being candid, I feel... overcome, with feelings...|I came out here to pray my sorrows away.
s;Max;I see... but, out here? You have a perfectly cozy tent.
s;Emeline;The stars in the night sky remind me of him.|My brother was a light in the darkness.
s;Max;His passing must be have been difficult for you...|I can't claim to know how you feel... but, I hope I can help.
s;Emeline;I'm not sure if there is anything you could do...|Though, I have solace that he is with the Goddess... In a better place.
s;Max;It's just, a better place?|I disagree. His Highness should be here, with you.|Where would be better than surrounded by friends and family?
s;Emeline;The Goddess will take care of his soul...|Better than any family would...
s;Max;If she does exist, she is awfully cruel.|Tormenting your soul like this...
s;Emeline;Sir Max, you ought to be careful...|You might incur misfortune upon yourself!|Or, at minimum, a scolding from Archbishop Cornelius...
s;Max;She can smite me down if she wishes.|I just hate to see you so down and alone...
s;Emeline;I think... I'd rather be by myself, for now.
s;Max;Ah... my apologies for intruding, your Majesty.
s;Emeline;Is he right...?|Am I tainted? Unworthy of the Goddess's love?

name: BSupportEmelineMax
_source: s;Emeline;Sir Max?|You were waiting here for me?
s;Max;I wished to clarify my stance the other day.
s;Emeline;However, I have to place my faith in the Goddess.|If not, what do I have to trust?|Following brother's passing, I had nothing to believe in...
s;Emeline;I assume you rejected the Goddess due to a lack of faith...|Was your past troubled?
s;Max;My past? Ha! That's nothing, especially compared to your life.|Even Xeconis... others have had it way worse than I did.|Besides, I'm not entireless faithless.
s;Max;I believe in my friends, my fellow people...
s;Emeline;But... other people are so ordinary.|The Goddess is a paragon of beauty and kindness!

s;Max;At least I can be certain they exist, right?|I think it best to spend my energy on those around me.|I understand why people believe in a higher power, really...|Still, I can't help but remain skeptical.
s;Emeline;She has to exist... what of the dead?|The Goddess houses those who have fallen for us...|Their lives laid the foundation of the present...|We have to fulfill their wishes!
s;Max;You can respect their wishes without torturing yourself, your Majesty.|You don't deserve all this stress.
s;Max;This... is what's keeping you awake at night, isn't it?|The memories of your brother...
s;Emeline;I see him when I close my eyes...|I do not know what to do but pray... for his peace.|I hoped that you could relate... staying up so late.
s;Max;I just like to study up at night, less intrusions that way.

s;Max;Baha! No need to overcomplicate things.|Much like what you've taught me, faith is nebulous... but powerful.|A thing I couldn't feel, merely placing myself at arms length.|If belief in the Goddess grants you inner power...|Who am I to say anything?
s;Emeline;I suppose it is entirely up to me...
s;Max;You've opened your heart to Goddess, as I have my friends.|I believe in them to do the right thing...|That includes you, if you'd consider me a friend.
s;Max;Well, it isn't a foreign concept to you, right?|The Archbishop and Lord Lucian believe in you.
s;Max;If you need convincing of your worth, I'll do it.|I'll chronicle all the reasons you are worthy of my praise.|Perhaps over some nice tea?
s;Emeline;I... Well, I suppose I could spare you some time...
s;Max;I believe in you greater than the Goddess herself...|Now, do get some rest, your Majesty...|May I escort you back to camp?
s;Emeline;Of course... just allow me to finish my prayers!
s;Emeline;I believe in you too, Sir Max...|Though, Goddess... he didn't mean all that, really...

name: SkillYoungEffYoungTalk
_source: speak;EffYoung;A soldier in blue? Might you be from the Kingdom...?
speak;SkillYoung;Of course! You must know of my name... Skill Draqon!|Of the glorious Draqon household!
speak;EffYoung;I am afraid to say I've heard of neither you, nor your house...
speak;SkillYoung;Bah! Who might you be anyway to besmirch the great Draqons?
speak;EffYoung;How rude of me, the name's Eff R. Vescence.|Younger brother of Oberon Vescence, charmed to meet you.
speak;SkillYoung;...|There isn't a soul in Aurelia who hasn't heard the tales of Oberon in battle...|Though I had not heard of a third brother...
speak;EffYoung;I'm still inexperienced, but I will devote myself to the people.|Using any force, physical or mental, necessary to vanquish threats.
speak;SkillYoung;If only- No, excuse me...|But do remember my name, it will cross the lips of every Aurelian soon!
speak;EffYoung;What a curious thing...|Best hope he steels his heart, lest he lose himself to the nobles' game.

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Sal defeats the Rizan bandits and promptly advances to Aurelia.
narrate;Narrator;Reminded of her past, Sal is concerned about returning home.
narrate;Narrator;Prince Elias is ready to guide Aurelia to a brighter future.
narrate;Narrator;Though, things are about to take a turn for the worse...
speak;Sal;Seems like the streets are quiet...|The coronation serves as a time of reflection.|Though, I am not glad to be back...
speak;Roag;How BORING! They should be celeberatin' right now, girl!
speak;Sal;Ah, Aurelia...|I am not glad to be back...
speak;Nako;Oh! But, I find this cultural event to be exciting!|I can hardly wait!
speak;SoldierBlue;Halt!|You are the envoy of the Sagemaster, correct?
speak;Sal;General Sal of Arcei, here in his stead.
speak;SoldierBlue;Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.|Also, I'm afraid only one of you may enter...|It's tradition to only have one representative at the coronation.
speak;Roag;Well, Sally! We'll wait for ya.
speak;Nako;I wish I could see it with my own eyes...|Oh well, wish the Prince... no, the King, my regards!
speak;SoldierBlue;Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.
speak;Sal;Oh I see...|Well, I best hurry!
music;TGAA ~ Court is Now in Session
speak;Cres;Why, you must be the representative of the Sagemaster?|I seem to recall you... General Sal?
speak;Sal;Well, yes...|Marquess Cres, right? I remember you visiting from Grahment before.
speak;Cres;That's right. It is so nice to see you, I trust he is well?
speak;Sal;Not such, his illness is worsening.|Hence my being here in his place.
speak;Sal;Thanks you, Marquess Cres.|Er, when does this whole thing start?
speak;Cres;Very soon! Were you any later, it would have been rather... faux pas.
speak;Sal;You can blame his Majesty's directions on that...|Oh! It's beginning!

speak;Jeremiah;Thank you emissaries from our fellow countries.|I am touched to see the solidarity in watching a new dawn for Aurelia.|The Goddess, our divine creator, has blessed the royal lineage for centuries...|Now it is time for his Highness, Prince Elias, to spread her grace!

speak;Elias;Thank you, Archbishop Jeremiah, and everyone else in attendence.|I may be young, but I have inherited my father's goal for this country's prosperity.|Beyond that, I pray that we may all have fruitful relations across the Goddess's lands.|My vow to you all... is an era of prosperity!
speak;Jeremiah;Now... I raise this crown to you.|Are you ready to solemnly devote your life to the Goddess and her country?
speak;KingSlayer;Heheheha! Take this, Aurelian scum!|For the Sagemaster!
speak;Jeremiah;Goddess, save his soul! I beg of you...
speak;Argento;How could I let this happen...?|Your Highness... forgive me...
speak;EliasDead;It'll be okay... Emmie.|Even if I'm not here... You can do it...
speak;EliasDead;Argento, help her...|The light... I see it...
speak;Argento;It will be done... I will carve a path to our salvation... I promise.
speak;Jeremiah;What manner of demon would cause this...|Did he not say... "Sagemaster"?
speak;Sal;This must be some sort of ruse?! He would never!
speak;Oberon;So, you better explain yourself.|Before you pay in blood.
speak;Jevil;What manner of chaos did you wish to cause?
speak;Sal;Now, now... Let's not be hasty.
speak;Cres;I agree, but they're not thinking straight.|Seek passage to Grahment, I'll try and smoothe this heat over for you.|The Sagemaster I know would never organise this kind of hit job...
speak;Lucian;Do not worry Emeline, I will handle this.|Knights, after her!
speak;Esteban;As you wish, her head on a platter for your Highness.|Uh... Sir Skill, you look lost.
speak;Skill;I failed... My oath...|Princess Emeline, I will make it up to you...|I will deliver her head on a pike for you!|I will toil every day to rectify this shame... I SWEAR IT!
speak;Cornelius;Your sins will follow you wherever you flee.|The Goddess's will shall see you to damnation.

name: EscapeSal
_source: speak;Sal;Whew... Now that everyone is here, let's hurry up!

name: FightSkill
_source: speak;Skill;I've made a great error today...;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Skill;I will tear out your entrails!;;;boss_convo_left

name: SkillSal
_source: speak;Skill;I knew I recognised you! Vile TRAITOR!;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Skill?! Could you listen for a moment?;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Skill;I should have known, what with your foul necromancer father.|You are a stain on Aurelia's legacy.;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Why would the Sagemaster put this into motion?|You must see reason, surely...;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Skill;Reason?|All I have is a reason to slit your throat!;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Now I remember why I was glad to leave...;;;boss_convo_right

name: DeathCherryY
_source: speak;CherryYoung;AH!|You brute... I'm going to fall back...

name: DeathSkillY
_source: speak;SkillYoung;No... NO! ARGH!|I'll get you back next time...

name: LevelUpQuoteGeneric
_source: if;any(DB.classes.get(unit.klass).max_stats.get(stat_nid) <= unit.stats[stat_nid] for stat_nid in unit.stats) and sum(stat_changes.values())== 0

name: FightEsteban
_source: speak;Esteban;Make this easy for me, eh?|Yeah, stay right... there.{br}Yup, thanks.;;;boss_convo_left

name: SalPykroeTalk
_source: speak;Pykroe;Who, me? It is I, Pykroe, fortune's favourite!
speak;Sal;Yes, right. I see you're fighting the Monsdor guard, why?
speak;Pykroe;Luck has brought me here!|Why else?|It seems you and I were destined to meet!
speak;Sal;Destined? Anwyay, how would you like to help us?
speak;Pykroe;Me and my crew are mercenaries!|We'll help you... at a price! Nyaha!
speak;Sal;I promise we can reward you very nicely, so long as you trust me.
speak;Sal;Welcome aboard. I am Sal, commander of Arcei.
speak;Pykroe;Well, Arcein general, bear witness to my divine luck! Haha!
speak;Pykroe;Who, me? It is I, Pykroe, fortune's favourite!|Or, was, until I lost my friend, Hyper...
speak;Sal;I'm sorry we couldn't help... They were killed by the Monsdor guard, why?
speak;Pykroe;Luck works in mysterious ways...|Though, it seems you and I were destined to meet!
speak;Sal;Destined? Anwyay, how would you like to help us?
speak;Pykroe;We may not be a group of three anymore...|But Guy, he might lend a hand! If he feels like it...
speak;Sal;Good, I promise we can reward you very nicely, so long as you trust me.

name: SalGuyTalk
_source: speak;Guy;Guy. Cavalier. I'll work no more or less than's needed.
speak;Sal;Keeping it simple, I like it.
speak;Guy;Thank you, finally... someone who gets me.|Those two live to fight, I fight to live, but they at least keep things interesting.
speak;Sal;I see.|Anyway, I hope you're comfortable in this army.
speak;Guy;It's fine. Well, not fine. But...|That's life... I guess.|Guy, by the way.
speak;Guy;The boss is still here, at least.|Make sure they make it at least...
speak;Guy;They'd want us to stay.|Relying on luck... why, Pyk?|Though, at least Hyper's here...
speak;Guy;Just, give me time. Oh, er, also... Guy. That's my name.
speak;Sal;Guy, I promise to keep you safe!

name: SalHyperTalk
_source: speak;Hyper;Hello new boss!|I see you fight with the sword too!|Oh! Hyper is my name!
speak;Sal;Sure do, Hyper. Believe me, you don't become a commander without the skill.
speak;Hyper;Spar with me!|I must test my swordcraft against a greater opponent!
speak;Sal;How about you stick to fighting the enemies?|I'll consider it later.
speak;Hyper;Guy... He was a good man...|I must have them pay, all of them!
speak;Sal;I'll see it done for you.
speak;Hyper;No! I must do it!|I have to avenge my friend!|GAH! I WILL HAVE YOUR HEADS!
speak;Sal;Is there anything I can do for you?
speak;Hyper;Yeah! Stay out of my way.|I won't let anyone else dish out revenge!|I have to get rid... of this burning inside me...
speak;Sal;Is there anything I can do to ease things...?
speak;Hyper;No.|I'll just...{br}Argh! I'll kill them, ALL OF THEM!
speak;Hyper;No! Stand back!|I have to do this! FEEL MY RAGE!
speak;Hyper;I am... too weak...|I couldn't stop it...
speak;Sal;Our enemies are strong, if there's anything I can do to help...
speak;Hyper;I might be too weak...|But... Please, massacre them all... ALL OF THEM!|I have to right these wrongs, AAARGH!

name: SalHyperTalkOther
_source: speak;Hyper;Stop|I don't work for Monsdor, they are demons...|They'll pay!
speak;Hyper;I was too weak to save my leader from these dogs.|Monsdor will pay with blood!|I will fight alongside you, for Pykroe's honour!
speak;Sal;Your help is appreciated.|What's your name?
speak;Sal;My condolences Hyper.|General Sal of Arcei.|I won't let you suffer any more.

name: HyperGuyTalkOther
_source: speak;Guy;You found a new boss? Harsh...
speak;Hyper;I was too weak to save Pyk!|I have to make Monsdor pay for what they did.|Savages, the lot of them!
speak;Guy;I'm not much for revenge...|Or much at the moment...

name: DeathLeap
_source: speak;Leap;N-no... How could this happen... Prof...

name: FightBarnabus
_source: speak;Barnabus;None shall make a fool of Monsdor's border guards!;;;boss_convo_left

name: CSupportMaxDark
_source: speak;Max;Oh, how can I help you, Dark?
speak;Dark;You're a strong mage, right?|Teach me everything you know!
speak;Max;Everything? We would be sat here a while...
speak;Dark;I can wait!|Unless you're too chicken?|Bwawk! Bwawk!
speak;Max;Very eager, that's what I like to hear!|I think to start... here is my favourite magical textbook!|That helped me with the fundamentals.
speak;Dark;What?! But there's so many pages!|And it's as heavy as a steel blade!
speak;Max;You're not going chicken over some paper, are you?
speak;Dark;No way! I'll be WAY better than you at magic, Mr. Smarty-Pants!
speak;Max;If that's so, then I'm sure you'll have no problem reporting back tomorrow.
speak;Dark;Huh? You're not going to help me?!
speak;Max;Magic is intriguing and varied. Different casters might interpret things uniquely.|I wouldn't want to cloud your own judgement.
speak;Max;Well, I must be going. Important discoveries await me!|Good luck! Remember, the power is yours to guide.
speak;Dark;I have to guide it myself? Urgh, I don't even know where to start!

name: BSupportMaxDark
_source: speak;Max;Dark, how are you doing?|Was that book a good read?
speak;Max;Please, don't pout at me like that...
speak;Max;Look, I know it's a challenge, but...
speak;Max;Dark, I know it can't have been that bad...
speak;Max;Is that so...|You think I've never struggled with this?
speak;Dark;Well, obviously...|You're good at this, I'm not...
speak;Max;Hah!|Believe me, I've spent many a sleepless night training...|Often with tiny, incremental gains...
speak;Max;Time. You're still young, so...|Don't beat yourself up over this, please.
speak;Dark;It's just so hard...|The teachers at the orphanage would never listen to me...|So I'm just...
speak;Max;Do you know if your parents were mages?|I'm sorry if it's a delicate subject...
speak;Max;We don't have to talk about it-
speak;Dark;They're dead to me, but yes.
speak;Max;...|You know, how about we skip studying for today.|We could play a board game, or something?
speak;Dark;Sure, but don't be surprised when I win!
speak;Max;That's what I like to hear!

name: ASupportMaxDark
_source: speak;Max;Hm... I suppose I could try that...
speak;Max;Oh, hello Dark!|You're in better spirits today.
speak;Dark;I am!|I suppose after playing those games with you...|I felt less bad about my magic training...
speak;Max;Then, you found you could actually cast better, right?
speak;Dark;How did you know what I was gonna say?|Are you a mind-reader...?
speak;Max;A lot of magical skill is in the head.|Your doubts were, ironically, what caused your mishaps.
speak;Dark;So, you let me win at chess...
speak;Dark;Wait...{c:wait;400} You were trying to win?
speak;Dark;You're a better teacher than at the orphanage.|They would never think of something like that.
speak;Dark;Sure, let me guess... my parents?
speak;Dark;They always put me and my siblings in competition.|Which of us would be the best at magic...|They would never smile at me, 'cos I was worst.
speak;Dark;So, I ran away...|I can't say the orphanage is cosier than home...|But, at least the caretakers treat us equally.
speak;Max;Well, your siblings may have been harsh...|But, I don't think it was all their fault...
speak;Dark;I know, I don't blame them.|But, would be nice to have a sibling who doesn't hate my guts...
speak;Max;Maybe, you could think of me as a big brother?
speak;Dark;That works...|Now, which game do you want to lose at today?
speak;Max;None, if I can help it!

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Sal defends Prince Keith from a Monsdorian advance.
narrate;Narrator;Though they ought to return home, to Castle Nordz...
speak;???;Wa... up...|Are ... list...?|Pr... Kei...|Prince Keith...|PRINCE KEITH!
speak;Sal;Doesn't want to go to bed, doesn't want to wake up.|There's no pleasing you, is there?
speak;Keith;Okay, okay. Look. I'm ready! Honest!
speak;Sal;Alright, well, seems like most of the others have gone ahead.
speak;Sal;Alright, well, I've been ready for too long.
speak;Sal;Because you overslept for three hours!|I tried to wake you, but nothing!
speak;Keith;Wait, you've been trying for THREE HOURS?

speak;Sal;Well, I gave up at thirty minutes.|Browsed the local vendors, had breakfast.|Tried my hand at fishing, failed at fishing...|{c:expression;Sal;CloseEyes}Apologised to the villagers for causing a scene after breaking my rod...|{c:expression;Sal;NormalBlink}Anyway, the point is...{c:wait;400} THREE HOURS!
speak;Keith;Okay, okay.|Look I'll just check in with whoever's here, and we'll leave together, okay?
speak;Sagemaster;Son! You're back! I'm so thankful you're safe...|I'm feeling well... *COUGH*.|...|Ok, I've felt better...
speak;Sal;I'm sure that you know of the affairs in Aurelia.
speak;Sagemaster;It is very concerning, but please...|You have to believe me, I would never-
speak;Sal;I would never believe you'd order such a thing.
speak;Keith;Duh! Everyone's so dumb!|Pops wouldn't hurt a fly!
speak;Sagemaster;Still, the stained reputation...|I wonder how this was orchestrated...|And by whom...
speak;Sal;Indeed, none of our envoy could have been in on it.|It wouldn't escape my eye.
speak;Keith;Uh, well what's the point in speculating if we don't have all the details?
speak;Sagemaster;We need anything, otherwise we're facing a major crisis...|My personal theory is Monsdor.|They stand to gain a lot from currying favour with Aurelia.
speak;Sal;A country with a proud military force...|But lacklustre resources and agriculture...|They also have much to gain from sanctioned violence against us!
speak;Keith;Like I said, fellows. Speculation.|C'mon dad... I'm back! Lighten the mood!
speak;Sagemaster;I'll... think of something.|Once... the dizziness... goes...
speak;Sagemaster;It'll pass.|Why don't you have a wander around, get to know your new allies better?|Sal has done well to procure a strong force...
speak;Sagemaster;He'll have to learn...|But let's hope it doesn't come to that...

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Sal manages to pass by the Monsdor-Grahment border.
narrate;Narrator;Viscount Zio allows the group passage into Moonglade.
narrate;Narrator;With the sun setting, she searches for the nearest inn.
narrate;Narrator;In a twist of fate, Sal is about to be incredibly surprised...
speak;Sal;Whew... A town.|A place to catch some rest, finally!
speak;Sal;Ok, time to get some rooms...
speak;Maxime;Is that what we're calling it, mhm?|Just admit you're bad at the game!
speak;Keith;No WAY! These cards...{c:wait;200} They're rigged!{c:wait;400} Or something...|Hah... Hahahaha!|You're right good fellow, I was being silly!|I forgot the rules!
speak;Maxime;Wh-Whahahaha!|You're an interesting one! But time for me to turn in for the night.|Maybe we'll meet again and I'll fleece you for more of your money!
speak;Keith;Ah, have a good one, sir!
speak;Keith;Woah! Sal! That's crazy!|Crazy... wait, why are you here?
speak;Sal;We had to attend the Aurelian coronation in place of your father, due to his health.|A job that SHOULD have been yours.
speak;Keith;Well, he's still kicking.|You're still alive,{c:wait;200} what's the fuss?
speak;Sal;The prince being assassinated was a fuss! With fingers pointed at Arcei...|Uh, who is your friend here?
speak;Maxime;A prince, huh?{c:wait;400} Suppose that makes sense...|Ah, forgive me ma'am. Maxime, a humble traveller.|Look, I won't pry into your... complicated affairs.|Good night, my lady.
speak;Sal;The assassin praised King Keith in his last breath...
speak;Keith;Man, those guys are not too bright are they?|Any hired blade can just lie...
speak;Sal;Precisely. But in our escape we may have uh...|Made things... worse.|I wasn't going to let myself die there...
speak;Keith;Never one for words over clashing of blades, were you Sal? Ha!|Oh well! Time to hit the hay and be off to a nicer place tomorrow!
speak;Sal;You don't sound too bothered, but we must make haste home.|We need to plan a course of action, this is war.
speak;Keith;Ugh, so stupid. The old man can handle it!
speak;Sal;You're the prince, and your father's sole heir no less!|You have to take some responsibility!
speak;Sal;Fine... Then I'll plan our course for tomorrow and we can part ways...|Now, sleep, your Highness.
speak;Keith;Wahoo! See Sal, you get it!|See you sometime!
speak;Sal;Hm, I hear shouting outside. Someone fetch his Highness in case...
speak;Sal;They're persistent, it would be admirable if it weren't us they were after.
speak;Keith;Buzz off already! This whole charade is foolish!
speak;Byron;Well, well. Prince Keith himself is here!|No doubt in kahoots with this plot.
speak;Keith;Ugh... This is all so stupid!|I had no such involvement!
speak;Byron;Likely story! Why else would you be hiding away here?
speak;Sal;I'm steadfast by your side, your Highness.|They won't listen to reason, but they might listen to our might.
speak;Keith;Ah, good show, Sal. You can handle this fine, hm?
speak;Sal;But..! Hmph, the audacity!|I implore you to help us, your Highness.
speak;Keith;Ehhh... If I feel like it...|This is all such a moodkiller, y'know?|Also, don't take that tone with me, you're only a knight, you know?
speak;Byron;So nonchalant! You will feel our fury, Arcein mutt!
speak;Sal;I won't brook any insults to the prince!|Have at you!
speak;Keith;So it's fine when she does it...

name: Old Pals
_source: speak;Keith;Hah! Smoke, Landros, Aerial! How's it going?
speak;Smoke;Hey! Your Highness, give us some SAGE advice!
speak;Keith;Uh, well...{c:wait;400} Something I learned recently was...|ALWAYS CHECK THE RULES OF THE CARD GAME YOU'RE PLAYING!
speak;Landros;Don't tell me you lost a lot of money.
speak;Keith;Uhm, alright! I won't!|My mouth? Shut!
speak;Aerial;It's okay your Highness, I'm sure I can win it back.
speak;Smoke;His skills will DEAL some serious damage to anyone's wallets!
speak;Landros;That was a stretch and you know it.
speak;Aerial;C'mon guys. A little less bickering in front of the prince.
speak;Aerial;You could stay with us, come back home?
speak;Smoke;Hello? We're looking for an Anne, Sir.
speak;Landros;I think his silence is the answer, but why?

speak;Keith;Travelling far and wide, meeting new people...|Seeing what the world has to offer...|If I go home, I'm sure I'll have to do boring strategy stuff with father.|I just don't want to end up stuck in the castle, watching him... get worse...
speak;Aerial;Well, given things might be getting lively soon...|You might be needed to travel some more on his behalf.|Also, you would'a been sent to Aurelia... had you been home.
speak;Smoke;Good, also you can lean on us, your Highness.|If you need to...

name: Pretty in Pink
_source: speak;Pikno;Ah!{c:wait;600} Oh, Roag. I'm just training.
speak;Pikno;Well... Normally it means nobody's watching me.
speak;Pikno;Well... I'd rather not feel self conscious.|Such feelings are a hinderance to my routine...
speak;Roag;Girl, I know I'd train in front of everyone!|Show 'em that I am FABULOUS!
speak;Pikno;I wish I had your confidence...
speak;Roag;Oops... I didn't mean to make ya feel worse...|But, I know that you can slay the day away!|You should train with me next time!|I'll take any unwanted attention away from you!
speak;Pikno;Heh, I guess I could do that.
speak;Roag;We can be... the Pink Protectors! Yasss!
speak;Pikno;Sounds good to me. Thank you, Roag.

name: InnSal
_source: speak;Sal;Ah, you! Could you give us a hand?
speak;Maxime;Huh? Mademoiselle, I'm afraid I don't work for nothing.|Plus I really need my... *yawn* beauty sleep...
speak;Sal;Come on, our lord foreited a lot of money to you earlier.
speak;Maxime;His error, no?|Though if this will take that frown off your pretty face-
speak;Maxime;Just take this, it's good for playing dirty...
speak;Maxime;Now if you don't mind, I'd love to go back to bed, ta-ta!

name: Inn
_source: speak;Maxime;What's with all the... noise...|A fight? No thanks, I want no part of it.|Bye...

name: House1
_source: speak;OldMan1;Damn Monsdorians...|Back in my day, riding a wyvern was tacky!|What is the world coming to...|Take this, it'll make mince meat of them lizard-brains!

name: House2
_source: speak;Woman1;Oh, you look kind... But young...|Experience is your friend, here! I'll teach you stuff!

name: Turn4
_source: speak;Bandit1;Guffah! Time ta loot in the darkness of night!
speak;Bandit2;Guffah! Time ta steal rum in the darkness of night!
speak;Bandit1;Guffah! Time ta drink 'til we forget...
speak;Frost;Can you let me go now?
speak;Bandit1;Silence wench!|You'll be worth a pretty penny.
speak;Bandit2;Guffah! I'm sure one of them noble types would pay a boatload for an Arborstian wife!|You types are hard to pin down, after all!
speak;Frost;I don't want any of this!|Help! Anyone!
speak;Bandit1;Shut yer trap!|If you don't, I'll jus' kill ya!
speak;Sal;Eugh... More trouble to worry about...

speak;Sages;I wouldn't be so pessimistic.|Those bandits might cause more trouble for those ambushers too.|Plus, they seem to have kidnapped a fine maiden! How putrid!|We must save her, lest Monsdor get to her first.
speak;Sal;Hm, how perceptive of you.|I suppose we have to pick our battles well.
speak;Sages;How kind of you to say Sal!|It's cooler when you're not on my case...
speak;Sages;Now I wish those bandits were kidnapping me instead...

name: Turn3
_source: speak;Sages;You seem to be having trouble, oh strong general!
speak;Sal;Your Highness, what are you doing?
speak;Sages;I suppose I should lend my aid.|Frankly, I grow bored of watching this mess.

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Slim Sword,Iron Lance,Slim Lance,Iron Axe,Iron Bow,Bronze_Dagger,Iron Dagger;armory

name: FrostyChilled
_source: if;len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'Chilled']) > 2
if;len([skill for skill in unit2.skills if skill.nid == 'Chilled']) > 2

name: BattleByron
_source: speak;Byron;I was hired to enact justice.|May as well have fun with it too!;;;boss_convo_left

name: ByronKeith
_source: speak;Byron;Here's the man of the hour.;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Byron;Your lack of awareness speaks volumes as to Arcei's idiocy.|Of course your kind would ruin everything.;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Keith;The only thing I'm going to ruin, is your face!{c:wait;200} Ha!;;;boss_convo_right

name: Turn6
_source: speak;Byron;Enough standing back, I'll have to show you real pain myself!

name: FrostReleased
_source: speak;Frost;Oh my! Thank you so much!
speak;Sal;We're in a predicament here, could you lend us a hand?
speak;Frost;Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured.
speak;Sal;Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
speak;Frost;Frost, a pleasure to meet you, Sal.|I will lend Arcei my aid for the time being.
speak;Frost;Oh my! Thank you so much!
speak;Keith;Of course, fair maiden!|A true noble always offers his aid to one as sweet as thee!
speak;Sal;Forgive my Lords... quirks.|We need help right now, so could you return us the favour, please?
speak;Frost;Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured!
speak;Sal;Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
speak;Keith;And I, Keith, prince of Arcei.
speak;Frost;Wow, a real life prince... I am Frost, glad to offer my aid.
speak;Sal;Sh! A pleasure to have you, Frost.
speak;Frost;Oh my! Thank you so much!
speak;SoldierRed;Of course, Ma'am.|Could you help our army fight these violent fugitives?
speak;Frost;I can't fight, but I will help heal your injured.

name: Turn9
_source: speak;Sal;Seems they're giving up! Good work team!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Sal;We made it out the other side, at last.|Now we can sleep...
speak;Keith;Sleep? I'm so pumped, I'm not even tired!
speak;Sal;I trust that when we wake, you'll travel with us home?
speak;Keith;I'd face all this harassment alone otherwise.|So, what choice do I really have?
speak;Sal;Good, your father will be relieved.
speak;Keith;It'll be nice to see him again!
speak;Frost;What of me?|I am far from home and... I do wish to help you.|I can sense you have pure intentions...
speak;Keith;Ah! Fair maiden of flowers!|Do come with us, you'll be able to witness the grandeur of castle Nordz!
speak;Sal;Far from home, where would that be?
speak;Frost;Arborst, we don't often leave or let in outsiders...|I wanted to see the outside world...|Is it always so violent?
speak;Sal;I'm afraid your isolated forests tranquility is not the norm...
speak;Keith;Indeed in this world there is a mixture of good and bad people.|It's just up to you to discern which the people you meet are!
speak;Frost;I just... don't wish to go through that again...|Those thugs were so cruel...
speak;Sal;We'll keep you safe, I promise.
speak;Smoke;Knight-knight?|I'm more of a thief actually...
speak;Sal;Please don't support this madness, Milord...
speak;Smoke;I have royal approval, I'll do whatever I please!
speak;Smoke;Er, I'll just sleep instead... Toodles!
speak;Frost;I forsee troubles in your path ahead...
speak;Frost;I don't think times will get much easier for a while...|I... We Arborstians have great magical power, that's why we don't often mingle outside.|I often have premonitions of the future...
speak;Keith;Cool! Can you tell me what cards my opponent will have in the future?
speak;Frost;Sadly, I can't choose.|It just overtakes me, my mind, sees it...
speak;Frost;Not always, I see a lot of blood...
speak;Keith;...|Is any of it your own?|Oh dear, did you see yourself DIE?
speak;Frost;Not yet, but I fear for when I do.|It makes everything seem so pointless...
speak;Keith;I'm here to listen to your troubles, whenever you wish.
speak;Keith;Now, best I hit the hay before Sal lectures me!|Night!
speak;Keith;Best I hit the hay before Sal lectures me...

name: Wandering Maidens
_source: speak;Frost;Oh, Milord Keith!|What a pleasant surprise!
speak;Keith;Hello, fair maidens from foreign lands!
speak;Hyper;Oh, it's Mr. Fancy-Pants!|You gonna stand there? Or train with me?
speak;Hyper;Why not?! Underestimating me, 'cus I'm a girl?|I'm way stronger than I look!
speak;Keith;No, of course not!|I didn't want to damage your lovely face!
speak;Hyper;Erm... Lovely... face?|Stop kiddin' around!|I've got my sword on me, AND I WILL USE IT!
speak;Frost;Please, Hyper.|Remember, we were here to be *calm*.
speak;Hyper;Dammit!|I was just getting into your meditation gig...
speak;Frost;Of course...|Close your eyes, and breathe deeply. No talking!
speak;Frost;I think it'll blow over.|She's happy one minute, angry the next.|Don't take it personally.
speak;Keith;I'll have to make it up to you both somehow...
speak;Frost;It's all okay...|Though I might need some space while I continue to meditate...

name: Pristine Pike
_source: speak;Maro;Hm... yup.|This will do...|Yeah, yeah! This is awesome!

name: Fiery Family
_source: speak;Blazing;Oh, thank you for accompanying me home!
speak;Sal;A pleasure, I'm glad we could work together, Blazing.
speak;Keith;I trust we will meet the Earl?
speak;Ignatius;Ah! Blazing, how is my boy?
speak;Blazing;Very well, father!|I may not have seen the festival, but I managed to meet new friends!
speak;Ignatius;And that would be... You two?|Oh! P-Prince Keith?!
speak;Sal;And I, Sal, his loyal knight.
speak;Ignatius;How rude of me not to introduce myself.|Earl Ignatius Phyron, glad to be acquainted.|I thank you both for my son's safety.
speak;Sal;I assume you've heard of current events...
speak;Ignatius;Indeed, the acts committed were an insult to the Goddess.|Though, I do not believe it to be the work of Arcei.
speak;Keith;I understand being shrewd, after all, Grahment is hardly unified, right?
speak;Ignatius;Exactly, Duke Hogarth von Ilkrest is most vocal in opposition.|While Viscount Zio is in support.
speak;Sal;The Duke didn't go himself?|Is he not the most powerful noble in Grahment?
speak;Ignatius;He had his own business to attend to, so it fell on the Marquess.|Who I don't believe has returned yet...
speak;Sal;Is it possible Aurelia did something to Marquess Cres?
speak;Ignatius;Either way, I am reluctant to take sides as of current.|We haven't much to spare at the moment.|Though given you guided my son home... I trust your morality.
speak;Blazing;Please Father, allow me to travel with them!|I must uncover the truth myself!
speak;Ignatius;I raised a young man, with flickering conviction...|It's almost bringing a tear to my eyes...
speak;Keith;We will protect him with our lives, trust us.
speak;Ignatius;I cannot allow you to leave empty handed.|Since Blazing is your companion now, this is for you, son.
speak;Ignatius;Sadly not.|I'm afraid your old man hasn't given up yet.|I'll need it to defend our realm, should worse come to us.
speak;Blazing;Aww... But, I understand.|I will become responsible enough for it, one day.
speak;Keith;Thank you, Earl Phyron, for your kind-of support.

speak;Ignatius;Of course, I know the ramifications of my son aiding you...|So be it, I trust my family, always.|I bid you safe travels.|You might need it, with how those bloodhound Monsdorians operate.

name: TalkJaviMaro
_source: speak;Keith;Javi, still hard at work, I see.
speak;Javi;Hah! Of course!|I was training these rookies to my standards!
speak;Maro;He's been putting us through the ringer, but it's all dandy!
speak;Keith;At least you're encouraging, my friend.
speak;Javi;Of course!|We can't fend off Aurelians without adequate morale!|A happy team is a strong team, I'm sure you know.

name: TalkNako
_source: speak;Nako;Ah, Prince Keith, you've come to pay me a visit?|I'm just watching the training in case someone gets hurt.
speak;Keith;How caring, you really are Arcei's greatest servant.|I just wanted to say thanks.
speak;Nako;Oh! Thank you!|It's... embarassing seeing you all grown up.|Makes me feel so old...
speak;Keith;Oh, don't be silly!|You're the picture of youth!
speak;Nako;Heehee, words really are as powerful as weapons sometimes...
speak;Keith;One's charisma is important.|Saying the wrong thing almost got me killed, numerous times...
speak;Nako;And at least half of those times was Sal!

name: TalkSnow
_source: speak;Snow;Ah, Prince Keith! You finally returned!
speak;Keith;Hey, Snow.|You've been researching treatments for pops, right?
speak;Snow;Yes, no avail. I'm running out of ideas...|But, I'm not giving up! The Sagemaster deserves my full effort!
speak;Keith;Thank you, Snow... No matter what happens.
speak;Snow;I appreciate your praise... Now, allow me to get back to my reading.

name: TalkFrost
_source: speak;Keith;Uhm, Frost, are you following me?
speak;Keith;Aha! The Keith fan club has finally started!
speak;Frost;Fan club?|I just wanted to, er, thank you?
speak;Frost;Well, everyone here is so nice.
speak;Keith;No worries, bloomed maiden, anything else?
speak;Frost;I wanted to give you this!
speak;Frost;I foresaw it would be useful...
speak;Keith;Oh! Well in that case, thank you very much!

name: TalkAerial
_source: speak;Aerial;I wanted to keep an eye on his Majesty.|Why not do both?
speak;Keith;C'mon, he's fine!|Sal's with him anyway.
speak;Aerial;Well, if anyone needs to lift him, I've got muscle to spare.
speak;Keith;Look, there was something I wanted to ask.
speak;Keith;Your revealed physique is taking all the attention from me!
speak;Aerial;That ain't much of a question...|But, I can teach you my regimen, if you'd like.
speak;Keith;Too much work, I think putting on a bigger shirt is easier.
speak;Aerial;Uh, I dunno what you mean, but...|I'm sure you're plenty eye-catching, boss.
speak;Aerial;Now, I better keep at my training, peace.

name: TalkSal
_source: speak;Sal;I'm here to support you.|That includes some hard truths.
speak;Sal;Just remember, I can knock you unconscious if that is easier.
speak;Sal;Of course, even I can have fun.
speak;Keith;Really? I did not know that!

name: TalkMorshu
_source: speak;Morshu;I'm a seller of wares.|Though, I'm afraid my famous lamp oil is out of stock.
speak;Morshu;I was permitted entry by the guards.
speak;Morshu;I have a variety of items you might find interesting.
speak;Keith;I'll have to have a look!

name: TalkBlazing
_source: speak;Blazing;Oh, hello Prince Keith.|I appreciate your country's hospitality.
speak;Blazing;I'm just concerned at having to take lives...|Violence begets more violence.
speak;Keith;I suppose it is a lot to ask of you to stay.
speak;Blazing;I'll get over it, I think.|I have to figure out what happened.
speak;Keith;Yeah, this whole biz is confusing.
speak;Blazing;If you ever need any spiritual guidance...|I'll try what I can.
speak;Keith;Not much of a religious guy myself...|But, I appreciate it Blaze!

name: TalkLandros
_source: speak;Keith;I'm good! What are you reading?
speak;Landros;A textbook on meteorology, storms are so fascinating...
