speak;Keith;Really? They just make you all wet and blustered!
speak;Landros;Well, sure, if you wish to be reductive.
speak;Keith;Why do you care so much about the weather?
speak;Landros;Well, as you know... or should know.|My family own a sizable farm, our crops depend on the weather.|If I can predict the weather...|I should be able to help my folks better.
speak;Keith;Oh, right, your parents are farmers...
speak;Landros;One more thing, I won't let you best me with the bow either.|Commoners can do whatever you nobles do too.
speak;Keith;Haha, jolly good.|As your friend, I promise you I'll always win in the end.
speak;Landros;Then I'll have to train harder...|After I've read this.

name: TalkSmoke
_source: speak;Keith;Oh dear! He's frozen!|Do we have a healer? Anyone?
speak;Smoke;Bwahaha! You shoulda seen the look on your face!
speak;Keith;So, Smoke, how are you? With the war and all.
speak;Smoke;I don't see how my feelings are relevant here.
speak;Smoke;My job's to make everyone happy.|That's good enough for me, in spite of any circumstances.
speak;Smoke;Now, for my next trick, SMOKESCREEN GO!
speak;Keith;Woah! Smoke? Smoooooke?|Hm, wonder where he vanished...|Looks like he dropped something...
speak;Keith;Guess he had a gift for me the whole time...|Always confusing...

name: TalkGuy
_source: speak;Keith;I can appreciate some good peace and quiet, myself.
speak;Guy;Look, I'm exhausted, I could hardly sleep after that battle.
speak;Keith;Whereas I slept for far too long...
speak;Keith;Sorry for disturbing your dozing, Guy.
speak;Guy;Well, it's less earache than with my pals.
speak;Keith;I see, they are somewhat... animated.
speak;Guy;That's generous.|I love 'em to bits, but man, the noise...
speak;Guy;At least it's distracting me from the thoughts of Pykroe's dead body...
speak;Guy;At least it's distracting me from the thoughts of Hyper's dead body...
speak;Guy;At least it's distracting me from the haunting of my dead friends...
speak;Keith;Alright, see ya, GuySir! Enjoy your nap!

name: TalkRoag
_source: speak;Keith;I did wonder, how is it you came to be a knight?
speak;Roag;Uhm...|Let's just say, it's nicer to be on this side of the law.
speak;Roag;It's ok hun, I didn't do anything TOO bad...
speak;Keith;Now I'm curious, what kind of things did you do?
speak;Roag;My family were always good, like...|But, we were beaten down by bandits...|Our stuff was stolen, nobody would help...|I had to become like them to get us food...
speak;Roag;Don't tell Kingsy, but I wish he'd have done better.|Always felt like he forgot about protecting the little guys out there...
speak;Keith;I... I had no idea that so many families were living so badly...|I will ensure that families like yours won't suffer any more.
speak;Roag;Thanks for worrying about me, K...|One thing about me, is that I'll raise my spear for ya.

name: TalkPiknoGuard
_source: speak;Keith;Thank you both, someone in the holding cell?
speak;SoldierPurple;He's a troublemaker alright.|Claims we're "obsessed with him", and that we're "haters".
speak;Keith;Sounds like a fun person to me!
speak;Keith;Hang on, I want to see him!
speak;Pikno;I advise against this, Prince Keith.
speak;Boey;Girl! I told you I didn't do anything!|It's not my fault!
speak;SoldierPurple;Quiet! The prince wishes to speak to you.
speak;Pikno;Great. We gotta chase him now.
speak;Keith;It's alright guys, I'll do it!

name: TalkBoey
_source: speak;Keith;You there, I've got you now!
speak;Boey;Gah! Please!|I'm innocent, but those haters wouldn't know that of course.|It's all just 'cause I'm beautiful!
speak;Keith;See, I know you'd be hilarious!
speak;Boey;Huh? Hilarious... {c:expression;Boey;Smile}Yeah!|Like, of course I am!|Obviously, your Highness would have good taste!
speak;Keith;Now, what actually got you put away?
speak;Boey;Like if I know!|That stuffy knight was all up in my shit!|Apparently, it's "illegal", to ask for money!
speak;Keith;Money? Man, the knights are too cruel to the commoners...
speak;Boey;Commoner? Ha? I'm better than your average commoner!
speak;Boey;Uh, yeah?|I'm a gang leade-, I mean, mercenary!
speak;Keith;Where's the rest of your crew?
speak;Boey;They ran away when the knights arrived!|Lousy traitors...
speak;Keith;Seems like you could use some work.
speak;Boey;For a noble?|That isn't my usual line of work...|But anything beats prison, so sure.
speak;Keith;I'll make sure to pardon you!|But, you're not running away, right?
speak;Boey;You dissin' me?|I'm a man of my word, well, if you sweeten the deal, mhm?
speak;Keith;If you mean money, you might be conpensated eventually... Wait, what is your name?
speak;Boey;Boey's the name of the fabulous merc you see before you.|Don't worry, you'll remember it!

name: TalkHyper
_source: speak;Pykroe;Haha! Lord Keith, a fine day today is, hm?
speak;Pykroe;Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest one in the land, Pykroe!
speak;Keith;I see, a positively lucky soldier is very useful!
speak;Pykroe;Certainly! My presence is most auspicious!
speak;Hyper;Nobody can rival their good fortune!
speak;Keith;And Hyper!|I almost didn't notice you for a minute!
speak;Hyper;Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here too!
speak;Pykroe;Oh dear, Hyper.|Do remember, you are blessed too!|Not with my luck, but with a strong will!
speak;Pykroe;Besides, where is Guy? He is most elusive!|I told him we would spend today trialing a secret technique!
speak;Hyper;Probably lounging around by himself somewhere.
speak;Pykroe;Haha! Caught your attention? You'll have to wait and see!|It's very hush-hush.
speak;Keith;Looking forward to seeing it! See ya!
speak;Pykroe;Ah. Lord Keith, a fine day today is, hm?
speak;Pykroe;Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest one in the land, Pykroe!
speak;Keith;I see, a positively lucky soldier is very useful!
speak;Pykroe;Well, with the death of our friend, Guy...|My luck seems to have run dry...
speak;Hyper;It seems a moment of curses struck...
speak;Hyper;Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here this whole time!
speak;Pykroe;Hyper, you're positively amazing, ignore his foolishness!
speak;Hyper;Clearly, not amazing enough to save Guy.
speak;Pykroe;His death was clearly a fated event...|Destiny must be stronger than anyone's will.
speak;Hyper;Bah! Shut up!|Destiny? Preordained death?|If this is the work of the Goddess, then I hate her!
speak;Keith;That would be a point of contention...
speak;Keith;I'm sorry for your loss, you two...
speak;Hyper;Why? You weren't even there.|I'm just, so angry... I couldn't do anything right!
speak;Pykroe;Nonsense!|We can move past this, stronger than ever!
speak;Hyper;Look, I appreciate the concern.|But, it's so hard...|Sorry, Prince Keith, please go away...|I wouldn't want you to see me cry...
speak;Hyper;They're both gone... Both my longest buddies...
speak;Hyper;Why? You weren't even there.|I'm just, so angry... I couldn't do anything right!
speak;Keith;Nonsense!|You'll be able to move past this...
speak;Hyper;Look, I appreciate the concern.|But, Prince Keith, please go away...|I wouldn't want you to see... me cry...

name: TalkPykroe
_source: speak;Pykroe;Haha! Lord Keith, a fine day today is, hm?
speak;Pykroe;Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest one in the land, Pykroe!
speak;Keith;I see, a positively lucky soldier is very useful!
speak;Pykroe;Certainly! My presence is most auspicious!
speak;Hyper;Nobody can rival their good fortune!
speak;Keith;And Hyper!|I almost didn't notice you for a minute!
speak;Hyper;Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here too!
speak;Pykroe;Oh dear, Hyper.|Do remember, you are blessed too!|Not with my luck, but with a strong will!
speak;Pykroe;Besides, where is Guy? He is most elusive!|I told him we would spend today trialing a secret technique!
speak;Hyper;Probably lounging around by himself somewhere.
speak;Pykroe;Haha! Caught your attention? You'll have to wait and see!|It's very hush-hush.
speak;Keith;Looking forward to seeing it! See ya!
speak;Pykroe;Ah. Lord Keith, a fine day today is, hm?
speak;Pykroe;Mhm! 'Tis I!|Slayer of evil, luckiest one in the land, Pykroe!
speak;Keith;I see, a positively lucky soldier is very useful!
speak;Pykroe;Well, with the death of our friend, Guy...|My luck seems to have run dry...
speak;Hyper;It seems a moment of curses struck...
speak;Hyper;Hey! What do you mean?!|I've been standing here too!
speak;Pykroe;Hyper, you're positively amazing, ignore his foolishness!
speak;Hyper;Clearly, not amazing enough to save Guy.
speak;Pykroe;His death was clearly a fated event...|Destiny must be stronger than anyone's will.
speak;Hyper;Bah! Shut up!|Destiny? Preordained death?|If this is the work of the Goddess, then I hate her!
speak;Keith;That would be a point of contention...
speak;Keith;I'm sorry for your loss, you two...
speak;Hyper;Why? You weren't even there.|I'm just, so angry... I couldn't do anything right!
speak;Pykroe;Nonsense!|We can move past this, stronger than ever!
speak;Hyper;Look, I appreciate the concern.|But, it's so hard...|Sorry, Prince Keith, please go away...|I wouldn't want you to see... me cry.
speak;Pykroe;It appears my luck has drained!|Both Hyper... Guy... Dead!
speak;Keith;I'm sorry I couldn't have helped...
speak;Pykroe;Clearly, this is all a trial!|A trial to make me stronger, much stronger.
speak;Pykroe;Of course!|Otherwise this hurt, this pain... is all for nothing!
speak;Pykroe;Now, you will have to excuse me.|I must steel my heart for the future, for them.
speak;Keith;I'll be there to help you every step of the way, Pykroe.

name: Revival
_source: choice;revival;Who to revive?;[u.nid for u in game.get_all_units_in_party() if is_dead(u.nid)];expression

name: Pillar2
_source: speak;Septimus;You're meddling with power beyond your ken.|But how well will you do, if you cannot see?|Hahaha!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Keith;Ok, pops. You look serious... what's up?
speak;Sagemaster;We've discussed the future...|I feel you ought to... *COUGH*|Urk... be more responsible.
speak;Sal;I'm sure that you understand our concerns.
speak;Javi;Your Majesty! There appears to be Monsdorian wyverns breaching the perimeter!
speak;Sal;We have to stand our ground, right?
speak;Sagemaster;They breached the perimeter...? I don't know if we can handle their might...
speak;Keith;Pfft! Wyverns are no match for my bow!
speak;Sagemaster;You would stand no match.|The King would snap you in two!
speak;Sal;You suggest we... flee?|But, this is our home!
speak;Snow;I won't be able to heal anyone if they're already dead!
speak;Sagemaster;Okay, Sal. You take Keith... and your platoon.|Go through the underground passage...
speak;Sagemaster;I have to stay... I'm a dying man anyway...|I just want my son to be safe...
speak;Javi;I refuse to leave you until your last breath!|My group will stand strong! Come!
speak;Snow;I will stand with you, your Majesty, I owe you too much...
speak;Sagemaster;Indeed, though... why?|Why go through such lengths to attack us?|Based on... *COUGH* baseless conjecture?
speak;Oberon;Oh, it appears you're not as sharp as I thought.
speak;Oberon;I do not recall speaking to you.|Aurelia is powerful, they have plentiful resources.|Resources that my people would appreciate.|I have much to gain here.
speak;Oberon;I can't know for certain who ordered for Prince Elias to be killed.|But, what I do know is that my people are everything to me.|Any benefits to them will cleanse my conscience.
speak;Sagemaster;Why would I want him dead?|Aurelia and Arcei were on peaceful terms!
speak;Sagemaster;*COUGH* Hnrgh...|Why would they do that...?
speak;Snow;Please, we can resolve this without fighting...
speak;Javi;King Oberon, you should leave now.
speak;Oberon;You trust in your liege enough to stand up to me?
speak;Oberon;Well, let's see if you're willing to die for him!
speak;Oberon;Still standing? Impressive.|Most crumble to dust.
speak;Snow;Hold in there! I'll heal you-
speak;Oberon;If you do, you die next.
speak;Javi;You wondered... if I would die for... the Sagemaster...|I would, in a heartbeat...
speak;Sagemaster;Please, I'll hand myself over to you, after all...|Wouldn't Aurelia want to deal with me personally?
speak;Oberon;I suppose, bringing you in alive for their amusement...
speak;Sagemaster;I am afraid I have to do this, I'm sorry...|I've failed my country for too long... I deserve this.|Goodbye...
speak;Snow;Your Majesty! That is a warp staff...|No...
speak;Sagemaster;Thank you two... for your service...
speak;Sagemaster;*COUGH* Just... get this over with.|I'll accept anything, so long as my people are safe...

name: RevRein
_source: speak;Septimus;You're putting me in a precarious situation...|Time for more of my beautiful constructs!

name: Wagon1
_source: if;not any(unit.team == 'other' for unit in game.units if unit.position)

name: Wagon2
_source: if;not any(unit.team == 'other' for unit in game.units if unit.position)

name: Wagon3
_source: if;not any(unit.team == 'other' for unit in game.units if unit.position)

name: Outro
_source: speak;Prof;How foul they were, but no match for our careful consideration.
speak;Man4;Not everyone made it, but let's see what we got fer ye...
speak;Man4;Let's see what we have for ye, for yer excellent work!
speak;Prof;Indeed, appears I've taught you two well.|Though I didn't expect you to be so gung-ho at killing...
speak;Aspl;Clearly the students have surpassed the teacher.|You've gone soft, loser.
speak;Prof;I'm not giving up yet.|I'll make progress alongside you!
speak;Bread;Where's Aspl... I can't find him...
speak;Leap;Oh, Bread...|I'm sure he's playing with the fairies.
speak;Bread;Fairies? I wanna see them too!
speak;Prof;We have to tell the truth.
speak;Bread;Gone? I don't understand...|{c:expression;Bread;CloseEyes}Wahhhh! *Sniff*|I want Aspl back!
speak;Leap;I'll play with you later, okay?
speak;Aspl;Life's mean.|You should toughen up, loser.
speak;Aspl;Just quit talking.|Do better, so more people don't die.
speak;Leap;Yeah, but you should finally be able to rest!
speak;Mizt;Guess so, but that wagon sure was comfortable...|I'll need to find that pillow...
speak;Leap;Hey Mizt!|Didn't care to help us, huh?
speak;Mizt;The nap was real good though...|But I'll make it up to ya, I swear!
speak;Mizt;Uhm, I should probably help those wagons unload...

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;During a siege on Castle Nordz, the Sagemaster is captured.
narrate;Narrator;King Oberon of Monsdor, who wishes for Aurelia's respect, kidnaps him to Monsdor Keep.
narrate;Narrator;Meanwhile, a group of commoners face a common problem, banditry...
speak;Prof;So, it seems all the wagons are in good condition.|All supplies are secured.
speak;Liz;If only you could have put in an order for some more books...
speak;Leap;Oh Liz! Always lost in your books!
speak;Liz;Look, I'm dying for some new ones.|All mine are old hand-me-downs...
speak;Leap;We're almost home,{c:bop_portrait;Leap} I can't wait!
speak;Prof;Wonder if Mizt will wake up before then...
speak;Man4;We just need to get there, aye?|Not far at all!
speak;Maurice;Stand and deliver!|Your money, or your life!
speak;Prof;Stand aside, we don't have time for this.
speak;Maurice;Perhaps I have't made myself clear.|Your money, or your life!
speak;Prof;I am adept at language comprehension.|I just refuse to comply.
speak;Maurice;How disappointing...|Lads! Kill these fools and raid their wagons!
speak;Maurice;We'll see how long you persist, huh?

name: Turn2
_source: speak;Bread;Yay! My horsie is ready to massacre these no-good meanies!
speak;Aspl;Yeah. They're like... lame, and stuff.|Obviously, no match for us.
speak;Bread;Wahoo! Cute, cute, cute!|To protect our village from devastation!
speak;Aspl;To unite all people within our nation!
speak;Bread;To claim the goodness of cuteness and love!
speak;Aspl;To extend our coolness to the stars above!
speak;Bread;Team awesome is riding at the speed of light!
speak;Aspl;Give up already, or prepare to fight!
speak;Leap;Alright! We have backup... Wait!|Is that Aspl and Bread? What are they doing?!

name: Wagon2Death
_source: speak;Mizt;Ugh... What's going on?|The wagon... Robbers?|You'll pay for this!

name: MiztWakeup
_source: speak;Leap;Hey, Mizt is still sleeping in here, right?
speak;Man4;No need to be so... loud...
speak;Leap;We need your help, some mean guys are after us!|They want to steal our stuff!
speak;Mizt;Alright... If I have to bloody my axe more, I will...
speak;Man4;Please, this'll lighten my wagons load too.
speak;Leap;Now, throw down with those bandits!

name: MauriceFight
_source: speak;Maurice;Look, it's not personal. I won't let you cross this bridge.|I need your money! Now!;;;boss_convo_left

name: MauriceLeap
_source: speak;Maurice;A fine young lady as yourself...|Yet so bold...;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Maurice;Such a shame to hurt you.|Hand over your things, and I might be... {c:expression;Maurice;Smile}more than merciful.;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Maurice;Gross? I'll leave you looking gross!;;;boss_convo_left

name: ShoopTalk
_source: speak;Shoop;You all clearly needed my help.
speak;Shoop;Oh, the rain is ruining your hair by the way!{c:bop_portrait;Shoop} Kehahaha!
speak;Leap;Uhm, wait, what?! My hair looks the same as always!

name: DeanTalk
_source: speak;Dean;This is all madness, isn't it?
speak;Prof;Agreed. Monsdor is trying to appease Aurelia.|They really are gasping for any semblance of power.
speak;Dean;And yet, we suffer, not Arcei.
speak;Prof;I don't know if that's true, Arcei isn't doing so well.
speak;Dean;Hmph, either way, we shouldn't get involved.
speak;Dean;Well, our problem is with Monsdor.|I'm sure Aurelia sees no threat here.|Which is good, Aurelia is the mightiest nation on the continent.
speak;Prof;...I don't really know what to think.
speak;Dean;It doesn't matter, Grahment comes first.
speak;Dean;Take this, son.|You might need it some day.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Dean;Thank you for helping out, Leap.
speak;Leap;Of course!|I'm forever thankful for your kindness, Mr. Essar.|Ever since I arrived here, I've always felt welcomed.
speak;Prof;Father, what will we do now?
speak;Dean;I'm unsure...|I really don't want to drag our people into it.
speak;Leap;I can't stand Monsdor using us as a punching bag!|The war is about Arcei and Aurelia...|They're just doing this for fun!
speak;Prof;I don't think it's for fun, Leap.
speak;Leap;I just, want to do something about this! Anything!
speak;Prof;Leap...|Father, I... I want to as well.
speak;Dean;If that's your wish, so be it.|I won't stop you.
speak;Leap;Why can't we unite Grahment... to end this craziness!

speak;Dean;Well, Viscount Zio is pro-Arcei, Count Phyron appears more swayed that way too.|However, Duke von Ilkrest is most vocal in opposition.|I suppose his religious nature would bias him a smidge.
speak;Prof;I believe Marquess Cres is missing after their Aurelia trip, too.
speak;Leap;Oh dear... We'll have to convince Duke von Ilkrest to change his mind.
speak;Dean;I wish you the best, he's a stubborn mule...|Oh, and son...
speak;Dean;I will take over your teaching role, while you'e gone.|Can't be letting standards slip!
speak;Dean;Do take this too, it's not much, but it'll help.
speak;Shoop;You really ought to learn better makeup skills.
speak;Shoop;It's okay, not everyone can look as good as a pegasus.
speak;Shoop;Duh. You wouldn't get style, there's no books on it, nerd.
speak;Prof;I think my style is fine... It's... practical!
speak;Dawn;Hey Emmie!|How's things been? Oh my Goddess!|Your crown is beautiful!
speak;Emeline;Hello Dawn, and Helia.|What a pleasant surprise!
speak;Helia;Please, Dawn, calm down.|How are you feeling? I extend my warmest condolences...
speak;Dawn;It's just awful!|Elias was so amazing...
speak;Helia;He was truly special...{c:wait;500} Taken so soon...
speak;Emeline;It hurts me to no end...|But, I have to prove I am a worthy successor to my father... and brother.
speak;Helia;That you are!|I apologise on father's behalf, he has his own business to attend to.
speak;Emeline;Uncle is a busy man, purging our country of crime...|I understand his absence.
speak;Helia;We bring important news on his behalf... I'm due to be engaged to Prince Emmanuel of Monsdor.
speak;Helia;As the eldest sister, it seems most of father's plans involve me...
speak;Dawn;Come on, sis. Sound more ethusiastic, he's a dreamboat!
speak;Helia;I am happy... I think.|Also, rumour has it, that Monsdor have attacked Arcei for us!
speak;Emeline;They really are helping us out immensely...|{c:expression;Emeline;CloseEyes}Going so far to cover for my own weakness...
speak;Helia;Emeline... You're not weak...|You're stronger than I am, anyway...
speak;Dawn;Oh{c:wait;200} my{c:wait;200} gosh! What if he's king someday?!|You'll get the most gorgeous crown, like Emmie's!
speak;Emeline;The weight of the crown...|It's almost impossible to keep my head up...
speak;Dawn;Doesn't look that heavy to me?
speak;Emeline;I meant metaphorically...|But, do you really wish to be pawned off like that?|It seems so... cold.
speak;Dawn;We're his special girls!|He knows what makes us happy!
speak;Helia;Really, it's just how things are...
speak;Emeline;I suppose natural romance isn't a luxury afforded to us...|Also... I need your opinions on something...|What do you two think of Palushin and King Jevil?
speak;Dawn;The fact he isn't backing Aurelia is disgusting!
speak;Helia;Palushin's merchants likely don't want any involvement...|But with some convincing, maybe it might work?
speak;Dawn;I'm sure you could convince him, Emmie.|You're a real catch! You just need to use your charm!
speak;Emeline;A catch...? Charm?|Perhaps you'd be better as a liason for that...
speak;Dawn;Eeee! A special mission?|King Jevil should appreciate the finer things, right?|I can help you out there!
speak;Helia;And what about the people of Khonsu?
speak;Dawn;The desert rats? Really, Helia?|Why would they ever get involved? They probably don't know anything.|Can they even write letters or anything...?

speak;Emeline;The tribes are all seperate, I'm sure none would be a sizable force alone.|However, if Arcei are desperate for help... I shall send scouts.|Preoccupying the tribes with internal strife will distract them.
speak;Dawn;I suppose that makes sense...|Hm... you are a genius, Emmie!
speak;Helia;Oh...|Uhm, well... what is the end goal, Emeline?
speak;Helia;All this fighting, I mean.|How much blood does it take to repay Elias' death...?|Many others will lose their family in a war...
speak;Emeline;No amount is too high for brother.|The Goddess would want for me to defend her honor.
speak;Helia;But, is that what he'd have wanted?
speak;Emeline;...|You're... uhm....|Ah... if you'll excuse me, I need time to think.
speak;Helia;Certainly, it was nice to see you, Emeline.
speak;Emeline;Elias... What would you want for me to do...?|I never was as smart or certain as you...|Please... just give me a sign...|Goddess...? Can you hear me?|Anyone...?

name: Intro
_source: speak;Humphrey;Your regions noble, Viscount Zio?|Allowing passage of Arcein troops?
speak;Dean;I had no involvement in any of this...|I just want our people to live in peace.|I care not an iota about your petty squabbles.
speak;Humphrey;Petty squabbles? That is absurd!|Prince Elias is dead.
speak;Dean;Look, why not take this up with the Viscount?
speak;Humphrey;Hmph, about as evasive as a roach!|With damages to their territory, they'll have to come back!
speak;SoldierGreen;Monster! We will not stand for this invasion!
speak;Dean;Rightly said.|My apologies, but you're dealing with me.
speak;Humphrey;Ha! My years of experience will trump you!
speak;Prof;Looks like Monsdor have finally lost it...|Such a stupid state of affairs.
speak;Prof;Father can handle himself, we need to help the townsfolk!
speak;Shoop;Oh! You look like my next crush!
speak;SoldierRed;O-oh, heh! Aren't we supposed to be fighting, ma'am?
speak;Shoop;Kehahaha! Whoopsie!|I meant I'm going to CRUSH YOU!
speak;Leap;Better talk to Shoop, let her know we're here.
speak;Prof;I'm more scared of her than the Monsdorians, to be frank...

name: HumphreyPanic
_source: speak;Humphrey;Eek! I gotta run away from these vermin!|Help meeeee!
speak;Dean;Do not let him escape!|Block the south exit!|Oterwise he'll harass more of our people!

name: HumphreyEscape
_source: speak;Dean;No, he'll wreck more of our country...

name: DeanDeath
_source: speak;Prof;Father! No! How could this happen...

name: Turn1
_source: speak;Aspl;Wanna know something cool?|Sure you do.|See those soldiers?
speak;Aspl;Those guys are gonna try and visit the open houses.
speak;Leap;How can you be sure, Aspl?
speak;Aspl;I've never been wrong in my life.
speak;Leap;Crazy! Well, let's get those guys before they do something mean!

name: House1P
_source: speak;OldMan1;Oh...|What? Monsters?|I've tangoed with a few, take this.|It could be useful for you...|It's tricky to wield, so don't beat yourself up about it...

name: House1E
_source: speak;SoldierRed;Shut up! Fight for Monsdor, or else.

name: House3P
_source: speak;YoungBoy;Time to play? No? Aw...|Well, okay... How about you take this for me?|Ma tells me I shouldn't play with it... Hmph!

name: House3E
_source: speak;YoungBoy;They're out, fighting, I think...|Say... red armour...|Ma said you people are bad men.

name: House2P
_source: speak;SoldierGreen;I'm supposed to be out there, but I have kids, dude!|...|Don't look at me like that...|...|Okay, I'll go. But if I die, you tell my wife!

name: House2E
_source: speak;SoldierGreen;I'm supposed to be out there...|B-but I won't bother you! Please!
speak;SoldierRed;You will fight for us, or I'll kill you.

name: House4P
_source: speak;Bandit1;Hey, nice to have a visitor.|...|Why you lookin' at me funny? Can't a guy change?|Anyway, I'm a reformed man! Consider this as proof.

name: House4E
_source: speak;Bandit1;Hey, nice to have a visitor.
speak;SoldierRed;You will aid us, or die!
speak;Bandit1;Guess I'm atoning for my past eventually...

name: Armory
_source: shop;{unit};Iron Sword,Slim Sword,Iron Lance,Slim Lance,Iron Axe,Iron Bow;armory

name: Cafe
_source: speak;YoungGirl;Huh? Monsters? Scary!|Be careful! Uhm...|Try this, I stole it from daddy.|But he doesn't fight no more, so take it!

name: Inn
_source: speak;{unit};Hey, there's monsters outside, you might want to keep indoors!
speak;Siri;Oh... Mind if I tag along...|Oh yes... This'll be good...
speak;Siri;Siri, at your service...|Sorry if I get... lost in my own world out there.

name: WarpZashar
_source: speak;Zashar;Hehehe! Catch me if you can!|I'll do anything to secure victory!|Even if it turns me into a monster too!

name: ZasharDeath
_source: speak;Zashar;As if I could make such a mistake...|Another contingency...|I have to... take my tincture...|GRAAAAAAAAAAA!

name: ZasharFight
_source: speak;Zashar;You're not running away? More fool you!;;;boss_convo_left

name: HumphreyFight
_source: speak;Humphrey;Gah! Give up!|You face a seasoned veteran!;;;boss_convo_left

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Advised by Dean, Leap sets their sights on asking Duke Ilkrest's aid.
narrate;Narrator;With Prof at their side, Leap heads to Nanba Marina, in Ilkrest territory.
narrate;Narrator;However, the pair is unnerved by how silent the town is...
speak;Prof;Through this town is the estate of the Duke.|The waterways are rather nice...
speak;Leap;Almost makes me want a dip...|But now's hardly the time, of course.
speak;Prof;Quite, but it's eerily quiet for this time of day...
speak;Prof;This town is rather nice...|Hang on, am I imagining... a floating eye...?
speak;Leap;Is someone playing tricks on us...?|Gah! Another goopy...{c:wait;400} thing!
speak;Prof;Looks like there's one man amongst them...
speak;Zashar;Feeble travellers! Feel the might of Arcei's mightiest magic!
speak;Prof;You think if Arcei were involved they'd be more... discreet.
speak;Leap;Well... yeah...|Who'd want that kind of attention?
speak;Zashar;Quake in fear as my monsters sever your limbs!|Hahaha!
speak;Prof;Screaming like a lunatic is rather nonsensical.|Let us put an end to this freak before he does anything...

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;After clearing the Marina of monsters, Leap must head north to Ilkrest Manor.
narrate;Narrator;Leap and Prof set off, but decide to organise their inventory first...
speak;Leap;We'd best take a rest stop before we go in there...
speak;Prof;True, I doubt the Duke wants to see us so rattled...
speak;Leap;After what we've seen?|Real life monsters...
speak;Prof;I suppose we should prepare...|What if the Duke's estate is infested?
speak;Leap;Oh, you're right!|Let's hope he's okay...
speak;Leap;The water is so clear and pretty...
speak;Prof;We better speak to any of the guards, so they don't attack us...
speak;Leap;We'll need to speak to the moat guard anyway.
speak;Leap;Aw, too shy to take the front?

name: OpenGate
_source: speak;Leap;I er, seek an audience with Duke Hogarth.
speak;Leap;It's urgent, regarding the state of the war...
speak;SoldierWhite;Fine, you may speak to him.|Open the gate!
speak;SoldierWhite;On the left, don't wander, that clear?

name: LeapNabin
_source: speak;Nabin;My heart's not in it today, I suppose.
speak;Nabin;Hello, how may I help you?
speak;Leap;Oh, hi!|I'm Leap, I'm looking for the Duke.
speak;Nabin;Ah, you're looking for father?|Take the stairs on the left.
speak;Nabin;Indeed I am, though it feels as thought I'm not these days...
speak;Nabin;I wouldn't wish to bore you with the details.|I'm sure your business with father is important.
speak;Nabin;Nabin. I forgot to introduce myself, didn't I?|Sorry, been so focused on my training...
speak;Leap;Nice to meet you, and good luck training!

name: ThroneDoor
_source: speak;Leap;Here to see Duke Ilkrest, sir!
speak;Leap;A commoner who has something to ask of him...
speak;SoldierWhite;Keep it quick, he's on the left.|Lower the bridge, hoy!

name: LeapHogarth
_source: music;Lord Chief Justice Stronghart ~ Time-Keeper of the Law
speak;Hogarth;Hm? I wasn't aware my appointment was pushed forward?
speak;Hogarth;Oh, then...{c:wait;200} what business do you have with me?|Who are you?
speak;Hogarth;Well, if you have issues with governance...|Take it up with Viscount Zio.
speak;Prof;Please, we're asking you to change your mind about Aurelia.
speak;Hogarth;With all due respect, I like having my good karma with the Goddess.
speak;Prof;Well, Monsdor, their ally, is attacking our villages.
speak;Hogarth;Troubling news, though Moonglade had sheltered Prince Keith, hm?|I hate to say it, but that was deserved retribution.
speak;Hogarth;Why, I do! Arcei attacked one of my villages!|With monsters no less! How grotesque!
speak;Leap;But we don't think it was-
speak;Prof;You said there was a monster attack, right?
speak;Prof;We dealt with that attack en rout to your manor.
speak;Hogarth;Oh? Well, I am very thankful!
speak;Prof;But, how would you know of that fact?|I saw no messengers coming towards your manor on the way here.
speak;Hogarth;You must just be blind, glasses...
speak;Leap;Now that I think about it...|You're right, Prof.
speak;Hogarth;Now, where were we? Ah yes.|What exactly are you trying to accuse me of, Professor?
speak;Hogarth;Remember, I am the most powerful man in the Grahment Alliance.|Tread carefully, with your unholy conjecture.
speak;Leap;You know we all would fall together...|Why side with Aurelia? They're using you!

speak;Hogarth;With all due respect, which is slowly dwindling...|You Moonglade commoners lack a relationship with the Goddess...|I'd do anything for Ilkrest territory, the holiest place west of Aurelia!
speak;Prof;Including setting monsters on your own settlements?
speak;Hogarth;Accusations, accusations.|I thought you'd know the importance of evidence.
speak;Prof;I suppose you're right, I apologise...
speak;Hogarth;Now, I appreciate your defense of my land.|I hope you will accept a token of my gratitude.|However, I am afraid I don't know if I can help you.
speak;Hogarth;I think I didn't hear a certain persons gratitude?
speak;Hogarth;Marvellous! Now, go into my library.|Take your reward from the chest, I thank you.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Leap;I can't even... feel my legs...

name: House
_source: speak;Man3;Oh a visitor.|I'm the groundskeeper of the manor...|But nobody usually cares about me...
speak;Man3;It is, but you seem very kind.|Please, take this, I insist!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Prof;Looks like the monsters are all disintegrating...
speak;Prof;I don't know...|But, I feel like I'm going to throw up...
speak;Prof;He did that to himself.|What the hell..?
speak;Leap;He claimed to be from Arcei... but I don't believe it...
speak;Prof;Sadly, we have no evidence to suggest any true motive.
speak;Siri;Woah, that was all so exhilerating!
speak;Siri;Obviously.|The feeling of the revenants claws... Ohh!
speak;Siri;Oh! The mogalls too...|Their gaze is so bone-chilling! Woo!
speak;Siri;Anyway, if this is what I'm in store for...|Consider me up for whatever ride you're on!
speak;Prof;Thanks, we might need someone crazy enough to make it out of this...
speak;Siri;Anyway, let's go do... whatever it is!
speak;Prof;We'll have to go into the estate without the others.|Better to not cause a scene.
speak;Leap;Yeah... Any more and they might get antsy...

name: Intro
_source: speak;Hogarth;I want to know. Who sent you?|Zio put you up to this?
speak;Leap;What? No!|I did it of my own volition!
speak;Leap;Why are you keeping me here?|This is barbaric!
speak;Hogarth;Look, I'm doing what helps my own.
speak;Leap;The Goddess would frown upon you!
speak;Hogarth;She would applaud me for being a good steward.
speak;Hogarth;Next cell over.|He said much the same as you, knowing nothing.
speak;Hogarth;Anyway, goodbye...|I confiscated your things, so don't think you can try anything.
speak;Leap;Gah! You're so cruel!|Release us now! Graaaaaaaaah!
speak;Hogarth;Don't tell me you've gone soft, boy.
speak;Nabin;It doesn't seem so to me...
speak;Nabin;Father, these people you're associating with...
speak;Hogarth;Don't do some moral grandstanding against me.|I'm doing what I have to for our territory.|This land will be yours one day.
speak;Hogarth;Aurelia is strong, holy and rich!|They will reward us for our defiance of the filthy rabble that is Grahment's other lords.
speak;Hogarth;Don't you dare pretend to know what is going on!|Arcei is a sinking ship.|I don't wish to expend effort to save it.
speak;Hogarth;I'll leave the prisoners to you.|If anything goes awry... then I will disown you.
speak;Nabin;Only my blade's winds can dispell my doubts of the intruders...;;;;;red
speak;Speedy;I tried looting the treasure here...|I didn't expect trapped chests.
speak;Speedy;Anyway, I've been breaking away at this wall...
speak;Leap;But if you can pick locks...|Why not pick the door?
speak;Leap;At least we have two options!|Now, outta here!|But first, we need to free my partner...
speak;Speedy;Sure thing, just point me where you need.|Beats being down here.

name: NabinLeap
_source: speak;Leap;Please, help! You know this is unfair!
speak;Nabin;I have to see for myself, are you worthy...?|I have to... clear all this doubt, the only way I know how.
speak;Leap;Please! You don't have to hurt us...
speak;Nabin;I'm sorry, but this will determine what I have to do.
speak;Leap;I understand doubt, fear...|You'll see, I swear it!
speak;Leap;Seems so, my head's still intact...
speak;Nabin;It seems fate has brought me to this point.|I must carve away from father.
speak;Leap;The Duke? Won't he be angry?
speak;Nabin;Very, but it's the right thing.|You've probably figured it out, but he's ruthless...|He's also run in with bad people, who have him round their finger.
speak;Nabin;I wouldn't be surprised...|Now, let me make this all easier for you.
speak;Nabin;If any of these guards have your things, I'll pass them back to you!|And more...
speak;Leap;Then we won't be so useless... Woop!|Better let you handle those guards!

name: LeapProf
_source: speak;Prof;Leap! You're alright!|Whew... I would never forgive myself if-
speak;Leap;No time for that! We'd better skedaddle, fast!
speak;Prof;As fast as I can in this armor...

name: DoorB
_source: speak;Prof;Thanks, now let's get the hell outta here!

name: EscapeProf
_source: speak;Prof;Alright, let's get out of here.

name: Turn4
_source: speak;SoldierWhite;What is going on here?!|Cease this immediately!

name: Intro
_source: speak;Nabin;Father will never forgive me for this...
speak;Prof;Much appreciated, I didn't want to starve down there...
speak;Nabin;Don't thank me too soon, we're not out of the woods yet.
speak;Nabin;We can only get out there.
speak;Prof;We need to get you out of here first, Leap.
speak;Prof;Cause, I said so...|Don't look at me like that!
speak;Nabin;Save the lovers' quarrel for later, we need to move.
speak;Nabin;If anything happens to me, just run.|I'm quite capable.
speak;Nabin;Save your words, I won't let any more innocents suffer.|This is my burden to bear.
speak;Hogarth;How sad, my own son...|Troops, show no mercy!

name: Turn2
_source: speak;Liz;This was where they went...|I'm comin' for you guys!|Even if I'm terrified...
speak;Mizt;Have no fear, Leap and Prof, I'll guide us all to safety...
speak;Bread;This place is HUGE!|But not cute at all...
speak;Aspl;Those guards will be easy for us.
speak;Shoop;This is quite the estate! Keh...
speak;Siri;No monsters sadly...|A shame, I wanted more.
speak;Shoop;How sad we can't see anymore cool creatures, but your wyvern will do.
speak;Siri;Alright, let's go.|But you'll have to teach me how to do makeup like you soon!
speak;Shoop;Like you'd be able to pull of this look...
speak;Leap;Looks like we have help!|Let's get moving!

name: Turn1
_source: speak;Speedy;We need to escape, above all.|Don't bother sending me to pick those locks, I would rather stay focused.

name: Nabbed
_source: speak;Hogarth;Son, you won't continue this tomfoolery.
speak;Hogarth;How dare you embarass me!|You short sighted simpleton... you're naive!
speak;Nabin;I don't want to hurt you...
speak;Hogarth;You might be my son, but you're no genius.|Put your blade down.
speak;Hogarth;Fine, if you think so lowly of me, show me how poor of a father I am.
speak;Leap;Nabin...|We'll have to leave you... as you said...|But it hurts to be so cruel...

name: Outro
_source: speak;Hogarth;You're all useless!|No matter, they'll see retribution some day...
speak;Leap;The Duke truly is a demon!
speak;Prof;Seems like he's wrapped around the finger of Aurelia.
speak;Leap;I wish that this would all end...
speak;Prof;Seems Duke Ilkrest has skeletons in his closet.|Quite literally, with what happened in the town...
speak;Leap;I wonder if the rest of Grahment knows?
speak;Prof;Doubtful, he seems to have his secrets close to his chest.|Though if everyone else supports Arcei...
speak;Leap;I hope he doesn't sanction any harm on our territory!|I won't stand for it!
speak;Prof;If he's allied with Aurelia, we will certainly be outnumbered.
speak;Prof;C'mon Leap, let's get out of here.
speak;Leap;Hmph, fine.|Though I hope Nabin is alright...
speak;Hogarth;Why do you have to say these things about me?|Now they'll squeak about how awful they think I am.
speak;Nabin;How awful you are, more like.
speak;Hogarth;You ingrate...|You have to make this up to me.|You must realise your errors.
speak;Nabin;Father, you've changed.|I don't know who these people you're speaking to are...|But, they aren't good for you!
speak;Hogarth;Nonsense.|The Goddess adores gold... that's what I am obeying!
speak;Nabin;Gold is worth more than your dignity it seems...
speak;Hogarth;We will take to Aurelia.|I must make you see the light...
speak;Hogarth;Lest you suffer eternal damnation if you don't.
speak;Hogarth;Our boat leaves tomorrow.|Now, rest up.|I- I mean, WE, will have a great time.
speak;Morshu;Oho! Fear not, I am but a humble merchant.|I heard a perfect opportunity for a sale, who can blame me?
speak;Morshu;I am Morshu. I sell a variety of things.|Check it out in the markets before you leave.
speak;Prof;I trust your wares were safe from the monsters?
speak;Morshu;Why yes!|The inn was a perfect safe haven...|Wait, did you drive those foul miscreations away?
speak;Morshu;My, my!|Well, just for you, I'll be selling some of my SPECIAL wares.|They're limited in number, but for you? I'll set them aside.

name: Basic Training
_source: speak;Aspl;Look, I'm just way stronger.|You should stay behind me.
speak;Bread;No! I'm not gonna let that happen, silly!|I want to keep you safe!
speak;Aspl;Who doesn't?|But you should really be more careful.
speak;Aspl;C'mon teach, you know I'm the better student.
speak;Aspl;Hah! Prof is smart, obviously he'd choose the best.
speak;Aspl;Don't let it go to your head.|I'll beat you next time.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Nabin;We're gonna need to get out of here, quickly.
speak;Nabin;It was what my blade decided.
speak;Prof;Hardly a great way of making decisions...|Not that you made the wrong one, of course.
speak;Nabin;Hmph, let's carry on, if your armor doesn't slow us down, hm?
speak;Nabin;Your resolve was impeccable!|I was stuck in awe!
speak;Prof;Won't the Duke be mad you haven't stopped us?
speak;Nabin;I believe you to be good people.|I wish to help you escape, no matter father's qualms...

name: House
_source: speak;Man3;It's all so loud... Please, LEAVE!

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Following the raid on Castle Nordz by Monsdor, Prince Keith flees to Moonglade.
narrate;Narrator;Likewise, after the betrayal of Duke Ilkrest, Leap returns home.
narrate;Narrator;By good fortune, the two groups chance upon a meeting together...
speak;Keith;Please, we need your aid, kind Sir.
speak;Dean;Those robes... Arcei?|Prince Keith? An honour-
speak;Sal;I know this is hasty, but we need somewhere to shelter our friend.
speak;Dean;Monsdor find our lands a suitable playground.|I'm unsure if here is safest.
speak;Keith;Monsdor is still after you? Villains...
speak;Dean;I don't appreciate whatever you've gotten us into...
speak;Sal;We've tried contacing Viscount Zio.|But, to no avail.
speak;Dean;Neither. We've been left to dry lately.
speak;Leap;He's in kahoots with some weird people...|Monsters, he was involved, I'm sure!
speak;Keith;We've also dealt with monsters, and Monsdor.|Seemingly, tied together.
speak;Prof;Prince Keith?! An honour to meet you.
speak;Leap;Right!|Mr. Essar... The Duke locked us away!|We were saved by his son...
speak;Dean;He locked you away...?|Nobody does that to my boy...{c:wait;300} nor you, Leap.
speak;Snow;The King of Monsdor is striking a deal of sorts with Aurelia.|Likely involving an execution for the Sagemaster...
speak;Dean;A pact between Monsdor and Aurelia...
speak;Keith;It seems Grahment is collateral to get to us.|For Monsdor to display their strength, so Aurelia respects them.
speak;Leap;We're just some kind of spectacle?!|Our people have suffered, given their lives up!
speak;Leap;Oh, that's it!|Monsdor needs to learn a lesson!
speak;Snow;Though, his Majesty will be unsafe in custody, given his health.|Execution or not, he may not have long left...|You haven't got enough time...
speak;Keith;We'll need to divide our forces.
speak;Keith;I know this is a lot to ask, but can you handle Monsdor?
speak;Leap;Oh, trust me, I sure will try!
speak;Prof;We're not quite that capable though... being realistic.
speak;Dean;Strategically, gaining allies is a good move.|Some of the tribes of Khonsu might offer help.
speak;Sal;Sounds like a plan, but how will we reach Aurelia quickly...?
speak;Dean;We have several docks to the north-east.|The territory is owned by Earl Mandrock, but he should be willing to help.|He is quite the naval expert, and anti-Monsdor to boot.
speak;Dean;Dean Essar, at your service.|This is my son, Prof, and his partner, Leap.
speak;Prof;We'll find the Sagemaster, if he's in Monsdor.|I'd hate for them to have the satisfaction of winning...
speak;Snow;I am the Sagemaster's apothecary, Snow.|May I stay here to treat General Javi?
speak;Dean;So long as you help around with the townsfolk...|We have a deal.
speak;Leap;It's so nice to meet you all!|But, I'm sorry we have to part so soon...
speak;Keith;Indeed my good fellows, the game is afoot!
speak;Blazing;Lord Keith, if I might have a moment?
speak;Blazing;Well, I appreciate working with your squad, truly.|However, I believe it'd be best for me to fight alongside our Grahment acquaintances here.
speak;Keith;Makes sense, Leap, you wanna take him?
speak;Leap;Sure! We need all the help we can!
speak;Blazing;Thank you for your understanding...|Take care on your trip, Prince Keith.

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;After planning with Dean, Keith heads north to Port Brin.
narrate;Narrator;However, the port is currently facing problems of its own...
speak;Keith;Yes? How may I help you, fair one?
speak;Cacti;I am Cacti, daughter of Earl Mandrock.|He's arriving back soon, but...|The town is overrun by pirates!|They won't listen to anything I say!
speak;Keith;Oh dear, that will not do!|Perchance, could we utilise one of his boats?|If we help here, of course.
speak;Cacti;You strike a hard bargain, Sir.|He'd likely agree, but I have my own terms...
speak;Cacti;You may not have introduced yourself...|But who you are is obvious, Prince Keith.
speak;Keith;Wow, can a man not have his privacy?|Tsk, tsk.
speak;Cacti;An adventure with a foreign prince sounds exciting.|I want to travel with you!
speak;Keith;It'll be dangerous, we're up against Aurelia.|You perhaps ought to stay behind...
speak;Cacti;I'm not a fragile doll, you know?!
speak;Keith;I suppose not...|Alright, I agree to your terms...
speak;Pete;C'mon, you've gotta pull your weight!|Or we'll make ya walk the plank...
speak;Angel;Man, Apple left me out here to die...|Even the old gang was better than this...|Even if the boss was a failure...
speak;Cacti;See, things are a mess!|They're all so... disgusting.
speak;Keith;Say no more, this will be a piece of cake!

name: House1
_source: speak;Boy1;Things are always so weird.|These guys wanted me to join their crew, but no way!|I don't think these pirates know basic hygeine!|Uh, take this please... They smell so bad...

name: House2
_source: speak;Girl2;My boyfriend dumped me recently...|I'm just... done with it all...|Here, have this. Stab people in the back, like he did to me...

name: Inn
_source: speak;Man3;You here for a pint?|No? Really?|Well, uh, take this instead if you're fighting those pirates.

name: BoeyAngel
_source: speak;Boey;Girl, how could you leave me to get caught by myself!
speak;Angel;I told you that holdup was a bad gig, you didn't listen!
speak;Boey;WOW!|You're accusing me of not listening, is it because I'm beautiful?
speak;Angel;Ahuh, not with that shirt and those shoes, oh and...
speak;Boey;Stop dissin' me!? Like, what the fuck man!?
speak;Angel;Anyways, what are you doin' here?|This isn't your style...
speak;Boey;Prince dude is letting me walk free, so long as I help him.
speak;Angel;Ahuh, I see what you're tryna do...
speak;Angel;Listen, I understand, make that bag!|Princes have deep pockets.
speak;Boey;Well, I'm basically gettin' paid to be a soldier, you know?
speak;Boey;Uhm, we don't need your fatass here!
speak;Boey;Look, I get you're obsessed, but you can do your own thing now.
speak;Angel;Nah, I insist.|This pirate group is so flop...|I think Apple ran away...
speak;Angel;Anyways, time to make some money!

name: SagesAngel
_source: speak;Keith;Hm, you don't seem like the rest of these guys...
speak;Angel;What's that supposed to mean, huh?
speak;Keith;Oh, well you seem more, stylish! Of course!
speak;Keith;Well, we don't need to fight...
speak;Angel;Not much choice for me, y'know.|If I don't kill you, they'll kill me.
speak;Keith;Oh my... Why don't you join us?
speak;Angel;Me?|Well, you fancy kind aren't exactly my scene...
speak;Keith;Well, we do have gold to spare...
speak;Angel;I guess. I pledge allegiance to the bag.
speak;Keith;Welcome aboard, I am Prince Keith of Arcei.
speak;Angel;Prince of Arcei...|I'm from Arcei, actually.
speak;Angel;Your dad don't care much about people like me.|You have no idea how poor the slums of your own country are, do ya?
speak;Angel;Well, so long as you pay me a pretty penny, I'll help you.
speak;Angel;Life's easy when you're rich, ain't it?|Now... these mid guys are gonna regret smellin' so bad.

name: PeteFight
_source: speak;Pete;Yar har!|Do you think you can stand up to Shanty Pete?;;;boss_convo_left

name: PeteCacti
_source: speak;Cacti;Stand down, at once!|My father owns these lands!;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Pete;Well, missy, your dad ain't here now, is he?|Sad he won't see your blue blood spill!;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Cacti;Defiant cur! I shall smite you!;;;boss_convo_right

name: PeteAngel
_source: speak;Pete;Glasses, you traitor!|I won't stand for mutiny!;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Angel;I'm under new management, girl.|Plus, take a bath. You reek...;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Pete;Yar har! The only thing I smell of, is victory!;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Angel;Is that what we're calling it now...;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Pete;You won't be laughin' when me axe is lodged in your skull, har!;;;boss_convo_left

name: Outro
_source: speak;Cacti;All is clear! Father appears to be drawing near! Nicely done, everyone!
speak;Timothy;Ah, Cacti.|How nice of you to wait for me... Oh!|Are those bodies?
speak;Cacti;Father, these pirates were holding the town hostage!|Luckily, some new friends and I vanquished the evil!
speak;Timothy;Apologies, lost my composure for a second.|It's just that, Arcei is hardly doing well...
speak;Keith;My pops has been taken to Aurelia...|They and Monsdor think themselves judge, jury, and executioner.
speak;Timothy;I'll allow it.|Nobody should have to experience loss, so soon...|Wait, 'we'?
speak;Cacti;I must venture with the prince.
speak;Keith;Cacti's been a great deal of help here.|Plus, it was in their terms...
speak;Cacti;Come on, father. I'm not a delicate flower.
speak;Cacti;Thanks father! Now, let's prepare for our voyage!
speak;Keith;So, where did you sail from?
speak;Timothy;The island of Yunoh.|I went personally to negotiate trade terms...
speak;Timothy;Ah, if only my words would reach Aurelia!|Though, I remain doubtful that would work...|Still, I'll be ready to lend my help! As a master sailor!
speak;Keith;Thank you for your aid, Earl!
speak;Angel;So, we're goin' on a ship journey?
speak;Keith;Yup! We need to rescue my father, before it's too late...
speak;Angel;Well, uh, I'll use my wind magic to turn it behind our sails.
speak;Angel;Not used to hearing thanks from some foppish noble...|But, I'll do whatever.

name: CactiDeath
_source: speak;Keith;Oh no, there goes our ride to Aurelia!

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Helping clear the pirates, Timothy offers his boat to Keith.
narrate;Narrator;Cacti joins them on this oceanic escapade.
narrate;Narrator;Yet, in the North Sea, they face threats from other ships...
speak;Cacti;Right? Sailing is pretty cool.|I've been on trips with father many a time.
speak;Keith;He doesn't exactly look like much of a sailor...
speak;Cacti;When you're near the sea, it's a useful skill to have.|He's fought many naval battles in the past...
speak;Keith;Speaking of your dad... I miss my own...|I suppose I always left him for granted...
speak;Cacti;I hear the Sagemaster is a kind man.|Almost too kind...|That sort of thing puts a target on one's back, I suppose.
speak;Keith;I hope he doesn't die thinking I failed him...|In his time of need...
speak;Cacti;Chin up!|Don't get all mopey with me, your Highness!
speak;Cacti;Please do settle in, though.|It might be a while... and try not to be seasick!
if;game.check_alive('Angel') and game.check_alive('Boey')and game.check_alive('Roag') and game.get_unit('Boey').team == 'player' and game.get_unit('Angel').team == 'player'
base;Ship Interior Day;Sea Winds and Travelers
speak;Timothy;Cacti, you scout out if we're being followed...|I can't shake the feeling...
speak;Keith;It's rather nice out at sea.|A shame we're out here under bad circumstances...
speak;Timothy;I'm happy to help.|Even with the pirates, it's often more peaceful than on land...
speak;Cacti;Seems you were right!|Pirate scum on port side!
speak;Bandit2;Yar har!|By orders of the boss, prepare to be boarded!
speak;Cacti;Seems also we have boats heading towards stern and starboard too...
speak;Timothy;Thank you Cacti, but we're going to need to get rough.|I'll need to focus on steering this, can you kids handle it?
speak;Keith;This isn't my first tussle, my good sir.|I'll send these fools to Davey Jones' locker! Yar!
speak;Cacti;Seems their leader is on one of the other boats...|We'd best dispatch the others before they arrive.
speak;Keith;I'm sure if their leader goes... they'll scurry away!

name: A Gangs Mutiny
_source: speak;Boey;How strange, I'm brought back to you flops!
speak;Roag;I wasn't about that lifestyle.|I cleaned myself up, yup!
speak;Angel;Not my fault you got caught holdin' up people.
speak;Boey;So, whose fault was it?! Mine?!
speak;Boey;I see how it is...|Look, I'm sorry...
speak;Roag;Go you, girl!|You learnt how to apologise!
speak;Boey;I'm sorry... that you two are delulu!
speak;Angel;Look, we're back together again.|Can we stop this crap?
speak;Roag;I know you guys don't like Sages much...|But he's real nice, trust me.|We should stick together, yah?
speak;Angel;Sure. Even if Apple's not here...
speak;Roag;Oh! I have a lil present for you, Boey!|Consider it a apology!
speak;Boey;What am I going to do with{c:bop_portrait;Boey} A LANCE?!
speak;Roag;Uh, you can spearfish with it...
speak;Boey;Fish?! Gross!|Huh, this does seem... fishy.|Like the way you smell!
speak;Angel;Roag, did you get that for yourself...?
speak;Roag;I don't know what you mean...|But, I'll take it if you don't want it!

name: Head in the Clouds
_source: speak;Landros;The sky out here is so beautiful...
speak;Landros;Yup, I was thinking about the cloud coverage...|Though, like a flash of lightning...|I've thought of a new bow technique to best you.
speak;Keith;You going to share it with me?
speak;Landros;Well, no.|I won't be a better archer than you like that...
speak;Sal;I didn't know you were so competitive...
speak;Landros;Well, I can try when I want to.
speak;Keith;Well, at least this new technique should help us in the future!
speak;Landros;Of course!|Watch out foes, my arrows will hit their mark!

name: Verdant Manes
_source: speak;Cacti;Wow, what wonderful hair you have...
speak;Cacti;Huh?{c:wait;400} Sorry, I haven't seen anyone else with... green hair.
speak;Frost;It's common where I am from, in Arborst.
speak;Frost;It's delightful... but so sheltered.|I've never been on a boat before... I feel rather queasy...
speak;Cacti;Hah! Seasickness will pass, trust me!
speak;Cacti;Say... could you teach me more about Arborst...
speak;Frost;Of course...|Arborst lies on the far west of the continent...|Our people typically have green hair and are very mgaically gifted.
speak;Cacti;I always have been good at magic...
speak;Frost;We don't often allow insiders in...|With exceptions for very talented people, I suppose...
speak;Cacti;Do Arborstians often... settle down, with outsiders?
speak;Frost;Sometimes...|Though children don't always bear the magical capabilities...
speak;Cacti;I see...|It does make me wonder, if mother...|Hm, not that it matters. She never sees me.
speak;Cacti;At least I have you, eh?
speak;Cacti;Thank you.|I'd love to hear more, sometime...

name: Apple
_source: speak;Boey;Haha! Time to relax down here, while those flops fight it out!|Boey, you are a genius!
speak;Apple;I wouldn't be so sure about that.
speak;Apple;C'mon, we both know that's a lie.
speak;Apple;Who else could pull off this hat with these boots?
speak;Boey;I wasn't slacking off, I swear!
speak;Apple;Ahuh, right...|Anyway, I was supposed to be hiding in here.|I heard this ship was heading straight to Aurelia.
speak;Apple;I wasn't gonna let them catch me.
speak;Boey;Well, we're fighting for the prince.
speak;Apple;Nah, it's good.|Easy money, new life, what else can be better?
speak;Boey;Well, uh...|I'd like it if you fought out there with us.
speak;Apple;Sure, sure.|Y'all need me anyway, like old times.
speak;Angel;I guess I'll just tell the boss there's an ugly stowaway on board...
speak;Apple;You always had a way with words.
speak;Apple;Look, I was hiding from Pete and that nasty ass crew.
speak;Angel;You! I had to deal with his nasty ass stench!
speak;Angel;Wish I'd have thought about that...
speak;Apple;I wasn't gonna let them force me to fight.|I'd rather die than be near their sweaty, gross... Urk...
speak;Angel;Well, we're fighting for Prince Sages.
speak;Apple;Easy money, new life...|I was hiding here, because I heard we were off to Aurelia.|They're much more fashionable...
speak;Angel;Well, uh... I think we're going there...?|Anyways, you'll need to give us a hand, freeloader.
speak;Apple;Sure, sure. I'll help out.|I feel bad for leaving you with stanky Pete before...

name: TimDeath
_source: speak;Timothy;Well, this isn't... Where are you, Cact-

name: CactiDeath
_source: speak;Timothy;Cacti... No... NO!|You fiends! Why... How could I let this happen...?

name: Turn3
_source: speak;Timothy;More of them to handle...|Give up, you crones!

name: Turn9
_source: speak;Brug;This is for Shanty Pete, you landlubbin' vermin!|I'll leave yer bodies in a salty grave!
speak;Timothy;There's their leader.|If we defeat him, they should lay off!

name: FightBrug
_source: speak;Brug;Pete was all I had, ya hear?!|I'll damn ye to a grave at the bottom of the sea!;;;boss_convo_left

name: Outro
_source: speak;Timothy;Thanks for the help.|Should be smooth sailing from here.
speak;Keith;I do feel slightly bad...|That guy cared about his leader...
speak;Cacti;Then he ought to have realised how stupid attacking us was.|If he really cared, he should have just lived.
speak;Timothy;I believe you two should rest, we might have trouble when we arrive...
speak;Keith;I'm very sorry... It's my fault for dragging her into this...
speak;Timothy;Yes, it is.|But, she was her own girl...|I couldn't stop her seeking adventure.
speak;Timothy;I'll see you to Aurelia, lest this be for nothing...|I'll bury her in her mother's homeland...|However will I explain this...
speak;Keith;You were out there helping us, how did you...?
if;game.check_alive('Angel') and game.check_alive('Boey') and game.get_unit('Boey').team == 'player' and game.get_unit('Angel').team == 'player'
speak;Apple;Long story, but I've known Boey and Angel for a while.
speak;Apple;Long story, but I've known Boey for a while.
speak;Apple;Long story, but I've known Angel for a while.
speak;Keith;Well, glad you're with us.|Nice hat!
speak;Apple;Ha! You know the finer things in life.|I'll work as hard as will keep trouble off our backs.
speak;Apple;My parents were hardly creative.|Probably just named me after the first thing they saw on the table.
speak;Keith;Well, we should be landing soon, so get ready!

name: DualAssist
_source: elif;not is_dead('Gemini_M') and 'Gemini_M' not in [u.nid for u in game.get_travelers()]
elif;not is_dead('Gemini_F') and 'Gemini_F' not in [u.nid for u in game.get_travelers()]

name: ArmorMarch
_source: if;any([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit.position, 1) if 'Armor' in u.tags and u.nid != unit.nid])
for;ally_armor;[u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit.position, 1) if 'Armor' in u.tags]

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;While Keith heads to Aurelia by ship, Leap heads to the Khonsu desert.
narrate;Narrator;The largest tribe, the Za'hul, have a temple near an oasis.
narrate;Narrator;Needless to say, the trip was not enjoyable...
speak;Prof;Try being in a giant suit of armor...
speak;Leap;But... we have to push on...
speak;Prof;At least we should be approaching the first tribal settlement soon.
speak;Leap;We should take a break first...|Ah...
speak;Leap;Is that... bandits? Or a mirage...?
speak;Flaco;Weak, so weak!|Not even brick will stop me!
speak;Ahmari;This is getting old, real fast.|I'm gonna have to cave their heads in, teach 'em a lesson!
speak;Prof;Could be our opportunity to gain allies...
speak;Leap;Gah! We have to stop it!

name: Winging it
_source: speak;Siri;Hello there, glasses boss!|This sun... the feeling on my skin...
speak;Siri;Oh? Is that so?|I like the burn, makes me feel alive!
speak;Prof;You're not walking through the sand too...
speak;Siri;I'll give you a lift if I can, though you're pretty heavy...
speak;Siri;Anyway, I'll try my best out here, yeah?
speak;Prof;Please... I don't know if I can...

name: Sunshine Son
_source: speak;Blazing;Are you feeling well...? The sun is rather hot.
speak;Blazing;Well, I suppose I am.|My faith in the Goddess seems to shield my thoughts of pain...
speak;Leap;I was a believer once, but never again.
speak;Blazing;I'll respect your decision, we should live our lives as we wish.
speak;Leap;Thanks... Though, don't you think being opposed to Aurelia is a sin?
speak;Blazing;I think not.|The Goddess knows all, include the sins of the nation founded in her image.
speak;Blazing;We must all strive to do better.|That's why I'm resolved to helping you.

name: LeapAhmari
_source: speak;Leap;I'm... not with them.|I want to help...
speak;Ahmari;Hm, you don't seem in any position to harm me.|Well, I welcome your kin, northern wanderer!|I am Chief Ahmari, of the Za'hul.
speak;Ahmari;After this battle, I will find you some shelter, young one.|Until then, we fight on!

name: House1
_source: speak;OldWoman1;Hello, dearie...|Oh, it's warm here? Yes, obviously.|Take this, to cool down.

name: House2
_source: speak;Boy1;Oh, hi.|Hello? Helloooo?|You. Yeah, you.|This is my house!|...|Ok, take this and leave, you're scaring me...

name: Outro
_source: speak;Ahmari;I must thank you, outlanders.|It is rare we see those of other countries.|However, I feel glad to have you here.
speak;Prof;We're here with a proposal, not just aid.
speak;Ahmari;Bahaha! Shrewd you are.|Fortunately, the Za'hul show our gratitude.
speak;Prof;Aurelia and Monsdor threaten our people, we aren't strong enough...
speak;Ahmari;Hm, my tribe would not wish for a massacre.|We haven't the numbers for that.
speak;Prof;We figured it might be a ridiculous request, but still...
speak;Ahmari;Hm... I will try and think it over.
speak;Ahmari;Youngling, you are very tired...|We must go indoors, out of this heat.
speak;Ahmari;You are powerful warrior too.|We will get along well.

name: FlacoFight
_source: speak;Flaco;Quit gettin' in the way!|These sands, are ours!;;;boss_convo_left

name: New Event
_source: speak;Kesley;Just another FYI to people, don't listen to anyone that says I'm racist or homophobic lol.|I don't hate any races, and just because I typically don't ship homosexual pairings doesn't make me a homophobe.|And I'm friends with LGBT+ people and am in that group myself as an asexual.;;200;;;;;;3

name: Intro
_source: speak;Leap;Wow... The heat is something else...|Much cooler in here... thank you.
speak;Ahmari;I am surprised the tin man here is fine.
speak;Prof;Oh, I was in agony.|But I'd do anything for Leap...
speak;Ahmari;You wished to discuss aid.|The Za'hul are in your debt.|However, Aurelia, Monsdor... They are very powerful.
speak;Leap;Ah... Well, yeah, I guess...|But, I saw you out there!
speak;Ahmari;Ha! In one-on-one combat, I could take any Aurelian!|But, they have numbers over us.
speak;Leap;What if we asked for other tribes to help?
speak;Ahmari;Unlikely. We mind our own business, try not to ruffle each others feathers.|Although... I sense someone.
speak;Hakeem;Hello. Chief Ahmari, of the Za'hul.
speak;Ahmari;Chief Hakeem, of the Yuta.|What business do you have here?
speak;Hakeem;I was wondering if we may chat in private.|Urgent business concerns our people, as a whole.
speak;Prof;I wonder if Aurelia is involved.|They might be trying to gain favour too...
speak;Leap;Aurelians are so judgemental...|They probably hate these people because of their different ways...|It's terrible!
speak;Prof;I suppose you're right.|From my knowledge, Aurelia's religious roots...|They definitely limit certain expressions...
speak;Esteban;You guys best be prepared, eh?|This is the location he told us.
speak;Kesley;I hear these uneducated sand bandits are dangerous!
speak;Chess;Is that so?|We've been shown hospitality so far by Chief Hakeem.
speak;Kesley;Idiot! It's a trap!|Tell him, Sir Esteban!
speak;Chess;We're just here to talk.|Only fight if we need to.
speak;Kesley;Look, Sir Esteban!|I don't hate any groups of people, I just think we are more civilised!|That's all it is!
speak;Esteban;Eh...|Look, I don't like the sand too much.|It's coarse, rough, and gets everywhere!|You two handle this, eh?
speak;Kesley;Yay! A chance to show my worth!

speak;Esteban;Eh... It's decided already.|You go, do what that Chief asked of us.|Her Majesty wants a base in the desert, stationed near Arcei and Grahment.|He wants the other tribes wiped out.|Win-win, eh?
speak;Chess;I suppose, though Kesley ought to not go overboard, again.
speak;Kesley;Shut it, stache!|You don't have any respect for our order! Tell him, Sir!

speak;Esteban;Just get on with your jobs, alright? I'm heading back.|Bigger fish to fry for me.|Also, look out for our tribal friends, eh?|Their stealth is impeccable, they may already be in there.|Anyways... so long.
speak;Kesley;Come, Chess! We must seize this fort!|I bet it's so dirty...|On second thoughts, you start the raid!|I'll come in after you clear the initial... mess.
speak;Kesley;Foul beasts, stand aside!|This fort belongs to the new world!
speak;Leap;We're surrounded!|That Chief, is he working with Aurelia?
speak;Prof;Who knows, but I'd rather not die waiting here!

name: KesleyFight
_source: speak;Kesley;You don't look like the uncivilised type...|What are you doing?;;;boss_convo_left

name: HakeemFight
_source: speak;Hakeem;You outlanders meddle in our affairs.|I'll enjoy severing your limbs.;;;boss_convo_left

name: KesleyChess
_source: speak;Kesley;Chess... Why is your lance pointed at me...?;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Chess;Look, I don't see the point in all this.|Plus, I find you to be petulant and annoying.|Really throws off my focus.;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Kesley;I am not petulant!|Now, you'll feel my wrath for siding with these utter barbarians!;;;boss_convo_left

name: KesleyDeath
_source: speak;Kesley;I must fall back, I cannot lose to these savages...

name: HakeemDeath
_source: speak;Hakeem;You have... disturbed the sands...|Damn you all...

name: KesleyDeathTurn
_source: speak;Hakeem;The Yuta are the supreme tribe!|We will seize control of the desert!|You have grown weak, Za'hul.
speak;Ahmari;Weak? Says the guy who had to ambush me!
speak;Hakeem;Weak of mind.|You fools do not deserve the blessed sands of Khonsu!
speak;Ahmari;Hah! I'll crush you into a grain of sand myself, puppet!

name: Outro
_source: speak;Ahmari;Heh, you young'uns are real powerful...|I should never have let Hakeem get the drop on me.
speak;Ahmari;Our tribes have never lived peacefully.|Though, he seemed more furious than normal...
speak;Ahmari;The prevailing winds were ours, that's that.
speak;Leap;In the end, we caused more trouble...
speak;Ahmari;No, you do not see clearly.|You helped me, without you, my tribe would be in danger...|Here, I have an offering.
speak;Prof;Come, Leap.{c:wait;500}We did what we had to.
speak;Ahmari;Here is Joker, he is a powerful right-hand for the tribe.
speak;Joker;I am not great with outsiders...|But, Ahmari said you are good people.
speak;Ahmari;I gave Joker our dragon axe, which should help you take down Monsdor.|Their wyverns will be dust beneath its might!
speak;Prof;Thank you, chief.|Though, I thought you were unfamiliar with outsiders?
speak;Ahmari;Many years ago, we had fought Monsdor.|They have stolen our precious axe, Parashu...
speak;Leap;How awful...|Are you coming with us to get it back?
speak;Ahmari;With Hakeem's passing...|I am reminded of the fragility of peace between our tribes...|I must resolve this first. Revenge can wait.
speak;Ahmari;A warrior fights to the end!|But, a great warrior knows when to strike.|Now is not the time...
speak;Joker;Well... fight I shall, for the pride of the Za'hul!

name: AhmariDeath
_source: speak;Ahmari;The sun... is going cold...|Hakeem, why...?

name: ChessLeap
_source: speak;Chess;Uh, you're with the enemy right?
speak;Leap;Oh trust me, my anger is nearly boiling over...
speak;Chess;Yet, you can contain it.|Unlike my annoying ally...
speak;Chess;I'm a soldier, first and foremost.|But... I can hardly endure spending time in my regiment...|All my patience is eroding, slowly but surely.
speak;Leap;You could join us?|It'd be better for you not to die here, either.
speak;Chess;I wasn't planning on dying...|Though looking at how my allies are faring...|Deal.
speak;Chess;I'm called Chess.|Ironic, since I've spent my whole life as a piece to be controlled.|No more! I choose my own direction now!

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Following the defeat of the Yuta tribesman Hakeem, Ahmari lends aid to Leap.
narrate;Narrator;Joker, a tribesman, lends his arms and a dragon axe.
narrate;Narrator;Though engagement with Monsdor would occur sooner than expected...
speak;Leap;We're on our way to Monsdor...|They've attacked our towns, our people...
speak;Prof;We should probably prepare our things, we're almost at the border.
speak;Joker;Good, I am itching to use this powerful axe...
speak;Esteban;Hm, you're going yourself, Father Vance?
speak;Vance;I'm more than a priest, Sir Esteban.|I am a tactical mind, too.
speak;Vance;I am aware of the rumours.|A small posse trying to flank us via the desert?|Honestly, I find it to be childs play.
speak;Esteban;Yeah, I suppose.|My subordinates were sent with the Yuta tribe...|If you face trouble, clearly they failed.
speak;Vance;You Aurelians ought to train harder! Like us!
speak;Esteban;I wouldn't be speak as such, eh?|After all, you failed to take out this 'small posse'.
speak;Vance;Hmph, you guys didn't capture the Sagemaster!|King Oberon did!
speak;Esteban;This arguing is... fruitless and unnecessary, no?|*Sigh* I'll move on. Good luck.
speak;Esteban;With any luck, the Goddess will give him a better personality...
speak;Joker;Sorry. I'll tear these guys to shreds... to apologise.
speak;Leap;They think they're so smart?|We'll just use our superior tactics, hey Prof?
speak;Prof;Uh... I don't have anything, yet...
speak;Leap;Hm... I guess we just have to wade through the sand...
speak;Vance;Hohoho! They're trapped in the deep sands! Advance troops!|Make it quick, I really don't wish to miss dinner!
speak;Leap;That's their tactician?|I'll make him feel the way I feel!
speak;Leap;I'll do it through you guys!|Go, go!
speak;Joker;Sure thing, I'll unleash the beast! RAAAAARGH!
speak;Prof;This is going to be a hell of a time...

name: Treasure Hunter
_source: speak;Speedy;My thief intuition.|I know that there are three treasures ahead.
speak;Speedy;I'll show you soon enough.|As a thief, I can spot them easily.|Others? Might need some luck.
speak;Speedy;Better hope you're lucky, or you could send me.

name: MaxKill
_source: speak;MaxYoung;Hm, I don't know if I'll get used to... killing people...

name: VanceFight
_source: speak;Vance;Frankly, the world would be better without your ilk.|The Goddess' mercy is undeserved here, feel eternal damnation!;;;boss_convo_left

name: Outro
_source: speak;Prof;We did well, but this is just the start!|Monsdor will be bit where it hurts soon, their pockets.
speak;Prof;I think we should hit them in their supplies...|They'll just send more endless waves of soldiers otherwise...
speak;Leap;I suppose hitting their weaponry and such would leave them out of commission...
speak;Emmanuel;I didn't ask for awe, though I suppose it is only natural.|I, Prince Emmanuel of Monsdor, radiate pure charisma.
speak;Prof;The only thing radiating from you, is your noxious cologne...
speak;Leap;What do you want? Why are you here?
speak;Emmanuel;Encroaching on our borders... killing our soldiers...|Why else do you think I've taken a fascination to you?
speak;Prof;Well, what are you going to do?
speak;Emmanuel;Do not worry, I will not kill you! Yet.|You vermin have killed both Monsdorian and Aurelian alike...|Your corpses would be a wonderful wedding gift to my Aurelian bride-to-be.
speak;Emmanuel;If you do not struggle, I will allow you to live, for the time being.|A live pet is far more interesting... now bark for me, dogs!
speak;Emmanuel;Hmph, I have good collars for you, Grahmentian mutts!
speak;Prof;Leap... we're outnumbered...|We can't be too risky...
speak;Leap;I know... but... urgh! Why do we have to keep getting taken prisoner!|This isn't fair! Not fair at all! Hmgrah!
speak;Emmanuel;Your emotional displays are cute...|You'd make a perfect gift indeed...
speak;Prof;I don't see any other choice...
speak;Emmanuel;Splendid! Now, if you wanted to see Monsdor...|Your wish is granted, hahahaha! Capture them all, then we fly!
speak;Eff;How fascinating...|This truly is a masterpiece...
speak;Helia;It's so nice to finally meet you!
speak;Eff;Well, I'm not normally one for romance novels...|But, you caught me at a strange time... 'dear'...?
speak;Helia;Oh! I love romance novels!|My favourite is 'A sea apart'!
speak;Eff;I've read it, not bad.|Though this love story ends in a tragedy, it seems.
speak;Eff;Such is the cruel world we live in...
speak;Helia;I'm so glad... you're so studious...
speak;Eff;Well, thank you! Though... I forgot to ask what your business was here.
speak;Helia;But, we're due to be married?{c:wait;100} Aren't we?!{c:wait;100} Oh no! It was all a trick!
speak;Eff;Oh, you're the Aurelian princess.|Sorry, but I'm Eff, not Emmanuel.
speak;Helia;Oh! Welll... I'm so sorry for wasting your time!
speak;Eff;Don't be! Stay, if you'd like, until he returns.|I can offer you the plethora of novels in our library.
speak;Helia;Hello, Emmanuel.|I wanted to stop by, since our wedding is soon...|I wanted us to grow closer before then.
speak;Emmanuel;Ah, yes. A pleasure to finally meet.|I expected... a grander style...
speak;Emmanuel;I suppose I confused you and your sister...
speak;Eff;Come, Emmanuel. You needn't be so rude.
speak;Emmanuel;Brother, oh brother. Nobody asked your opinion!|If she is to be my wife, my opinion of her matters, not yours.
speak;Emmanuel;I took some Grahmentian dogs as prisoners on my trip.|They killed some of your countrymen too, Helia.
speak;Emmanuel;Indeed, my deeds must be thanked.|I will soon relinquish them to Aurelia, to deepen our countries bonds.
speak;Emmanuel;One day, we will be the strongest couple in the world...
speak;Emmanuel;I must be off to deal with the prisoners.|Stay here, I'd rather you not be exposed to such vermin.
speak;Eff;Are you... alright?|He might be my brother, but he's one of the worst men I know.
speak;Helia;I just... don't know how nobody takes issue with all this blood...|Maybe my sister should have been here instead...
speak;Eff;Siblings are hard work, especially being compared to them constantly...|Oberon does that with me and Emmanuel all the time...|Likewise, not my fault pointless bloodshed isn't my style.
speak;Helia;I do still worry for Dawn, she seems so naive...|Though it seems I'm even moreso...
speak;Eff;Maybe so. An arranged marriage to Emmanuel is... more like a prison sentence.|However, I'm here for you, if you need me, that is.
speak;Eff;Just remember, a true noble is so due to their heart, not their appearance.|Not that yours is bad! Of course...
speak;Eff;I weep for the prisoners he's taken...|But, I can't defy my country...
speak;Helia;Neither can I, we're both pieces in this twisted game...
speak;Eff;I suppose so, but it'll be alright, we have more chapters until the end of this novel...

name: New Event
_source: speak;Emeline;What if they want the crown, I can't die yet!|I won't let anyone undermine me, not even family...|All of these teachings, scriptures, the Goddess...|It's all meaningless! How could she allow this?!|No, the only Goddess that exists in this realm, is me!

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;After sailing for a couple days, Keith draws nearer to Aurelia.
narrate;Narrator;However, at Blackmaw, preparations are being made...
speak;Max;I believe so...|The fire orb in the watchtower is ready.
speak;Xeconis;Clearly you didn't want the risk of being in actual harms way?
speak;Pit;I'm so nervous, still... This is my first real battle...
speak;Max;It'll be fine, trust me.|We hold the defensive at least.
speak;Pit;Oh! Hum... We should probably get to our position!
speak;Max;Good idea, break a leg, you two!
speak;Xeconis;To be called out for this...|I suppose Glaceil is nearby enough...
speak;Talia;Her Majesty trusts our abilities.|As such, I have no fears of the outcome.
speak;Xeconis;It's just... Arcei's prince is advancing on us.|We have his father at possible threat of execution, thanks to Monsdor...
speak;Xeconis;It's just, the emotions of needing to rescue his father...
speak;Talia;Fighting those with something to lose may be dangerous.|But, we have many precautions taken, thus, fear is illogical.
speak;Xeconis;Call me a pessimist, but I just feel as though this is fruitless.
speak;Talia;We haven't much choice but to believe, our home depends on our wage.|Blood spilled is money earned, the army pays generously.
speak;Talia;To arms, Xeco.|We'll see tomorrow's light.
speak;Timothy;We're landing in Lundport, seems fortified.
speak;Keith;Oh! They're having a party to celebrate our arrival!
speak;Timothy;It's been an honour sailing with you, your Highness.|I will try to help out with healing...|But, I'll stay back, where possible.
speak;Keith;This isn't your battle to fight, I understand completely.
speak;Timothy;I've already lost my daughter... I can't bear to let my wife down anymore...
speak;Keith;It won't be in vain, Sir...
speak;Timothy;I hope Cacti will remain safe...
speak;Keith;Say, why is she called... that?
speak;Timothy;A tradition of my wife's family, not my idea.
speak;Sal;Everyone is gearing up for battle, we're with you, all the way.
speak;Timothy;You're fortunate to be surrounded by such staunch allies...|Now, land-ho!
speak;Keith;Soldiers of Aurelia, you face Prince Keith of Arcei!|I will not rest until my father is safely returned!
speak;Talia;No quarter. We must survive, well...
speak;Talia;Forget it, we will all prevail. To arms!

name: Turn1
_source: speak;Timothy;That soldier appears to have control of the gate.|We should be able to progress after defeating him.

name: LucianRegion
_source: speak;Lucian;My appearance is a moral booster, obviously.
speak;Talia;Well, things aren't going amazingly, as you can see...|Prince Keith leads the offensive...|We might need more forces.
speak;Lucian;I see, I will provide them.|As well as this, observe.
speak;Lucian;I have important business elsewhere, farewell.
speak;Talia;It won't be enough, will it...?

name: Gate
_source: speak;Talia;If we're to fall here, you should run.
speak;Xeconis;I thought we were going to win easily?
speak;Xeconis;I won't allow it, I'm not giving up that easily.
speak;Talia;Sorry Xeco, if one of us must fall...

name: MaxFight
_source: speak;Max;Her Majesty really wants your heads.|I don't care personally, but we need food on the table.|Good luck...;;;boss_convo_left

name: PitFight
_source: speak;Pit;Uhm, what?|Don't look at me like that!;;;boss_convo_left

name: XeconisFight
_source: speak;Xeconis;You're the perfect test for my lance skills.|En garde!;;;boss_convo_left

name: MaxSal
_source: speak;Max;I think I remember your face... Minus the eyepatch.;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Clearly, I should have let you die on that day.;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Max;Look, we may not see eye to eye, but let's not be hasty...;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Joking from that perch of yours...|Come closer and we'll have twinning eyepatches!;;;boss_convo_right
