name: XeconisRetreat
_source: speak;Xeconis;How could I be so careless...?
speak;Max;Xec! I'm sorry, but we can't let this be it...|Pit! Come!
speak;Max;Captain's orders...|She wants down with the ship, so to speak.
speak;Max;Sorry commander, didn't want it to come to this...
speak;Talia;So long as you live...|My lance skills may live on.

name: TaliaDeath
_source: speak;Talia;I feel the cold tundra air...|Xeconis, stay safe...

name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Aurelia's northern forces have been crippled.
narrate;Narrator;Talia fell, Xeconis injured, and many other lives lost.
narrate;Narrator;While Keith hides in the countryside following his victory...
narrate;Narrator;Max and Pit take their friend home, to Glaceil.
narrate;Narrator;The pair help Xeconis recuperate from his injuries.
narrate;Narrator;Meanwhile, Queen Emeline hears of Keith's presence in the north.
narrate;Narrator;Angered by this news, she ventures to Glaceil for more information.
speak;Max;Mate... you're going to be alright...|We've still got so much to do!
speak;Pit;That was terrifying!|Still, I wish I could have done more...
speak;Xeconis;Prince Keith has mounted a powerful offense.
speak;Max;King Oberon of Monsdor and her Majesty...
speak;Xeconis;They just want more fuel on the fire.|More bodies to pile high... Talia's included.
speak;Pit;She wanted you to live above all else...
speak;Xeconis;I'm not proud of it either, I stood too stubbornly.|Digging in my heels was the wrong move.
speak;Max;Your Majesty...{c:wait;200} and Sir Skill?|What a pleasant surprise... Though we really need to rest...
speak;Skill;Dastard! You will stay present when her Majesty wishes.
speak;Max;...{c:wait;400} Your Majesty, what do you wish to talk to us about?
speak;Max;At the battle? Sure, he was there...|Needless to say, he's not holding back.
speak;Emeline;He's... enacting revenge, for his father...?
speak;Pit;Uhm, can't say I'd appreciate having my pa be taken prisoner.
speak;Skill;As you probably know, Monsdor the Sagemaster detained.|It appears the Prince may be a diversion...
speak;Max;You're suggesting he has allies ready to strike Monsdor?
speak;Emeline;It's currently unclear...|Uncle has been working tirelessly on our partnership...
speak;Max;Your uncle? I believe he was at the battle to send reinforcements...
speak;Emeline;He's so on top of things...
speak;Max;Didn't want to stay for too long though...|As far as I'm aware, he had other business.
speak;Emeline;So, no other news on Prince Keith's whereabouts?
speak;Pit;The Algid highlands are a lot of ground to cover, you see...|Still, there's a chance the freezing nights kill him.
speak;Max;Very well? It isn't well at all!|How could you let this happen?
speak;Skill;Cur! How dare you insult her Majesty!
speak;Max;Don't threaten us, Sir Skill.|You know failure as well as we do.
speak;Skill;Still, no offense to her Majesty!|You didn't mean that, right?{c:bop_portrait;Skill} Right?
speak;Emeline;Stand down, Sir Skill.|He's right... I should have done more on fortifying our borders...|I'm just... so overwhelmed....
speak;Skill;Overwhelmed? We must head home with haste!|You need rest.
speak;Emeline;Ah, thank you for the gracious offer...
speak;Skill;The village is rather, austere, for her Majesty.
speak;Emeline;Sir Skill! How rude...|Of course, I accept your offer.
speak;Skill;We did see a campsite on the way here...|I wonder if the campers are alright.
speak;Pit;Campers? Oh no!|They'll be dog food soon!
speak;Emeline;I must help my subjects...|No matter the discomfort.
speak;Skill;As you wish. How noble, your Majesty!
speak;Morshu;Wolves? Defeat them! Shoo them, now!
speak;Morshu;How meddlesome, these wolves best not ruin everything...
speak;Emeline;I can barely see a thing...|Or feel my hands...
speak;Max;Sure you're up for it, your Majesty?
speak;Emeline;I have to try... As Queen, I must...
speak;Pit;They're out there in the fog...
speak;;Skill will leave the party at the end of the chapter. His sword cannot be traded.;center;;hint;;red

name: Outro
_source: speak;Talia;Hah... I miscalculated...|You're stronger than I thought...
speak;Keith;You Aurelians...|My father is an innocent man!
speak;Talia;Aren't we all...|None of us want war... Nobody sane.
speak;Talia;I just want my village to be alright... Xeconis...
speak;Keith;Man... this doesn't get any easier...
speak;Sal;You're right, I recognised some faces among the soldiers.|I didn't know them very well, of course, but still...
speak;Keith;I suppose to save father, I'm depriving others of their family...
speak;Sal;War is a cruel mistress, but our country needs his Majesty.|It's an injustice!
speak;Keith;Where next, you know Aurelia, right?
speak;Sal;It will be dark soon enough, we'd best find somewhere to camp out...
speak;Keith;Good idea, though we're in enemy lines...
speak;Sal;I'll figure out something, we should head for the snowy countryside first.
speak;Keith;To stay hidden, very clever, Sal!
speak;Sal;And an early night for you, Prince Keith!
s;Cacti;I don't know what I'll return home to...
s;Keith;We'll hold a funeral for him...
speak;Timothy;Before you continue, I'd like to thank you, your Highness.|I haven't felt butterflies like this in a while...
speak;Timothy;I'll be sailing home now, though.|This has been enough stress for a lifetime, hah!
speak;Keith;I understand.|If we save father, I suppose they'd expect a boat...
speak;Cacti;Dad, I must stay on this journey.|I hope you understand
speak;Timothy;Of course, but I won't stop worrying over you!
speak;Timothy;I'll hold a funeral for Cacti when I return home...
speak;Timothy;Now, I bid you safe travels.

name: LoseMax
_source: speak;Max;To be nothing but a wolf's supper... urgh...

name: LoseSkill
_source: speak;Skill;Your Majesty... it's been an honour.

name: Turn3
_source: speak;Xeconis;I'm fine, really.|Just a flesh wound, as I said.
speak;Pit;Uhm, I hope you're ready for wolves...
speak;Xeconis;Elementary, really.|They are no match for superior minds.

name: Outro
_source: speak;Emeline;Are you alright there? Are you hurt?|Or c-cold...?
speak;Morshu;A-Ah, your Majesty!|Why, this humble merchant thanks you for your aid!
speak;Emeline;You don't seem s-surprised to see me...
speak;Morshu;Ah, well...|I have met many an important person in my travels!|Royalty is hardly a sight these days!
speak;Skill;Oh! Ah, yes.|I was focused on the bracing cold...|We'd best head back inside...
speak;Emeline;Are your supplies all okay, merchant?
speak;Morshu;Of course, my stock is my lifeblood!|I would protect it to the end.|Though, I can't leave you going empty handed...
speak;Emeline;I don't need a reward, your safety is enough-
speak;Morshu;No, no! That won't do.{c:wait;300} I insist!|You use a sword, hm? Maybe this antique blade?|I found it in my travels on another continent.
speak;Morshu;If you wish to be an inspiring leader...|A precious blade like this may do the trick!|It's very powerful, why, I saw a master swordsman use it...|His foes crumbled to dust, I tell you!
speak;Emeline;Powerful...|Yes, it's perfect. I never asked your name?
speak;Skill;Stay safe, Morshu.|Your Majesty, we'd b-best get back to the village...|Put a fire on...
speak;Morshu;Hehehe... That old blade...|My apologies, your Majesty... you should take care!|Waha{c:wait;200}haha{c:wait;200}hahaha!
speak;Max;Xec, you seem back on top form already...
speak;Xeconis;Of course, it was just...|A minor misplay...
speak;Xeconis;We should turn in for the night.
speak;Emeline;I apologise for my failures... Your friend...|She did not deserve to perish.|I should have prepared greater for a naval assault...
speak;Max;Look, I was also out of line.|Besides, you have advisors, right?|I'm surprised they didn't catch that too.
speak;Emeline;Thank you...|I have a task for you, tomorrow, if you're willing.|I've seen your fine work out there...|But, I'm hoping this is lighter work than our current war front.
speak;Xeconis;No need to worry on our part, what are our orders?
speak;Emeline;The church in Theowa, I'd like you to help out there.
speak;Emeline;Recently, funds have been disappearing from the orphanage.|Father Cornelius tells me there's not enough left for food...|Being stretched thin as is, I wasn't sure who to-
speak;Emeline;He is lending his aid wherever he can.|He also provides excellent counsel, you've met him before?
speak;Xeconis;Oh, no. Only heard of the name.|We'll get to it, after some much needed slumber.|I'll show you to our spare room, even if it's humble for royalty.

name: Turn5
_source: speak;Emeline;Brrr... I can barely f-feel my face...
speak;Xeconis;The weather is cruel this time of year.
speak;Xeconis;Cold snap... Hm...|We might have to prepare for a full assault from all angles.

name: Rout
_source: speak;Xeconis;I think all the wolves are gone...|Great job everyone.

name: XeconisSal
_source: speak;Xeconis;Funny how things work out, isn't it?;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Sal;Not at all.|You're just another face amongst those I must end.|For Sages!;;;boss_convo_right

name: GuyFlee
_source: speak;Guy;You two... left me all alone...|I don't want to die here too...

name: Intro
_source: speak;Pit;Bandits are much less scary than a trained enemy...
speak;Xeconis;I trust our quaint village was hospitable?
speak;Emeline;Other than shivering myself to sleep...|And meagre breakfast...|Not bad, thank you!
speak;Emeline;He vowed to find Prince Keith.|He's searching far around the highlands.
speak;Max;I suppose he wants to get even with him...
speak;Xeconis;I thought he was your guardian.
speak;Emeline;I didn't wish to quell his determination...|He's so... wonderful...
speak;Pit;So that means we're going together?
speak;Emeline;Indeed. Father Cornelius and I have matters to discuss.
speak;Xeconis;It's only logical that we help protect you.
speak;Cornelius;Ah, your Majesty.|How divine to see you again.|And... you are?
speak;Emeline;Father, your report said the orphanage was robbed?
speak;Cornelius;How terrible it is.|Such heathens ought to be purged for robbing these children of their meals.
speak;Cornelius;We believe they're fortified at the river.|Other knights had been sent out to corner them, but...|They may be outnumbered.
speak;Emeline;Noted, we'll have to help them.
speak;Emeline;I am, I have to help...|But, you also stated you had other business to discuss?
speak;Cornelius;I believe it'd be best to resolve this, first.|I have faith in you, your Majesty... and Sir Conals.
speak;Howai;Oh! Father Cornelius, who is this?|Oh, no way!|{c:move_portait;Howai;FarRight}It's her Majesty!
speak;Howai;They're on super cool hero business, right?
speak;Howai;I wanna come!{bop_portrait;Howai}|Oh! Dark and Lumii should come too!
speak;Howai;You always say that we should help those in need!|Besides, you taught me how to heal!
speak;Xeconis;I wasn't aware this would be a babysitting mission...
speak;Cornelius;I suppose it'd do the young ones good to show them reality...
speak;Emeline;Father, are you sure...?|They could fall...
speak;Cornelius;A capable leader could command any army to victory.|Show me the leader I know you can be.
speak;Emeline;You're right... Alright, we can do this.
speak;Cornelius;Ah, yes.|Shini is also a helper at the orphanage.|He can accompany you.
speak;Shini;Trust me, I'm a useful pair of hands.|I'm a mercenary, used to be in a life of sin.|I'm hoping to repent by raising funds for the church.
speak;Xeconis;If that is all, thank you, Father Cornelius.
speak;Emeline;Yes, we shall pick this up again, later.
speak;Shini;Alright kiddos, we're nearing the bandits.
speak;Howai;Hooray! We get to do cool stuff!
speak;Dark;Not my fault you can't cast fire! Hah!
speak;Shini;Behave now...|Father Cornelius hates it when you bicker...
speak;Dark;He isn't here, though, is he?
speak;Emeline;But I am. I order you to stop!
speak;Lumii;So, these guys took the orphanage's money?
speak;Xeconis;Yes,{c:wait;400} at least one of you is clued in...
speak;Lumii;I'll have to blast them with my magic!|Those disgusting bastards are gonna pay!
speak;Emeline;Now, now.|This is a royal order, we leave now!
speak;Pit;We're also here to save other knights, right?
speak;Max;Looks like they're across the bridge...|Wait, isn't that your sister?
speak;Bandit1;Well, missy. It's your lucky day.|Seems you've got backup.
speak;Viridia;I told you, you should have ran.
speak;Bandit1;Bah! You're real annoying!|I'll just kill ya before they get 'ere!
speak;Viridia;Never, scoundrel!|I'll use necessary force to get that money back!
speak;;Emeline will leave the party at the end of this chapter.|Consider this when managing your inventory.;center;;hint;;red;;menu_bg_parchment

name: PitViridia
_source: speak;Viridia;Pitty Pat? Oh wow, you're here too!|I'm... holding in there...|How was the battle at the harbor?
speak;Viridia;Aw... Well, nobody can hurt you now!|Let your big sister deal with this!
speak;Pit;Vee, you're only older by like... 25 minutes!
speak;Viridia;Aw, Pitty come on...|Alright, I'll get back to fighting... but talk later, yeah?

name: EmelineViridia
_source: speak;Viridia;I'm doing... alright.|Huh? Your Majesty?! What are you doing here?
speak;Emeline;I wished to help my country, is that so odd?
speak;Viridia;Of course not! Well, maybe...|I guess I just expected you to be hands off...
speak;Viridia;Ah! Most certainly not.|Where are my manners... Viridia, at your service!
speak;Emeline;Thank you, Viridia.|But, you look hurt...
speak;Viridia;I'm fine! Really!|At least now I won't return empty-handed.|Father Cornelius would be furious!
speak;Viridia;Maybe in a few years...|Best we get back to it!

name: IsaacFight
condition: (unit.nid == "Isaac" and unit2.team == 'player' and unit2.nid != 'Emeline) or (unit2.nid == "Isaac" and unit.team == 'player' and unit.nid != 'Emeline)
_source: speak;Isaac;I won't go back!|The Goddess has forsaken us all!;;;boss_convo_left

name: EmelineIsaac
_source: speak;Isaac;Your Majesty?!|The Goddess is a most cruel demon!;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Isaac;You should agree with me!|After all, what happened to your brother?;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Emeline;How dare you speak of him!|I'll sever your tongue!;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Isaac;You may silence me! But you know the truth!|You just don't want to admit it!;;;boss_convo_left

name: Turn5
_source: speak;Isaac;Bah! The Goddess is a cruel heartless wench!|Damn the church{c:wait;400} and damn Father Cornelius!|I won't let them get me...|Fortunately, this gang has more than enough fodder...

name: Outro
_source: speak;Emeline;We recovered the funds.|Turns out a scoundrel in the church colluded with them!
speak;Emeline;Now, Father.|What did you wish to speak about?
speak;Cornelius;Ah, yes.|I believe that Archbishop Jeremiah is...|To put it bluntly, unsuitable.
speak;Cornelius;His son is a notable thief, one who has stolen from the church...|I believe he has been aiding this.
speak;Cornelius;Lord Lucian has his son detained.|Though I suggest we ought to depose the Archbishop, to be safe...
speak;Emeline;I suppose you're right... but who takes his place?
speak;Cornelius;None are fitter than I for this virtuous role.
speak;Emeline;You, Father?|I suppose that makes sense...|You have given me great aid with the divine...
speak;Cornelius;Wonderful, though we must rehabilitate the poor soul...
speak;Emeline;Of course, he will need a demotion to regular priest...|To keep him under observation...
speak;Cornelius;Thank you, your Majesty.|Now, how were the little ones?
speak;Emeline;None of them made it...|I feel so... *Sniff*
speak;Cornelius;How cruel indeed...|I should have known better than to listen to the rugrats...|Though remember, stay strong of heart, your Majesty.
speak;Emeline;Not all of them made it...|I feel so... *Sniff*
speak;Cornelius;How cruel indeed...|I should have known better than to listen to the rugrats...|Though remember, stay strong of heart, your Majesty.
speak;Emeline;They did well! I was surprised at their magical talent!
speak;Cornelius;A reflection of the orphanage's teachings.|How marvellous that they flourished under the Goddess's guidance!
speak;Cornelius;I also had further matters to discuss.|With reports of Prince Keith within our borders...|Palushin has enforced an embargo.
speak;Emeline;Sir Skill is trying his hardest to track them down...|Wait, an embargo? We rely on their metals for our weaponry!
speak;Cornelius;They don't wish to endanger their merchants.|Even with Princess Dawn's plights... the king is unmoved.
speak;Cornelius;More concerning, I am further concerned by reports of necromancy.
speak;Cornelius;Among the ranks of Arcei.|I have witnesses waiting to testify, hold a moment.
speak;Cornelius;Duke Hogarth von Ilkrest, of Grahment.
speak;Hogarth;Ah, charmed to make your acquaintance, your Majesty!|...{c:wait;400} Son...
speak;Nabin;Apologies. Glad to meet you, your Majesty.
speak;Emeline;I thought Grahment was in support of Arcei?
speak;Hogarth;Not I, I have more sense than my fellow nobles.|The Goddess sits with Aurelia! It is an obvious choice.
speak;Hogarth;Ah yes, a most terrible thing!|They terrorised my region! Though a few brave souls vanquished the foes.
speak;Nabin;Oh, nothing.|He just didn't think brave of them before.
speak;Hogarth;Well... they were most opposed to Aurelia!|As a true servant of the Goddess... it was a shame.
speak;Emeline;It feels as though the walls are closing in on me...|Necromancy is so underhanded... so evil...|Ngh...

speak;Hogarth;That is why I am here.|Arcei's throne sits empty, the region is destabilsed.|Ruffians run amok, a poor sight indeed...|With Aurelia's holy blessing...|I wish to take the seat in the King's absence.
speak;Emeline;Monsdor did not install any leader?
speak;Hogarth;It appears they are of a one-track mind.|They have might, but no political savvy.
speak;Nabin;Father, will the Arcein commoners really fall in line?
speak;Hogarth;They will appreciate us when we overturn the bandit infestation.|We will also provide support for you, too.|Arcei's fertile land is ripe for agriculture.
speak;Emeline;A puppet leader...|That makes sense, more land for us to utilise...|The fertile land of Arcei is ripe for use...|I give you this role, Duke Ilkrest.
speak;Hogarth;Splendid, let this be the start of a fruitful alliance!|Come, Nabin, we must make our departure, to our new land!
speak;Hogarth;It's been an honour, your Majesty.
speak;Cornelius;That man seems like he is not as holy as he proclaims...
speak;Cornelius;I know you mean well, but you are inexperienced.|He cares more for his own power.
speak;Emeline;But, even so, we have an ally in him...|I trust him to rule Arcei better than the unholy Sagemaster lineage!
speak;Cornelius;That is true...|Plus, it would be harsh for the commoners with no leader...
speak;Emeline;I know I can trust Sir Skill, my uncle, and you, Father.|Grahment seems at odds internally as to who supports us.|While Palushin wants to cut off our trade...
speak;Cornelius;What do you propose is our course of action?
speak;Emeline;I'm fine! Not weak! I can handle this!
speak;Cornelius;In that case, I wish to parley with Monsdor.
speak;Cornelius;I will help prepare for the wedding.|I have been requested personally to officiate the union of Princess Helia and Prince Emmanuel.
speak;Emeline;Thank you, I know it will be wonderful...|I can't wait!|In the meantime, I must contact King Jevil, to make him to relinquish the embargo.
speak;Cornelius;Good idea, he must see the error of his ways.
speak;Emeline;I will have your promotion ready at once.|Then, good luck, Father.
speak;Cornelius;Thank you, your Majesty.|However, with the grace of the Goddess on my side..|I need no luck!

name: OrphanedLight
_source: speak;Lumii;So, we're on a mission together? Super cool!
speak;CorneliusA;Indeed, we're going to Monsdor to pay a visit to the King.
speak;Lumii;They have wyverns and stuff, right?|I've never seen one before!
speak;CorneliusA;Their wyvern militia is very powerful.
speak;Xeconis;I hope I'm not intruding, Archbishop.|I just came here to pick up supplies.
speak;Xeconis;You and Lumii seem pretty close.
speak;Lumii;Yup! The oldie raised me since I was a couple years old...|I don't know what happened to mama...
speak;CorneliusA;She was thief, so I hear.|I assume she wished a better life for you,{c:wait;200} one of the light.
speak;CorneliusA;As true as the Goddess is pure.|I had encountered her in the past...|Though nothing could dissuade her nimble fingers and silver tongue...
speak;Xeconis;Though for those in poverty, it only seems pragmatic.
speak;CorneliusA;Pragmatic or not, it is still unscrupulous!
speak;CorneliusA;Ah, my apologies, child.|I didn't wish to hurt your feelings...|I'm certain your mother is proud of your holy heart, wherever she is.|Oh, I do have this for you, Lumii.
speak;Lumii;Oh! A new tome?|I'm not sure if I'm strong enough...
speak;CorneliusA;Well, there will come a time.|I believe in you, Lumii.
speak;Xeconis;Has he changed? Is this his atonement?|I'm left with more questions...

name: Magic Tutoring
_source: speak;Howai;Hey, you!|Yeah, you!|Cast some magic and stuff!
speak;Howai;I need inspiration for my painting...
speak;Max;Oh, I see... me?|Sure, I'll give it a bit of... Hyah!
speak;Max;Thunder magic is very bright and flashy.|That should make for good inspiration.
speak;Max;You seem to be painting fast...
speak;Howai;While it's still in my head...
speak;Max;Actually, I was supposed to tell you we're leaving soon...|Maybe you ought to pack-
speak;Max;Wow! That's incredible...|Like... looking in a mirror!
speak;Howai;Yup, I'll get ready to go, wooooo!
speak;Max;That kid has a lot of energy and equal measures talent...|

name: Twinning Advice
_source: speak;Pit;Hey, Vee... I'm on a mission soon.
speak;Viridia;Aw, Pitty-Pat...{c:wait;100} I know you'll do great!
speak;Pit;I just wish... I was as brave as you...
speak;Viridia;Huh? Me?|Pit... You're perfect as you are!
speak;Viridia;Not everyone needs to charge on the frontlines.|Often, battles are won from the stalwart support.
speak;Viridia;I'm also busy today, I'm seeking a promotion.
speak;Pit;I'm sure that you'll get it...|Though you should slow down sometime...|I do worry about how hard you work sometimes...
speak;Viridia;I have to prove myself.|I wouldn't want to be married off like some damsel.|I want to stand on my own two feet!
speak;Pit;I... didn't know that's how you felt.
speak;Viridia;Yeah...|Well, I'd best be off.|Take this, consider it a lucky charm from me.|Know that I'll always be there for you, no matter how far!
speak;Viridia;Now, see ya twinsie! Love ya!
speak;Pit;You can do this Pit...|Can't let her down!

name: Intro
_source: speak;CorneliusA;So, today you will escort me to Monsdor Keep.
speak;Max;As you say, Archbishop.|The new look is very dapper.
speak;CorneliusA;Hah! I do this job not for the attire...|Though it is a sizeable perk.|{c:expression;CorneliusA;NoSmile}Though, I believe I requested a veteran knight?|Not to insult your experience.
speak;Max;Ah, well, your Holiness...|In his advanced age, he might be lost...
speak;Demonic;Bwahaha! Hello there, Max!|Your Holiness! It's your lucky day!|You get the best escort service, this side of-
speak;Max;Please don't say it like that...
speak;CorneliusA;Time is of the essence.|Best we move quickly.
speak;Max;Quite, though we should prepare first.
speak;Eleonora;I have a long-shot question to ask...
speak;Eleonora;My child's missing...|You wouldn't happened to have seen them, they have a heart shaped pin...
speak;Xeconis;Can't say I recall... You say "they"?
speak;Eleonora;It's a long story...|One I won't bore you with the details of.
speak;Max;Do you have any other information?
speak;Eleonora;It's been so long...|Maybe eight years since they'd ran away from home...|So about eighteen years old, brown hair...
speak;Eleonora;I prayed every night and day.|If the Goddess is out there, my child still lives.
speak;Max;We'll tell everyone to keep an eye out.
speak;Xeconis;I have my doubts that a ten year old fleeing home...
speak;Max;Me too, what are the odds...?
speak;Demonic;My bad.|The archbishop is growing restless.
speak;Demonic;These mountains sure are HUGE! Bwahaha!
speak;Max;We're drawing closer to Monsdor Keep, but...
speak;Jason;We're outta here, ya hear me?
speak;Jason;Crap... We'd better kill the bastards!
speak;Blu;Uh, so like... When do I get paid?
speak;Jason;Shut yer trap newbie!|It's yer fault we're in this bind!
speak;Blu;No way!|You guys are just blaming me 'cus I'm a lady!
speak;Bandit1;Street urchin, you ain't cut out for the big leagues...
speak;Jason;Now, now...|We was jokin' missy!|I ain't stupid... We got help coming very soon...|We might have to hunker down here, let 'em deal damage.
speak;Jason;Ungrateful sod! Fine, go forth, your ladyship!|Maybe your feminine charms can lead 'em astray!|Bwahahahaha!
speak;Blu;You gits!|Fine, I'll go ahead!|I ain't waitin' around to die 'ere!
speak;Blu;They don't respect nothin'!|Hmph, maybe I could sell my services to the other side...|Hopefully these knightly types have money!
speak;Demonic;Guess we gotta have some fun 'ere, eh?
speak;Demonic;Better crush 'em, before that can happen!
speak;CorneliusA;Allow me to... stand back.|Wouldn't wish to bloody my new robes, would I?

name: Village
_source: speak;OldMan1;Monsdor Keep is a beautiful bit of building...|As is this blade! Take it!|Those bandits are annoyingly loud...

name: BluJoin
_source: speak;Blu;Uhm, hey there mister!|Lovely day we're havin'... eh?
speak;Max;Ah, of course. How stupid of me!
speak;Blu;I'm in a right old state here...|These bandit types just looted me!|Could you spare some gold?
speak;Max;You do realise I saw you escape with those guys.|You're literally hiding your bow from me.
speak;Blu;Crap... Er... stand and deliver!|Hand over yer valuables!
speak;Max;Look, I like your persistence.|It's a valuable asset.|Turn your bow on these guys, and we can sweeten the deal.
speak;Blu;Really?|Those jerks are pretty shit anyway...|Well, how's about this? 3000 gold, I'm yours!
speak;Blu;Attaboy!|My bow is yours... and my pickpocketing skills!|The name's Blu, now, let's get to it!
speak;Blu;You're kiddin' me!|Your pockets are dry? Bah! Get out of here!
speak;Blu;What? You're not willing to pay the price?|Big mistake, pal!

name: BluJason
_source: speak;Jason;Er, you're pointing your bow at me?;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Blu;I'd be lying if said no.;;;boss_convo_right
speak;Jason;Never a good lass, were ya...?;;;boss_convo_left
speak;Blu;Well, this little lass is about to shoot your noggin!;;;boss_convo_right

name: JasonGeneric
_source: speak;Jason;I'll crush you to dust, dimwit!;;;boss_convo_left

name: Yeehaw
_source: speak;Sagemaster;I apologise that you're involved in this mess...|I thank you for your efforts, but-
speak;Leap;Please don't say that!|We made our choice, no need to feel guilty.|That being said, I'm sick of this jailbird stuff...
speak;Prof;Sadly, we don't have a master swordsman to save us this time...
speak;Sagemaster;I'm afraid that with my.... *COUGH* health...|I'm not strong enough to break us out- *COUGH*
speak;Leap;Save your strength, your Majesty...|I'm sure the Prince has a plan.
speak;Sagemaster;I'm not so sure...|I was too lenient as a ruler and a father...|I'm worried my son won't be up for the task.
music;Lord Chief Justice Stronghart ~ Time-Keeper of the Law
speak;Emmanuel;Heh, your Majesty.|Tick-tock, your death draws near.
speak;Sagemaster;Why must I be tortured in this... *hurk* cell...?
speak;Emmanuel;Aurelia would be most pleased to see you frail.|You are our token to great power, you know...
speak;Emmanuel;Well, you ordered the death of Prince Elias, yes?|With your head, Aurelia will adore us!|I will hold my wedding atop your funeral!

speak;Emmanuel;Whether you did or not, I couldn't care less.|We Monsdorians put our own first.|My brother will finally be rewarded for his tireless efforts!|He put his family and country above himself!
speak;Emmanuel;Hah! You're no match for brother!|Oberon could crush Arcei with his boot!
speak;Sagemaster;Bah! You keep me here in this cell to weaken me...|You Monsdorians aren't brave fighters at all.
speak;Emmanuel;Cur! You dare...|Hmph, no use talking to a walking corpse.
speak;Emmanuel;However, you two really are something.|Thanks to you... the Khon'su people are riled up!|It appears that those tribal freaks were inspired by you.
speak;Emmanuel;Such wasted potential, since you must be made a lesson of.|Much like his Majesty, you will be a gift to Aurelia.
speak;Prof;You're ever so needy.|The Sagemaster was right, you are a weak coward.
speak;Emmanuel;What?! You bastard! How dare you!
speak;Prof;You're really going into some sort of arranged marriage...|Just so that you can finally taste a bit of power?|Inferiority complex, much?
speak;Emmanuel;Grr...|I will enjoy tearing you to pieces most of all, spectacled wart.
speak;Prof;If you wish to lead a life with a loveless marriage, be my guest.|She'd probably love your brother more anyw-
speak;Emmanuel;ENOUGH!|You seem not to realise I hold the leash!|Disobedient dogs will be punished... Bah!
speak;Prof;If we're his bargaining chips to prove loyalty to Aurelia...|I just assumed he'd want us alive, he couldn't kill us even if he wanted to.
speak;Leap;His dedication to status is impressive, but scary...|A bit like how ruthless you were then...
speak;Prof;I apologise, Leap.|I'm frustrated too... I feel like I'm about to burst...|That just felt so... cathartic.
speak;Leap;It just reminded me too much of my father...
speak;Leap;I suppose we'd better wait for our future judgement...

name: Outro
_source: s;Max;We made it! Good job, everyone!
speak;CorneliusA;Indeed, I seek a meeting with King Oberon.
s;SoldierRed;Wait there, Sir.|I believe he has current matters to attend to.|I shall inquire, posthaste!

name: Intro
_source: music;Lord Chief Justice Stronghart ~ Time-Keeper of the Law
speak;Oberon;We have the Sagemaster in our cells, along with other rebels.|Criminal scum must pay for their crimes, simple.
speak;Lucian;Marvelous, well done, your Majesty.|I'm certain her Majesty would love this.
speak;Oberon;Hm? Quite...|Now, you must keep your end of the deal.
speak;Lucian;Of course.|For the prosperity of both our nations.
speak;Emmanuel;So, preparations for the wedding are complete?
speak;Lucian;Almost, we just need the Sagemaster ready.|His death at the hands of Queen Emeline...|That will be the true mark of the end of an era.
s;Lucian;You can speak freely, girl.|Your old man will listen.
s;Helia;It's nothing...|It's just the way you speak about cousin Emeline sometimes seems, cold...
speak;Lucian;I apologise...|I'm just overcome with distaste for the Sagemaster...|You know how I despise criminal ilk.
speak;Emmanuel;I beg your pardon... I have business to attend to.
speak;Helia;Might I come with you?|I want to get to know you better...
speak;Emmanuel;What a great idea.|Goodbye, Prince Lucian, and brother.
speak;Lucian;Do you know what business he refers to?
speak;Oberon;It was just a ruse, so we could have time to discuss our plans.
speak;Lucian;Of course, how shrewd.|Now, I must say, unification is the only way.|Her Majesty is weak, unfit to rule Aurelia!|I could just... never get rid of her.
speak;Oberon;She is neither strong of body, or heart.
speak;Lucian;Precisely, Aurelia needs a powerful leader to rally behind!|Purge criminals from the underbelly of society.
speak;Oberon;Which is where the newly-weds come in?
speak;Lucian;Exactly, we can't lead at the helm.|That would look too suspicious.|However, a couple that connects both our nations may work.|We would also have the leftover land of Arcei...
speak;Oberon;We would finally have plentiful resources...|My people would finally overcome the shadow of these valleys...|Though, Sir, what do you hope to gain here?
speak;Lucian;Have I not made myself clear enough?|Criminal scum have ruined many lives... mine included.|Helia will do as I suggest.

speak;Oberon;Despite such plentiful agricultural land...|Arcei's poverty runs rampant. Not unlike Monsdor...|However, our people are more resourceful, stronger too.|We keep our own in check, but can't stop theirs.
speak;Lucian;It appears you understand well.|Arcei is a breeding ground for undesirables.|With our control, we will gain resources AND clean up their mess.|A noble cause, do you not agree?
speak;Oberon;Of course.|Grahment's Duke Ilkrest is poised to take over Arcei's land.|Was that your doing?
speak;Lucian;He is a useful puppet, who is easy to discard if needed.|Her Majesty, of course, is too naive to see that.
speak;Oberon;So... the question is...|How do we remove her Majesty?
speak;Lucian;After the wedding, we are primed to take action.|Trust me, Oberon.
speak;SoldierRed;Your Majesty!|We have an Aurelian entourage seeking audience with you.|Including the new Archbishop!
speak;Oberon;Send them in.|You'd best hide yourself, Lucian.|Wouldn't want to be exposed, would you?
speak;Lucian;Of course, good luck, your Majesty.
speak;SoldierRed;The King would be glad to accept your request, Archbishop.
speak;SoldierRed;His Majesty is in the throne room.|I can take you to him.
speak;SoldierRed;Your group are free to enjoy their stay in the meantime.
speak;CorneliusA;Please be patient, everyone.|This is important diplomatic business.
speak;Max;Guess we should have a nosey around.
speak;Xeconis;Perhaps we check on Eff?|It's been a while since we've seen him...
speak;Max;Very true.|Probably best not to distrub the Archbishop either.|I don't want to be lectured...
speak;Xeconis;Though, I can't help but wonder...
speak;Max;That was a while ago...|I just don't like how shady it was.
speak;Xeconis;Now hang on, you owe me one, remember?|I don't like overexerting myself, but...|My desire for knowledge is greater.
speak;Max;...|Right... I guess we can snoop.|But if he sees us, I'm running!

name: EffTalk
_source: speak;Eff;Wha- Oh! Hello!|Wow, you guys!|Been a while, huh, how are you?
speak;Max;Doing fine, you?|Sneaking around in your own home is... totally normal!
speak;Eff;Oberon hardly speaks to me these days.|Apparently, I'm not 'devoted' enough to Monsdor.|Whatever's going on around, I'm not privy to it.
speak;Max;Well, you were always more of a pensmith than a warrior...
speak;Eff;I can fend for myself just fine.|I just don't take much pleasure in battle.|Personally, I don't see what Helia could see in Emmanuel.
speak;Max;The Princess? She's marrying your brother?!
speak;Eff;Indeed...|Look, I'll tell you guys, cause I trust you.|I think your Queen's in trouble.
speak;Xeconis;You mean, this is an attempt to usurp the throne?
speak;Eff;That Prince Lucian is a slimeball...
speak;Eff;Whatever he's doing, is for his own ends.|His daughters are just tools to him.|Helia... deserves better.
speak;Max;He came to watch our downhill battle against Arcei...
speak;Eff;Arcei... Ah!|As far as I know, the Sagemaster is in the dungeon.
speak;Eff;These days I grow doubtful of his role in the death of Prince Elias.|But... whatever the narrative is, right?
speak;Max;Xec, you good?|You're doing your scheme-face...
speak;Xeconis;Frankly, I hate all of these secrets.|We must investigate exactly what caused this war.
speak;Max;You know, if Prince Lucian was involed in the assassination...|and we're currently away from home on a mission...|Who is guarding her Majesty? She might be in trouble!
speak;Xeconis;Shh, keep it down. Sir Skill will be there... I think.
speak;Max;I guess he's nothing if not unyielding...|I doubt he'd betray her.
speak;Eff;I take it the Archbishop dragged you here?|Do you suspect him?
speak;Xeconis;I don't trust him one bit.|However, her Majesty does give him standing...
speak;Max;Should we tell him about all this?
speak;Xeconis;Perhaps not, just to be safe.
speak;Eff;I'll go snoop for any documents... See what shows up.
speak;Max;It was nice to catch up.|If only it were under better circumstances...
speak;Max;I have a bad feeling about all this.
speak;Xeconis;If this can end the war, it'll be worth it.
speak;Max;True... I just feel that if there's a grand conspiracy...|How far does it reach? Is her Majesty even trustworthy anymore?|Maybe she conspired with her uncle!
speak;Xeconis;A valid train of thought...|But, theorising will get us nowhere. It's time to act.
speak;Max;Well, I'm right here with you.|We could check out the dungeon, I suppose?|Speak to the Sagemaster.
speak;Max;Oh Xec, my pal.|Of course they will, with my charm and grace!

name: BluTalk
_source: speak;Blu;I ain't just a bandit, I'm Blu!
speak;Max;If you were green, you'd die?
speak;Blu;I ain't sure why I'm back 'ere...|But, nobody seems to have noticed.|Clearly I am a master of slippin' away! Hehaw!
speak;Max;What are you doing with that gold I gave you?
speak;Blu;Quit lookin' at me like that!|I just... wanna send money home to my sick mama...
speak;Blu;Look, I ain't got time to go mushy.|Maybe I'll nick some valuables in here... revenge...

name: HowaiTalk
_source: speak;Howai;This place is awesome!|Such pretty statues...
speak;Xeconis;A refined taste in art, for a kid.
speak;Howai;I hadn't much else to do in the orphanage, art is fun though!
speak;Howai;Super old, super strict...|But, probably fine!
speak;Howai;I don't think so...|Oh! What's that statue! So cool!

name: LumiiTalk
_source: speak;Lumii;It's weird being in a castle...|As an orphan I'm not used to this...|Father Cornelius tried to teach me decorum...|But, it still feels weird...
speak;Max;I understand, I didn't get used to it for a while.
speak;Max;Not that, but the decorum stuff.|I come from an average background.|Meanwhile, Xec was separated from his parents, right?
speak;Xeconis;That's true.|I ended up in Aurelia eventually.
speak;Dark;You travelled by yourself? Sounds scary...
speak;Lumii;It makes me sad...|I'll never see mama... I don't even remember her face...
speak;Max;We're not much, but we can help protect you.
speak;Dark;I'll help too, Lumii!|Even if I'm weak...
speak;Max;Remember, you're both great kids.|Don't let all this grown-up stuff let you forget that.
speak;Lumii;It's weird being in a castle...|As an orphan I'm not used to this...|Father Cornelius tried to teach me decorum...|But, it still feels weird...
speak;Max;It's weird at first, but trust me, you get used to it.
speak;Lumii;I suppose so...|I'm just... no princess.|Without Father Cornelius, I'd be in rags...
speak;Xeconis;Don't let your past define you, Lumii.|You're a good kid, you'll be able to go far.

name: DarkTalk
_source: speak;Lumii;It's weird being in a castle...|As an orphan I'm not used to this...|Father Cornelius tried to teach me decorum...|But, it still feels weird...
speak;Max;I understand, I didn't get used to it for a while.
speak;Max;Not that, but the decorum stuff.|I come from an average background.|Meanwhile, Xec was separated from his parents, right?
speak;Xeconis;That's true.|I ended up in Aurelia eventually.
speak;Dark;You travelled by yourself? Sounds scary...
speak;Lumii;It makes me sad...|I'll never see mama... I don't even remember her face...
speak;Max;We're not much, but we can help protect you.
speak;Dark;I'll help too, Lumii!|Even if I'm weak...
speak;Max;Remember, you're both great kids.|Don't let all this grown-up stuff let you forget that.
speak;Dark;Monsdorians are strong...|Stronger than me, anyway.
speak;Max;You might have something better than strength, though.
speak;Xeconis;I think I get what Max means...|Eagerness to learn, right?
speak;Xeconis;Don't let your past define you, Dark.|You're a good kid, you'll be able to go far.
speak;Dark;Yeah, you're right...|I'll be smarter than everyone some day...

name: PitTalk
_source: speak;Pit;I don't like this place...|It's so cold and imposing...
speak;Xeconis;I guess the Keep is rather large.
speak;Max;Monsdor are hardly the inviting type...|But, they're our ally, for now...
speak;Pit;Hum... If things go bad...|At least we have my bow...?|Oh no! It'd be up to me to shoot them down!
speak;Xeconis;I doubt things will end that badly.|Cornelius might be shifty, but he would put his country first.
speak;Max;I would hope so, though religion comes before country...|How foolish to follow such rigid guidelines...
speak;Pit;Uhm... Yeah...|If we followed the knightly ideal...|We'd be d-dead, right?
speak;Max;Best not to think about it too hard...

name: ShiniTalk
_source: speak;Xeconis;Is this beyond your normal work, Shini?
speak;Shini;I can handle it.|I was a merc, so I can handle a bit of bloodshed.|I'd prefer not to... but...
speak;Max;It's what you're most used to, right?
speak;Shini;Well, yeah.|Best for me to use that bloodshed in the right way.|The church gave me a second chance.|Helping the orphans and clergy...|Now I'm helping Father Cornelius personally!
speak;Xeconis;You respect him a lot, it seems.
speak;Shini;He's been around a few years...|Guess I just trust his experience.
speak;Max;That's one way to think about it...

name: DemonicTalk
_source: speak;Demonic;Bwahaha! Max too!|How's it going, guys?
speak;Max;Well, we're doing alright...|Slight migraines at the moment...
speak;Xeconis;I respect your years of service, Sir.
speak;Demonic;You young'uns have sense if you wanna learn from me!|Bwahaha!
speak;Xeconis;I suppose your shouting could come useful for commanding...|Maybe teach me sometime?
speak;Demonic;Sure thing! I'll show you how this old lion ROARS!|Graaaaa!

name: GuardTalk
_source: speak;SoldierRed;Oi! What do you want?|Authorised personnel only!
speak;Max;We are here with the Archbishop.|We're here for Aurelia's 'gift', so to speak.
speak;SoldierRed;I can't just let you riff-raff in.|We'll sort out the prisoners.
speak;Xeconis;Probably should have gotten Eff's help...
speak;Max;I guess if he's not trusted, maybe even he isn't allowed in.
speak;Xeconis;I suppose so.|Maybe we should just ask Oberon himself.
speak;Max;Are you feeling alright?|That is just... pure madness!
speak;Xeconis;Look, the Archbishop is shady.|However, he wouldn't let Oberon hurt us.|His reputation woould be at stake, I'm willing to gamble on it.

name: ThroneAccept
_source: speak;CorneliusA;So, preparations to move the Sagemaster are underway?
speak;Oberon;Yes, he will be fresh meat for her Majesty.
speak;CorneliusA;Monsdor have been invaluable in providing aid.|As well as the ambush on Arcei.|My question, how did you do it?
speak;Oberon;Grahment's a joke and Duke Hogarth is weak.|He will bend like a twig if you promise him power.
speak;CorneliusA;So he allowed you passage around the coast...
speak;Oberon;After that, it was simple.|The Sagemaster is ineffectual, he is barely prepared for anything...|It appears we have two eavesdroppers?
s;Xeconis;Forgive us, your Majesty.|We were just wishing to begin the transportation.|There is no replacement for lost time.
s;Oberon;Very dutiful, you wish to see the Arcein dog now?
s;Max;In truth, we just want to rough up the bastard!|Right, Xeconis?
s;Xeconis;Of course.|Aurelia needs vengeance.|Her Majesty can't have all the fun.
s;CorneliusA;A rather uncharacteristic request of you two...
s;Oberon;Hahaha! I appreciate fiery passion.|Go ahead, let's see him.
s;Oberon;Let's go, what say you, Archbishop?|Then we can begin right away.
s;CorneliusA;I suppose I shall go in...|He may be a foul unholy demon, but I shall heal him.

name: Intro
_source: speak;Jevil;Heed my call, Aurelia!|You will rue the day you stole my son from me...|Face the might of Palushin! To arms!

name: Arena
_source: choice;ArenaChoice;Would you like to wager 500 gold?;Yes,No;;horizontal
speak;;Good luck. Don't get yourself killed.;60,8;160;clear;;;;menu_bg_clear
s;;So you won, eh? Here's your prize. 1000 gold.;60,8;160;clear;;;;menu_bg_clear
s;;What are you wasting my time for?;60,8;160;clear;;;;menu_bg_clear
s;;What! You don't have a weapon! Get out of here!;60,8;160;clear;;;;menu_bg_clear

speak;Vic;I haven't had my blood rushing like that... in a while!|I'm tagging along with you, if you don't mind.|Arena pitfighting was getting boring anyway.|The name's Vic, ex-sailor.|Set me on a foe, new Cap'n!

name: VicBattleQuote
_source: speak;Vic;I accept your challenge! Prepare yourself!;;;boss_convo_left

name: WinConSecond
_source: if;not any(unit.team == 'other' for unit in game.units if unit.position) and (game.check_alive('Wagon1') or game.check_alive('Wagon2') or game.check_alive('Wagon3'))

name: Rein
_source: speak;Humphrey;Ah, my saviours!|Buy me some time to escape, posthaste!
speak;Prof;I should stop them, remove all distractions!

name: Turn6
_source: speak;Jevil;We might need to be more aggressive...

name: Turn8
_source: speak;Xanthor;Heh...|King Jevil, you need my help, it seems...
speak;Xanthor;Disappointed to see me? Why so?
speak;Xanthor;Aurelia's Queen is a mutual enemy of ours.|Just accept my help, for both our benefit.
speak;Jevil;I don't trust you at all...|But, you raise a valid point.|Just... get it over with...
speak;Xanthor;Heh, good!|Rise my friends, take Aurelia's troops and grind 'em to dust!

name: XeconisDeath
_source: speak;Xeconis;I have nothing more to say...

name: Cutscene
_source: s;Max;That heart pin...|Didn't the orphanage cleric tell us...
s;Oberon;Caught your eye?|Those Grahmentian thugs killed Monsdorian troops.|Conspiring with Arcei, how despicable.
s;Xeconis;I was led to believe Monsdor was powerful.|These people seem barely trained.
s;Oberon;I applaud their gusto.|If they were on our side, they would be respectable...|Though, my troops have been reprimanded.|Unacceptable.
s;Max;Er, right.|Who is the lass with the heart pin?
s;Oberon;I'm afraid I don't know.|Emmanuel knows more about them.|However, enough of that, time for the Sagemaster.
s;CorneliusA;Indeed, we're here for the Arcein fiend.
s;Xeconis;I must ask for further inspection, your Majesty.|We have reason to suspect they might be more important, I suppose.
s;Leap;What? Am I finally being let go?
s;Oberon;No, but these two think you're special.
s;Xeconis;Not originally though, isn't that right?
s;CorneliusA;Hm... No...|You couldn't be Eleonora and Cedric's...?{c:wait;400} You're Aurelian?
s;Leap;So... Father's caught up to me, is that it?|I'm sorry I'm such a disappointment!|But, I'm not going back! You can't make me!
s;CorneliusA;Deserting the church is rather... frowned upon.
s;Xeconis;Either way, your mother misses you...
s;Oberon;Aurelian or not. You'll be put to death...|Or, put to work, anyway.
s;CorneliusA;We shall see what her Majesty deems.
s;Oberon;These vigilantes are Monsdor's problem.|I'll deal with them later.
s;Max;The Sagemaster, in the flesh...|Your son caused us a great deal of trouble...|Many Aurelian lives were lost...
s;Xeconis;Good people died...|But... if I were in his shoes...
s;Sagemaster;I'm sorry...|Wait, my son, he's taking charge...?
s;Oberon;The kid is scrappy.|But you... you're weak!|Relying on your son to do your bidding?|Arcei will be granted a huge favour with your passing.
s;Xeconis;King Oberon...|Eff seems to think this is all some misunderstanding...
s;Oberon;Hmph, my brother thinks too much.|Might makes right!
s;CorneliusA;This is awfully forceful, your Majesty.|We shall see that he will be judged by the Goddess.
s;Oberon;Archbishop, this man got Elias killed! An affront to Aurelia!|Yet, you defer to the Goddess! Where is your spirit?
s;CorneliusA;I suppose... he deserves a modicum of suffering.
s;Sagemaster;I just... want to see my son...
s;Oberon;You'll be seeing him soon enough.|In the next life, hopefully!
s;CorneliusA;Hm, we'd best move him to Aurelia, fast.|He seems on death's door even without a fight...|Her Majesty would wish to see him...
s;Oberon;Then the transportation shall be prepared.

name: Intro
_source: s;Hogarth;Thank you for convening here, in my NEW castle!
s;Melinda;A pleasure, Duke Ilkrest.|I adore the purple decor, haha!
s;Zio;Uhm, it's a nice place, I suppose...
s;Timothy;Did you summon us purely to gloat, Duke?

s;Hogarth;Jealous, Earl Mandrock?|However, I have actual news to share with you.|As you can tell, by our being here...|Arcei is subjugated by your truly.|With the blessing of Aurelia, in fact.|We're rich! The abundance of farmland is perfect!
s;Timothy;I suppose that is a boon for our people...
s;Zio;Oh thank goodness! Moonglade has had better days.
s;Hogarth;Marquess Nekoma? You are awfully quiet...
s;Cres;Is this best for the Arcein people?|We abandoned King Sages and his son...
s;Hogarth;I would argue it is what they deserved!|They started this war, we shall help end it!
s;Cres;What of Monsdor? Aurelia's allied with them, yet they attack us!
s;Hogarth;Do you not understand?|I am a pious and holy man.|Aurelia will certainly aid us over those mountain savages.
s;Cres;What if they don't?|Who will help us then?
s;Melinda;They'd be foolish to help Monsdor over us.|They might even negotiate peace!|Arcei is a small price to pay.
s;Hogarth;Quite.|However we have more to discuss.
s;Hogarth;Earl Mandrock, Viscount Melinda, and Earl Phyron.
s;Hogarth;Your children.|Reports state that they are aiding the Arcein resistance.|In fact, Earl Mandrock, I heard YOU aided Prince Sages' assault on Aurelia?
s;Timothy;So, what if I did?|He helped clear my region of bandits.|The kid has a good head on his shoulders, better than Queen Emeline.
s;Melinda;Hmph, my daughter is a waste of space.
s;Hogarth;It appears so, but aiding a group of anti-Monsdor rebels.
s;Hogarth;It appears he didn't make it...
s;Hogarth;Frankly, I don't know what to think!|Emboldening Arcei... Weakening Monsdor and Aurelia...|It's... genius!
s;Hogarth;It means we stand as Aurelia's most powerful ally!|Prince Sages will inevitably fall... by our hand!|We shall save the day!
s;Ignatius;Now, now.|The Prince shouldn't be punished for the sins of his father...|If he has even sinned...
s;Melinda;Bah, Duke Ilkrest will make better use of this land.|Arcei's plentiful resources are wasted on such a maladroit leader.
s;Hogarth;Quite so!|We must plan our next cause of action.
s;Ignatius;I cannot in good conscience turn on Prince Sages like that.
s;Melinda;I support this cause, Duke Ilkrest.|These feeble-hearts are no use for us.
s;Zio;I don't know what to do! Ahhh!
s;Hogarth;You really wish to ally yourself with Sages?|After all, if it weren't for Arcei...|Monsdor would never have attacked your territory!
s;Hogarth;It's called making the best of a bad situation.|That is why I am the highest ranking noble here.|I have immeasurable savvy granted by the Goddess!
s;Nabin;If I may be permitted to speak, father.
s;Nabin;This whole Monsdor necromancy debacle...|You wouldn't happen to know these necromancers, would you?
s;Hogarth;Don't slight me, boy.|Say what you mean, with your chest!
s;Nabin;Well, I think YOU attacked our own people.|YOU hired those necromancers, not Monsdor.
s;Hogarth;It was only to protect you all...|They threatened much worse...
s;Hogarth;This crazed merchant offered me gold... lots of it.|Told me that if I let monsters attack...|That he'd give me money.
s;Nabin;So that's what you didn't want people to find out.
s;Hogarth;It seems this merchant wants the war to rage on.|It was mutually advantageous!|He would get money from selling weapons... Give us a cut...
s;Hogarth;Because this merchant is a scary man...|He has connections, everywhere...
s;Zio;This war profiteer... He works with the n-necromancers?
s;Cres;So, why can't we just take him down?
s;Hogarth;This shadowy cult... Their magic is powerful.
s;Cres;Surely Aurelia wouldn't like this information leaking?
s;Hogarth;Is that a threat? Hah... Hahahaha!|You think they haven't dipped their toes into Aurelia?
s;Hogarth;The new order is to be established...|I'd rather be higher up in that order...|I hope the Goddess forgives me...
s;Cres;You're suggesting we're all just pieces on a board?|That's... absurd!
s;Hogarth;Queen Emeline, King Sages...|They are obstacles...|Fortunately, there's nobody they hate more than each other.|It's a problem that will resolve itself!
s;Ignatius;I have to save my son!
s;Hogarth;You're either with me, or against me.|And against the new order, do you want Grahment to prosper?
s;Ignatius;I won't abide by this, hate me if you must.|I cannot stand for this any further.|Farewell.
s;Melinda;Weakling, I will side with you, Duke.|We must stay atop the food chain, of course.
s;Cres;Zio... I suppose I have to help too...
s;Hogarth;Thank you all...|Now, we must prepare to bring forth a new world.

name: Orphaned Light
_source: speak;Lumii;So, you're on a mission? Super cool!
speak;CorneliusA;Indeed, I'm going to Monsdor to pay a visit to the King.
speak;Lumii;They have wyverns and stuff, right?|I've never seen one before!
speak;CorneliusA;Their wyvern militia is very powerful.
speak;Xeconis;I hope I'm not intruding, Archbishop.|I just came here to pick up supplies.
speak;CorneliusA;Of course not, come in, soldier.
speak;Xeconis;You and Lumii seem pretty close.
speak;Lumii;Yup! The oldie raised me since I was a couple years old...|I don't know what happened to mama...
speak;CorneliusA;She was a thief, so I hear.|I assume she wished a better life for you,{c:wait;200} one of the light.
speak;CorneliusA;As true as the Goddess is pure.|I had encountered her in the past...|Though nothing could dissuade her nimble fingers and silver tongue...
speak;Xeconis;Though for those in poverty, it only seems pragmatic.
speak;CorneliusA;Pragmatic or not, it is still unscrupulous!
speak;CorneliusA;Ah, my apologies, child.|I didn't wish to hurt your feelings...|I'm certain your mother is proud of your holy heart, wherever she is.|Oh, I do have this for you, Lumii.
speak;Lumii;Oh! A new tome?|I'm not sure if I'm strong enough...
speak;CorneliusA;Well, there will come a time.|I believe in you, Lumii.
speak;Xeconis;Has he changed? Is this his atonement?|I'm left with more questions...

name: Artful Child
_source: speak;Howai;Hey, you!|Yeah, you!|Cast some magic and stuff!
speak;Howai;I need inspiration for my sketches...
speak;Max;Oh, I see... me?|Sure, I'll give it a bit of... Hyah!
speak;Max;Thunder magic is very bright and flashy.|That should make for good inspiration.
speak;Max;You seem to be drawing fast...
speak;Howai;While it's still in my head...
speak;Max;Actually, I was supposed to tell you we're leaving soon...|Maybe you ought to pack-
speak;Max;Wow! That's incredible...|Like... looking in a mirror!
speak;Howai;Yup, I'll get ready to go, wooooo!
speak;Max;Hopefully the fighting's easy on the kid...

name: Twinning Advice
_source: speak;Pit;Hey, Vee... I'm on a mission soon.
speak;Viridia;Aw, Pitty-Pat...{c:wait;100} I know you'll do great!
speak;Pit;I just wish... I was as brave as you...
speak;Viridia;Huh? Me?|Pit... You're perfect as you are!
speak;Viridia;Not everyone needs to charge on the frontlines.|Often, battles are won via stalwart support.
speak;Viridia;I'm also busy today, the Archbishop requested my aid.|This could help with a promotion...
speak;Pit;I'm sure that you'll get it...|Though you should slow down sometime...|I do worry about how hard you work sometimes...
speak;Viridia;I have to prove myself.|I wouldn't want to be married off like some damsel.|I want to stand on my own two feet!
speak;Pit;I... know you can do it.
speak;Viridia;Pit...|Take this, consider it a lucky charm from me.|Know that I'll always be there for you, no matter how far!
speak;Viridia;Now, see ya twinsie! Love ya!
speak;Pit;You can do this Pit...|Can't let her down!

name: Intro
_source: s;CorneliusA;Good day, your Majesty.|I'm preparing to set off soon.
s;Emeline;Wow... Archbishop! The new look is very glamorous!
s;CorneliusA;Hah! I do this job not for the attire...|Though it is a sizeable perk.|You have my thanks, your Majesty.
s;Emeline;I trust you will be safe?
s;CorneliusA;I have suitable escorts.|Lady Viridia will accompany me.|I just need a few more things from the storeroom.
s;CorneliusA;I have suitable escorts.|A cohort of knights will accompany me there.|I just need a few more things from the storeroom.
s;Emeline;You're in safe hands, take care!
s;Xeconis;Your Majesty, I have briefed everyone on todays task.
s;Max;An embargo is an interesting decision.|King Jevil really is biting off his nose here...
s;Emeline;He wishes to avoid the conflict all together.|Palushin's merchants are protesting our trade agreement.
s;Max;I suppose with their ports, they can still trade elsewhere...|But, our own merchants and businesses will suffer greatly...|My parent's tavern will surely miss their Quanadian wine imports...
s;Xeconis;Not to mention Palushin's mines, we need their ore for our weapons.
s;Emeline;My cousin's attempts to persuade him failed...|I have to do this personally...
s;Max;A tea party could do the trick. A win for diplomacy! Woo!
s;Emeline;Failing that, we might need to use force...|I do not want to... but...
s;Xeconis;Understood.|I will begin stocking up on supplies.
s;Mathias;You scumbag! Showing up here, empty handed!
s;Jason;You don't deserve anythin', you greasy git!
s;Mathias;You lost, fair and square.|The cards didn't go your way... Now, you pay!
s;Jason;Bah! Quit with the poetry, flowery sod!
s;Mathias;The boss would not be pleased with this.
s;Jason;Call it even, or we're gonna have trouble.
s;Jason;Big mistake.|I'll be back, soon enough.
s;Mathias;Should have just paid it up...
s;Emeline;This place... It is rather barren.
s;Xeconis;Palushin really does need its trade...|I doubt you could grow any decent food here...
s;Xeconis;Regions of Palushin with bodies of water tend to prosper.|While areas like this... left untouched...
s;Max;These canyons are so deep...|Better not look down, your Majesty!
s;Emeline;Down...{c:bop_portrait;Emeline} Eeek!|Ah! That is...|How.. how dare you!
s;Max;Need to hold my hand, your High-up-ness?
s;Xeconis;Max... Is now the time...?|Let's just go forwards. Carefully.
s;Jason;Oi! Matty, you miserable bastard!|I'm 'ere to crack you in two!
s;Jason;Told ya, I'm back!|I'll leave ya with another scar...
s;Mathias;You're dumber than you look.|But, since you won't pay me back in gold...|You'll pay in blood! Attack!
s;Emeline;We're in the middle of a gang fight...
s;Max;Sadly, I suspect peace isn't an option, here.
s;Xeconis;We'd be doing King Jevil a favor, don't you agree?
s;Emeline;I suppose that is true...|He would be in our debt.
s;Max;The irony of abusing debt is not lost on me.
